In good and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Itḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah, jamʻ al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī, taghammada [taghammadahu] Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān wa-askanahu aʻlā farādīs al-jinān. Āmīn. Tamm."

On folio 1a: Ownership statement: "Fī nawbat al-faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Bārī, ʻabduhu al-jānī, al-musrif al-muqaṣṣir al-wajil, al-rājī min Sayyidihi al-bāqī ʻafwan ʻanhu wa-iḥsānan min iḥsānihi wa-riḍāh wa-riḍā ḥabībihi Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-amīn wa-aṣḥābihi wa-al-tābiʻīn. Yā ʻAlīm. Yā ʻāliman bi-ḍaʻfī."

On folio 1a: "Qāla baʻḍ al-mutaʼakhkhirīn: al-Farq bayna al-Qurʼān wa-al-Ḥadīth al-Qudsī wa-al-Ḥadīth al-Nabawī, fa-al-jawāb: In al-Qurʼān mā kāna lafẓuhu wa-maʻnāh min ʻind Allāh bi-waḥy jalī. Wa-al-Ḥadīth al-Qudsī, mā kāna lafẓuhu min ʻind Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-maʻnāhu min Allāh taʻālá, wa-al-Ḥadīth al-Nabawī mā kāna lafẓuhu wa-maʻnāh min ʻind Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-waḥyin khafī."

On folio 1a: "Qāla al-Imām al-Kirmānī [Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf, 1317 or 1318-1384 or 1385] fī Sharḥ al-Bukhārī [al-Kawākib al-darārī fī sharḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī]: al-Qurʼān lafẓ muʻjiz wa-yunazzal bi-wāsiṭat Jibrīl, wa-al-Qudsī ghayr muʻjiz, wa-bi-dūn al-wāsiṭah, wa-yusammá ayḍan bi-al-Ḥadīth al-Ilāhī al-Rabbānī."
On folio 1a: "al-Aḥādīth al-Ilāhīyah hiya allatī samiʻahā al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laylata al-Miʻrāj, min asrār al-waḥy, bi-lā wāsiṭat malak."

On folio 1a: "al-Ḥadīth al-Qudsī mā akhbara Allāh bi-hi bi-al-ilhām, aw manām, fa-akhbara, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻan dhālika al-maʻná bi-ʻibārat nafsih, wa-al-Qurʼān lafẓ ayḍan munzal, kadhā fī Sharḥ al-Mashāriq, li-Ibn malak [ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz], wa-al-farq baynahu wa-bayn al-suwar, annahu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, idhā ʻabbara ʻan al-maʻná al-mūḥá ilayhi bi-alfāẓ wa-nasab, wa-nasaba ilá Rabbihi taʻālá, fa-Qudsī, wa-illā, fa-Nabawī."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi ʻalá yad kātibihi afqar al-barīyah wa-aḥwajihim ilá faḍl Rabbihi, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Shiḥādhah ibn Aḥmad, yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, khāmis ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat sabʻah wa-thalāthīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, khutimat bi-khayr. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the hand of the poorest and the most needy to the favor of his Lord, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Shiḥādhah ibn Aḥmad, on Tuesday, 15 Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1037 [17 July, 1628] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may it end well."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh jāʻil al-malāʼikah rusulan ulī ajniḥah mathná wa-thulāth wa-rubāʻ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-al-āl wa-al-ṣuḥb wa-al-atbāʻ. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā taʻlīq laṭīf jamaʻtuhu fī akhbār al-malāʼikah al-abrār, istawʻabtu fīhi mā waradat fīhi al-Aḥādīth wa-al-āthār, wa-khatamtuhu bi-fawāʼid yabtahiju bi-hā ulī al-abṣār, wa-sammaytuhu al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik. Wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān wa-ʻalayh al-tuklān ..."
Secundo folio: ʻan Abī Dharr qāla Rasūl Allāh.
15 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 16.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap, cover and flap tooled with central medallions and decorative frames.

In small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some soiling; some leaves damaged at the top with some loss of text; catchwords.
On the back of the front cover: A title of a book by al-Suyūṭī: "Kitāb Tanwīr al-ḥalak fī imkān ruʼyat al-Nabī wa-al-malak."
On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik, min taʼlīf al-Imām al-mujtahid Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala bi-al-shirāʼ al-Sharʻī fī ḥiyāzat Ḥasan ibn al-Shaykh Bakr Khayr al-Dīn Qaynān."
Colophon: "Intahá. Ākhir Kitāb al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed. This is the end of Kitāb al-Ḥabāʼik fī akhbār al-malāʼik."

record.title: 880-02 Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title of Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib from folio 1a.
Title of al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf from incipit (folio 6a).
Title of Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah from incipit (folio 10a).
Title of al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt from incipit (folio 11a).
Title of Kitāb al-mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn from incipit (folio 13b).
Title of Akhbār waradat ʻan Ḥudhayfah ibn al-Yamān from incipit (folio 14a).
Title of Ṣifat ṣāḥib al-dhawq al-salīm wa-al-maslūb al-dhawq al-laʼīm from incipit (folio 17a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi al-tuklān, wa-huwa ḥasbī. Qāla, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Dhikr asmāʼ al-ʻaqrab, lil-dhakar wa-al-unthá, wa-al-jamʻ ʻaqārib, wa-yuqāl lil-dhakar ʻuqrubān, wa-lil-unthá ʻaqrabah wa-ʻaqrabāʼ, bi-al-madd ghayr maṣrūf, wa-ʻuqrubān ayḍan ka-al-dhakar, dhakarahu fī al-Qāmūs, wa-min asmāʼihā al-Sayraʻ, ka-zabraj ..."
Secundo folio of Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib: wa-ṭabʻuka min ṭabʻihā alyanā.

Incipit of al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf, taʼlīf al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah wa-al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, Yā Karīm, wa-huwa thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi al-tuklān. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi allladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad kathura al-suʼāl ʻan al-Ḥadīth al-mushtahir ʻalá alsinat al-nās anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lā yamkuthu fī qabrihi alf sanah, wa-anā ujīb bi-annahu bāṭil lā aṣla la-hu. Thumma jāʼa rajul fī shahr Rabīʻ min hādhihi al-sanah, wa-hiya sanat thamān wa-tisʻīn wa-thamānimiʼah, wa-maʻahu waraqah bi-khaṭṭihi, dhakar annahu naqalahā min futyā aftá bi-hā akābir al-ʻulamāʼ ..."
Secundo folio of al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf: yughallūn bi-al-aghlāl wa-lā yuʻadhdhabūn.

Incipit of Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah: "Hādhā Kitāb Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah: "Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah, taʼlīf al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, raḥiamhu Allāh. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir, Yā Karīm. Masʼalah. Rajul ightāb rajul [rajulan] bi-sabb aw naḥwihi, aw qadhafahu, aw khānahu fī ahlihi thumma innahu tāb baʻda dhālik, fa-hal yakfī fī dhālika tawbatuhu wa-rujūʻuhu ilá Allāh wa-kathrat dhikrihi wa-ʻibādih [wa-ʻibādatih], am lā budda min taḥallulihi min dhālik wa-dhikrihi la-hu mā ẓalamahu bi-hi idhā lam yakun ʻalimah ..."
Secundo folio of Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah: khayran kathīran fī muqābilihi.

Incipit of al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt: "Kitāb al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt lil-Syūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ʻalayhi al-tuklān. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-Islām // wa-al-shukr lillāh ʻalá al-inʻām. Wa-afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-thanāʼ // ʻalá al-Nabī khātim al-anbiyāʼ. Wa-ālihi ulī al-nuhá wa-ṣaḥbihi // wa-jundihi ahli al-tuqá wa-ḥizbihi. Wa-hādhihi urjūzatun mufīdah // ḍammantuhā farāʼidan ʻadīdah. Fī fitnati al-maqbūri ḥīna yusʼalu // wa-mā atá bi-hi al-Nabīyyu al-Mursalu ..."
Secundo folio of al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt: Wa-kānati al-Anṣār tūṣī al-muḥtaḍir.

Incipit of Kitāb al-mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn: "Kitāb al-mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn lil-Syūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ʻalayhi al-tuklān wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻaẓīm al-minnati // al-māniḥi al-faḍli li-Ahli al-Sunnati. Thumma al-ṣalāta wa-al-salāma fa-ilatamis // ʻalá Nabīyin dīnuhu lā yandaris ..."
Secundo folio of Kitāb al-mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn: Wa-al-khāmis al-ḥabru huwa al-Ghazzālī.

Incipit of Akhbār waradat ʻan Ḥudhayfah ibn al-Yamān: "Wa-hādhihi Akhbār waradat ʻan Ḥudhayfah ibn al-Yamānī [al-Yamān], raḍiya Allāh ʻanh. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ʻalayhi al-tuklān wa-huwa ḥasbī. Ruwiya ʻan Ḥudhayfah ibn al-Yamānī innahu qāl: Ḥajja Nabīyunā Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, Ḥijjat al-Wadāʻ, thumma asnada bi-ẓahrihi ilá al-Kaʻbah, thumma baká al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥattá ibtalla ʻāriḍayhi [ʻāriḍāhu], fa-qāla Ḥudhayfah, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu: Mā alladhī yubkīka, yā ḥabībī, yā Rasūla Allāh? Lā abká Allāh laka ʻaynan illā min khishyat Allāh taʻālá ..."
Secundo folio of Akhbār waradat ʻan Ḥudhayfah ibn al-Yamān: kabīruhum ṣaghīrahum wa-lā ṣaghīruhum kabīrahum.

Incipit of Ṣifat ṣāḥib al-dhawq al-salīm wa-al-maslūb al-dhawq al-laʼīm: "Kitāb fī Ṣifat ṣāḥib al-dhawq al-salīm wa-al-maslūb al-dhawq al-laʼīm, taʼlīf khātim al-muḥaqqiqīn, al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-ʻazīz. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-insān wa-ʻallamahu al-bayān, wa-faḍḍalahu bi-nuṭq al-lisān ʻalá sāʼir al-ḥayawān, wa-khalaqa kull shayʼ fa-qaddarahu taqdīran, wa-jaʻalahu samīʻan baṣīran, thumma hadāhu al-sabīl, immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran ..."
Secundo folio of Ṣifat ṣāḥib al-dhawq al-salīm wa-al-maslūb al-dhawq al-laʼīm: muzaḥlaq min kathrat ḥumqihi yuzahziq.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb yusammá Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah, khātimat al-muḥaddithīn, Syayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-barakātihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-yalīhi Kitāb al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf. Wa-yalīhi Kitāb Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah. Wa-yalīhi Kitāb al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt. Wa-yalīh Kitāb al-Mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn."

At the end of the colophon of Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib: An invocation against insects, vipers, scorpions and snakes: "Qawluhu Nādānā Nūḥun ilá qawlihi Salāmun ʻalá Nūḥin fī al-ʻālamīn, hādhihi al-āyāt li-dafʻ al-ḥayawān wa-al-afāʻī wa-al-ʻaqārib wa-al-ḥayyāt. Intahá."
At the end of folio 16b: Five folkloric recipes, for help in giving birth, against disease and aging and against "al-barāghīth" (flees).
Folios 26 and 27 are blank.
Colophon of Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih."
Translation of the colophon of Bulūgh al-maʼārib fī akhbār al-ʻaqārib: "The book is ended by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence."
Colophon of al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf: "Intahá Kitāb al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf taḥrīran fī yawm al-Sabt, thālith ʻashar Ramaḍān, sanat 1150."

Translation of the colophon of al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf: "The book of al-Kashf fī mujāwazat hādhihi al-ummah al-alf is completed. Written on Saturday, 13 Ramaḍān, 1150 [of the Hijrah = 4 January, 1738]."
Colophon of Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah: "Tammat al-nuskhah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih."
Translation of the colophon of Badhl al-himmah fī ṭalab barāʼat al-dhimmah: "The copy was completed by the praise of God and His help."

Colophon of al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt: "Intajazat fī sābiʻ shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam qadruhu, sanat 1150, ʻalá yad afqar ʻibād Allāh, al-ʻabd al-faqīr, rājī ʻafwa Allāh al-qadīr, Rajab al-Suwayfī al-Aḥmadī al-Ḥalabī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of al-Tathbīt ʻinda al-tabyīt: "[The copy] was completed on the seventh day of the esteemed month of Ramaḍān, the year 1150 [of the Hijrah = 29 December 1737], by the hand of the poorest of the servants of God, the poor servant, who aspires to the forgiveness of God Almighty, Rajab al-Suwayfī al-Aḥmadī al-Ḥalabī, may he be forgiven. Amen."
Colophon of Kitāb al-mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn: "Tammat hādhihi al-risālah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih."

Translation of the colophon of Kitāb al-mujtahidīn fī asmāʼ al-mujaddidīn: "This epistle is completed by the praise of God and His help. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions."

Colophon of Akhbār waradat ʻan Ḥudhayfah ibn al-Yamān: No colophon. Text ends with: "... fa-yursilu Allāh ʻalayhim maṭaran fa-yaḍribuhum fī aʻnāqihim, fa-yamūtūn ʻalá ākhirihim, fa-tuntanu al-arḍ minhum, fa-yursilu Allāh ʻalayhim ṭuyūran ka-al-bukhah [ka-al-bukht], bi-manāqīr ḥidād, fa-yakhtaṭifūnahum fī manāqīrihim wa-yarmūnahum fī al-Baḥr al-Muḥīṭ. Thumma yursilu Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhim maṭaran ka-afwāh al-qirab, fa-tughsalu al-arḍ minhum. Qāl: Fa-ʻinda dhālika taẓharu al-dābbah al-Yamānīyah, raʼsuhā bi-al-Ṣafā wa-dhanabuhā bi-al-Marwah."

Colophon of Ṣifat ṣāḥib al-dhawq al-salīm wa-al-maslūb al-dhawq al-laʼīm: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Ṣallá ʻalayka Ilāhī dāʼiman abadan // mā in taʻāqabati al-ḍaḥawātu wa-al-uṣulu. Wa-ālika al-ghurri wa-al-ṣaḥbi al-kirāmi kadhā // musalliman wa-al-salām al-ṭayyibu al-ḥafilu. Tammat."

record.title: 880-02 Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh al-Khayyāṭ ibn Muḥammad al-Hārūshī al-Maghribī al-Fāsī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Kitāb Kunūz al-asrār. al-Ḥamdu lillāh fātiḥ kunūz al-asrār li-awliyāʼihi al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-māniḥ futūḥāt al-istibṣār li-man taqarraba ilayhi bi-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-kāshif al-ḥujub wa-al-astār li-man jaʻalahā hijjīrāhu fī kull waqt wa-ḥīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥwaj al-wará li-ʻafw rabbihi wa-maghfiratih, ʻAbd Allāh al-Khayyāṭ ibn Muḥammad al-Hārūshī al-Maghribī al-Fāsī manshaʼan wa-dāran, thumma al-Tūnisī riḥlatan wa-mazāran: Hādhihi ṣalawāt jayyidāt ʻaẓīmat al-ujūr wa-al-mathūbāt, tumḥaqu bi-hā, in shāʼ Allāh, al-sayyiʼāt, wa-tanmū al-ḥasanāt, wa-turfaʻu bi-hā al-darajāt, jamaʻtuhā maḥabbatan fī Sayyid al-Sādāt, wa-afḍal ahl al-araḍīn wa-al-samāwāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-hudāt ... wa-sammaytuhā bi-Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār ..."
Secundo folio: jamaʻtuhā maḥabbatan fī Sayyid al-Sādāt.
10.5 x 15.5 cm; written surface: 6 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In blackish green buckram binding with flap.
In beautiful Maghribi script, in black ink, on white paper; text fully vocalized in red; keywords in gold; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. Tajrīb al-qalam lā yuṣliḥu man ẓalam."
On folio 2b: "wa-sammaytuhā bi-Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār."
Text of Kunūz al-asrār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār: Folios 1b-37a.
On folios 37b-39a: Three different invocations.

On folios 39b: "Qāla al-ʻārif billāh Sayyid Aḥmad al-Zarrūq: Wa-kāna Shaykhunā Abū ʻAbd al-Qūrī kullamā dakhaltu ʻalayhi anshadanī hādhihi al-abyāt [three verses]: Fasuda al-zamānu fa-ayna ayna al-mahrabu // wa-fashá al-ḥarāmu fa-ayya kasbin aṭlubu ..." The verses are from a poem attributed in some sources to Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Shaṭībī (or al-Shuṭaybī, died 1556). Neither Sayyid Aḥmad al-Zarrūq nor Abū ʻAbd al-Qūrī (or al-Ghūrī?) could be identified.
On folios 39b-41a: Miscellaneous verses from a poem (manẓūmah), attributed to al-Shayk al-ʻAbqarī (could not be identified) on different aspects of Islamic law.

Colophon: "Kalumat [Kamulat] bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnih wa-tawfīqih, ʻalá yad kātibihi, aḥwaj al-wará ilá raḥmat rabbih, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Muḥammad ibn Balqāsim Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Ghadāmisī manshaʼan wa-dāran, thumma mā shāʼa Allāh, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt. Innaka ayyuhā al-muṣallī ʻalá al-Nabī Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lā tansā [tansa] al-nāsikh bi-duʻāh al-ṣāliḥah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-mayyitīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-Mukhtār qaylūlatan, fī shahr Shaʻbān, ʻām 1278, thamānī wa-sabʻīn baʻda miʼah wa-alf."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy is concluded by the praise of God and His abundant help and benevolence, by the most needy to the mercy of his Lord, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Muḥammad ibn Balqāsim Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Ghadāmisī manshaʼan wa-dāran, [i.e. who grew up and lived in the Ghadāmis, Libya], but what God wills where he will be next, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims, men and women. You who pray on the Prophet Muḥammad, may God pray on him and grant him peace, Do not forget the copyist in your righteous invocations, and all Muslims, men and women, the living among them and the dead. This copy of prayer on the Chosen Prophet was completed in siesta time, during the month of Shaʻbān, the year 1278 [February, 1862]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muʻjam al-wajīz min Aḥādīth al-Rasūl al-ʻAzīz : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mīrghanī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-kamā yanbaghī li-kamāl kibriyāʼih wa-majdih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlih wa-ʻabdih wa-jamīʻ man ursila min ʻindih, al-nāṭiqīn bi-jawāhir al-durar, wa-al-mursalīn bi-anwār al-ghurar, wa-ʻalá āl al-mafākhir wa-aṣḥāb al-mashāʻir, wa-ʻalá kull awwal wa-ākhir, wa-bāṭin wa-ẓāhir. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh illā Allāh al-wāḥid al-akbar, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan Rasūl Allāh, al-ḥabīb al-afkhar, ʻalayhi min al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām al-aʻṭar. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'al-Muʻjam al-wajīz min Aḥādīth al-Rasūl al-ʻAzīz' iltaqaṭtuhu min akmām al-anwār wa-anwār al-azʹhār lil-ittiʻāẓ wa-al-ihtidāʼ wa-al-istirshād wa-al-iqtidāʼ, fa-inna khayr al-hady hadyu Muḥammad ..."
Secundo folio: hijratuhu ilá Allāh wa-Rasūlih.
16.8 x 24.3 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
Folios 59-60 are blank; text folios 1b-58b.
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-Allāh, innī la-astaghfiru Allāh wa-atūbu ilayhi fī al-yawm akthar."

record.title: 880-02 al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥajarī.
record.note: Title of "al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād" from incipit (folio 2b).
Title of "Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn" supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Mimmā ṣannafahu zayn al-quḍāh Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥajarī hādhihi 'al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād', wa-ṣannafahā [ṣaghīran?] muʻtaqidan lil-nuṣḥ wa-al-widād, fa-inna minhā mā yakūnu mathná, fa-minhu mā ruwiya ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāl: Khuṣlatān lā shayʼ afḍal minhumā, al-īmān billāh wa-al-nafʻ lil-Muslimīn, wa-khuṣlatān lā shayʼ akhbath minhumā al-shirk billāh wa-al-iḍrār lil-Muslimīn. Wa-ruwiya ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, annahu qāl: ʻAlaykum bi-mujālasat al-ʻulamāʼ wa-istimāʻ kalām al-ḥukamāʼ, fa-inna Allāh taʻālá yuḥyī al-qalb al-mayyit bi-nūr al-ḥikmah, kamā yuḥyī al-arḍ al-mayyitah bi-māʼ al-maṭar ..."
Secundo folio for al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād: kānat al-nār fī ṭalabih.

Incipit of Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn: Incipit missing. Text starts with: "... al-ḥalīm al-sattār bi-barakat mā jamaʻa min al-Aḥādīth wa-al-akhbār, wa-altamisu al-duʻāʼ min al-nāẓirīn fīhi wa-al-wāʻiẓīn minhu, fa-raḥima Allāh man yadhkuruhu bi-al-duʻāʼ wa-lā yansāh. al-Ḥadīth al-awwal: ʻAn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: al-Rāḥimūn yarḥamuhum al-Raḥmān. Irḥamū man fī al-arḍ yarḥamkum man fī al-samāʼ. Wa-fī muwāfaqat hādhā al-Ḥadīth ḥikāyah ʻan ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, kāna yamshī fī sikak al-Madīnah, fa-raʼá ṣabīyan kāna fī yadihi ʻuṣfūr yalʻabu bi-hi, fa-raḥima ʻalá dhālika al-ʻuṣfūr, fa-ishtará [fa-ishtarāhu] min al-ṣabī wa-aʻtaqahu ..."
Secundo folio for Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn: innaka tughīẓu al-nās min raḥmatī.
12 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 8.7 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: Kitāb al-Munabbihāt wa-Arbaʻīn Ḥadīth ʻan al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam."

On folio 1b: A binder's statement: "Jallada hādhā al-kitāb al-Shaykh Sayyid Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Baʻth Allāh fī nahār al-Jumʻah fī niṣf shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak. Wa-saʻá fī tajlīdihi al-Shaykh ʻAlī ibn khaṭīb al-minbar [?]. Huwa la-hu, wa-Allāh aʻlam." Under it in a different hand: "Sanat 100029 [i.e. 1029 = 1619/1620?]."

On folio 1b: An ownership statement: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi aktafī. Katabahu mālikuhu al-faqīr ʻAlī [probably the same as [al-Shaykh ʻAlī ibn khaṭīb al-minbar [?], mentioned in the previous note], raḥimahu Allāh ḥayyan wa-mayyitan."
On folio 2a: An illegible text, in a different hand, which seems to be about inheritance and succession in Islamic law."

Colophon of al-Munabbihāt ʻalá al-istiʻdād li-yawm al-maʻād: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... al-Bāb al-ʻushārī. Qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: ʻAlaykum bi-al-siwāk, fa-inna fīhi ʻashr khiṣāl: Yuṭahhiru al-fam, wa-yurḍī al-Rabb, wa-yuskhiṭu al-Shayṭān, wa-yuḥibbu [wa-yuḥibbuhu] al-ḥafaẓah, wa-yashuddu al-liththah, wa-yaqṭaʻ al-balgham, wa-yuṭayyibu al-nakhah, wa-yuṭfī al-murrah, wa-yujlī al-baṣar, wa-yudhhibu al-khafar, wa-huwa min al-Sunnah. Wa-qāl: al-ṣalāh bi-al-siwāk afḍal min sabʻīn ṣalāh bi-lā siwāk ..."

Colophon of Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn: "Tamma al-Arbaʻūn ʻalá yaday Najm ibn Aṣīl al-Kāghidī al-Samarqandī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt. Wa-yarḥamu Allāh ʻabdan qāla 'Āmīnan'. Fī al-sābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Rajab, sanat 1122."

Translation of the colophon of Kitāb al-Arbaʻīn: "al-Arbaʻūn (Forty Ḥadīth) is completed by Aṣīl al-Kāghidī al-Samarqandī, may God forgive him, his parents and the believers, men and women. May God have mercy on the servant who says 'Amen'. Dated 17, Rajab 1122 [11 September, 1710]."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lam yazal ʻāliman qadīran, ḥayyan qayyūman, samīʻan baṣīran. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-hu, wa-ukabbiruhu takbīran, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī arsalahu ilá al-nās kāffatan bashīran wa-nadhīran, wa-ʻalá āl Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-taṣānīf fī iṣṭilāḥ ahl al-Ḥadīth qad kathurat lil-aʼimmah fī al-qadīm wa-al-ḥadīth, fa-min awwal man ṣannafa fī dhālika al-Qāḍī Abū Muḥammad al-Rāmhurmuzī fī kitābih 'al-Muḥaddith al-fāḍil', lākinnahu lam yastawʻib ... fa-saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an ulakhkhiṣa min dhālika al-muhimm, fa-lakhkhaṣtuhu fī awrāq laṭīfah sammaytuhā 'Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar', ʻalá tartīb ibtakartuhu wa-sabīl intahajtuhu ... fa-raghiba ilayya thāniyan an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu rumūzahā, wa-yaftaḥu kunūzahā, wa-yūḍiḥu mā khafiya ʻalá al-mubtadī min dhālika, fa-ajabtuhu ilá suʼālihi ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalim anna al-Muḥaddithīn baʻda al-Khaṭīb.
11 x 17 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; folio 25 is written in a different hand.
On the preliminary page: "Hādhā Sharḥ Nukhbat al-fikr."
Folios 66-67 are blank; text folios 1b-64b.
On folio 1a: "Sharḥ Nukhbat al-fikr fī muṣṭalaḥ ahl al-athar li-Ibn Ḥajar, raḥimahu Allāh."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mimmā manna Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá ʻabdihi ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Sabbāgh [with Sīn], ghufira la-hu."

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-risālah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, thāmin ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat khams ʻashrah wa-tisʻimiʼah, aḥsana Allāh ʻāqibatahā. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "This epistle is completed by the praise of God and His help. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. Copied on Wednesday, 18 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 915 [of the Hijrah = 9 March, 1510], may God end it favorably. May God pray on Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ ʻUqūd al-jumān fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munazzah ʻan al-mumāthalah wa-al-tashbīh, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh [illā] Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādata mukhliṣ fī al-tanzīh, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, dhū al-muʻjizāt allatī lā yaʻtarīhā shawb al-tamwīh, ṣallá [Allāh] wa-sallama ʻalayh wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ʻithratih [wa-ʻitratih] wa-dhurrihi [wa-dhurrīyatih]. Hādhā taʻlīq ʻallaqtuhu li-yuntafaʻa bi-hi fī ḥall urjūzatī allatī naẓamtuhā fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān wa-sammaytuhā ʻUqūd al-jumān, idh lam yattasiʻ waqtī li-kitābat sharḥ ʻalayh kamā artaḍīh, maʻa ilḥāḥ qārīhi ʻalayya fī dhālik, fa-najaztu la-hum hādhihi al-ʻujālah li-tuʻīnahum ʻalá fahm maqāṣidihā. Wa-billāh astaʻīn fī maṣādir al-umūr wa-mawāridihā ..."
Secundo folio: al-faṣīḥ al-muʻrib ʻammā fī al-ḍamīr.
16.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with light brown leather spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Sharḥ ʻUqūd al-jumān fī ʻilm al-maʻānī wa-al-bayān, tāʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, mujtahid ʻaṣrih, wa-farīd dahrih, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Jamāl al-Dīn [Jalāl al-Dīn] al-Suyūṭī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-raḥimahu, wa-ḥasharanā fī zumratih maʻa al-muttaqīn, bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn."
The Urjūzah of ʻUqūd al-jumān starts with: Qāla al-faqīru ʻābidu al-Raḥmāni // al-Ḥamdu lillāhi ʻalá al-bayāni. Wa-afḍalu al-ṣalāti wa-al-salāmi // ʻalá al-Nabīyi afṣaḥi al-anāmi ...

Colophon: "Intahá. Wa-kātibuhu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh, al-Shaykh Muḥammad, al-khaṭīb bi-al-Sharafīyah [could not be identified], fī sanat 186 [i.e., 1086] Hijrīyah, alf sittah wa-thamānūn Hijrīyah. Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār. Intahat, Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nuskhatihā fī 12 Rajab sanat [...]."

Translation of the colophon: "It has ended. Its copyist is the poor servant of his Lord, al-Shaykh Muḥammad, the preacher at al-Sharafīyah [could not be identified], in the year 186 [i.e., 1086] of the Hijrah [2 October, 1675]. It is completed by the help of God, the Only One, the Almighty. It has ended. Copied on 12 Rajab, the year [...]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Qāsim ʻAmmār al-Zawāwī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Rabbi yassir. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa li-ḥaml al-Ḥadīth man iṣṭafāhu min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāhu li-fahm mā fīhi min al-aḥkām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu, lā sharīka la-h, al-Malik al-ʻallām, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī ūtiya jawāmiʻ al-kalim wa-badāyiʻ al-ḥikam al-ʻiẓām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi al-kirām, ṣalātan mutaḍāʻifah ʻalá mamarr al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām, wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna ūlá mā unfiqat fīhi min nafāʼis al-aʻmār wa-istuʻmilat fīhi al-afkār wa-al-asmāʻ wa-al-abṣār Ḥadīth Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-kānat al-Arbaʻūn allatī allafahā walī Allāh al-ʻAllāmah Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū Zakarīyā Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Dīn al-Nawāwī min jawāmiʻ kalimihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam ... wa-kāna sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī Ibrāhīm ibn Marʻī ibn ʻAṭīyah al-Shabrākhītī al-Mālikī min aḥsan mā ṣunnifa ʻalayhā min al-shurrāḥ ... lākin, lammā kānat ʻibāratuhu ṭawīlah ... fa-aḥbabtu an ulakhkhiṣa minhu mā tadʻū al-ḥājah ilayh ... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: qabla al-shurūʻ fī al-maqṣūd.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Shabrakhītī and markings in purple; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb musammá bi-al-Kashf al-mubīn al-mulakhkhaṣ min al-Shabrakhītī ʻalá al-Arbaʻīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: "Wa-mulakhkhiṣuhu al-faqīr al-muḍṭarr li-raḥmat Rabbihi al-qadīr Qāsim ʻAmmār al-Zawāwī al-Sakandarī al-Mālikī, wa-huwa fī mulk al-Sayyid ʻUmar Bāshqaṭashlī [... ...], ghafara Allāh la-nā wa-la-hu wa-lil-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-hādhā muqayyad bi-ghayr ḥuqūq al-ʻibādah, ka-al-ghaybah, fa-innahu lā yamḥūhā illā al-istiḥlāl, idhā balaghat man qīlat fīhi, in amkan, wa-illā fa-yanbaghī an yukthira min al-istighfār wa-al-duʻāʼ la-hu, li-Ḥadīth 'Idhā ightāba aḥadukum akhāh fa-li-yastaghfir la-hu, fa-inna dhālika kaffārah'. Wa-iʻlam anna al-ṣaghīrah tukaffiruhā ..."

record.title: 880-02 Mawlid al-Nabī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wājib al-wujūd, al-wāsiʻ al-karam wa-al-jūd, al-munazzah ʻan al-wālid wa-al-mawlūd, alladhī baʻatha fīnā nabīyahu wa-ḥabībahu Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-al-āyāt al-bayyināt wa-al-muʻjizāt al-bāhirāt, fa-aẓhara bi-hi dīnahu al-qawīm, wa-hadá bi-hi [ilá] al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm, wa-khaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá wa-al-maqām al-asmá, wa-akhadha ʻan anbiyāʼihi al-mawāthīq wa-al-ʻuhūd: La-in jāʼakum rasūl muṣaddiq li-mā maʻakum la-tuʼminunna bi-hi wa-li-tanṣurannahu ḥattá yuballigha risālat al-Malik al-maʻbūd. Fa-lammā aqarrū bi-dhālika, qāl: Ishhadū wa-anā maʻakum min al-shāhidīn, fa-dalla dhālika ʻalá annahu afḍal khalq Allāh wa-ashraf rusul Allāh ..."
Secundo folio: yuṣallūn ʻalá al-Nabī.
16.5 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; numerous commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On the decorative label pasted to the front cover: "Mawlid al-Nabī al-aʻẓam lil-Shaykh al-Dardīr."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Mawlid al-Nabī al-ʻaẓīm lil-Imām al-Shaykh Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Dardīr, nafaʻanā Allāh [bi-hi] wa-bi-ʻulūmihi, bi-jāh al-Nabī al-karīm. Āmīn. M."

Colophon: Tamma Mawlid Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá yad kātibihi, afqar al-ʻibād ilá Rabbih, al-faqīr Sulaymān ibn Aḥmad, al-muqirr bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn.M."

Translation of the colophon: "Mawlid Rasūl Allāh, may God pray on him and grant him peace, is completed. Copied by the poorest of the servants to his Lord, the poor Sulaymān ibn Aḥmad, who admits his disability and insufficiency, may God forgive him, his parents and Muslims. Amen. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Faqīh al-Qāḍī al-Imām Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-lā wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadman, wasiʻa kull shayʼ raḥmatan wa-ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻammā, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim ..."
Secundo folio: ālihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran.
15.5 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: The 31 numbered quires of the manuscript are kept within a red leather cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with beautiful metallic medallion.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red, with some in green; catchwords.
Text folios 1b-305a; folio 306 is blank.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Matn al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá, taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, waḥīd dahrih wa-farīd ʻaṣrih, al-Qāḍī ʻIyāḍ, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-ʻulūmih. Āmīn. M."
On folio 3a: "... wa-tarjamtuhu bi-al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá ..."

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakatihi. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallama, wa-sharrafa, wa-ʻaẓẓama wa-karam. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The book 'al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá' is completed. May God benefit us by its blessing. Amen. Praise be to God, Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions, and grant them peace, honor, glorify and exalt them. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 8b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Qāḍī al-Imām al-ḥāfiẓ, muḥyī al-Sunnah, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh wa-arḍāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmā [al-aḥmá], alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir, yaqīnan wa-qaṭʻan, lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻadaman, wasiʻa kull shayʼ raḥmatan [wa-]ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻamman, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim, ʻAraban wa-ʻajaban [wa-ʻAjaman], wa-azkāhum maḥtidan wa-manmá ..."
Secundo folio: ghayruhu mushāhadan fa-hum bi-mushāhadat.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark green buckram binding with flap and dark brown leather spine.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red, text within red frame; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: A reader's note: "Badaʼtu qirāʼat hādhā al-kitāb 15 Ḥ [Muḥarram?], sanat 41."

On folio 1a: Two ownership notes: "Tamallakahu al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qadīr Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī. Sanat 1304 [1886/1887]". "Tamallakahu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Mawlāhu al-ghanī al-qadīr Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Fahd al-Ujhūrī."
On folios 2b-6b: An incomplet table of contents.

On folio 7a: Two ownership notes: "Tamallaktu li-Shifā Sharīf anā al-faqīr al-Sayyid al-Ḥājj Muḥammad Shākir Nīkabūlī [?]." Seal of "al-Sayyid Muḥammad Shākir". "Wa-baʻdahu intaqala ilá mulk al-Sayyid Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujhūrī."
At the head of folio 7b: "Hādhā Kitāb Shifā Sharīf. Shifā Sharīf."
Text folios 7b-185b; folio.
On folio 8b: "... tarjamtuhu bi-al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá ..."

Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb, bi-yad Ḥāfiẓ Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad Quzaʻī [?], sanat tisʻ wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, fī shahr Dhā al-Qaʻd, fī yawm ithnayn [?]. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed by the help of God the abundant giving King, by the hand of Ḥāfiẓ Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad Quzaʻī [?], in the year 1179, on the second day [?] of the month of Dhū al-Qaʻdah [12 April, 1766]. It is completed. It is completed. It is completed."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī ikhtiṣār al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika wa-zidtuhu fawāʼid ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Mālik, fa-qultu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-minqabah ʻaẓīmah fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāʼir al-shuhūr, wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá ṣāra bi-hā madhkūran ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."
Secundo folio: ṣifātihi al-ẓāhirah wa-al-bāṭinah.
16.3 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled orange cardboard with flap and decorations in silver and black; spine in red leather.
In beautiful naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red numerous notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.
On the decorative label on the front cover: "Sharḥ al-Mawlid lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh al-Madābighī, ʻalá ṣāḥibihi afḍal al-salām."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Mawlid al-Mukhtār ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-Madābighī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Miscellaneous anecdotes/riddles/fatwas, on different aspects of Islamic law: Inheritance, marriage, prayer, divorce, bridal money, attributed to different scholars: al-Ramlī, al-Ziyādī, al-Shāfiʻī, al-Baghawī, al-Adhruʻī, Ibn Ḥijjah.

Colophon: "Tamma hādhā al-Mawlid al-Sharīf bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá rabbihi al-ghafūr al-shakūr al-Sayyid ʻĪsá ibn al-Sayyid ʻAlī ibn al-Sayyid Taqī al-Dīn, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ghafar la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn, wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-Mawlid al-Sharīf yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, qubayl al-ghurūb, yawm sittata ʻashar khalat min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-mubārak, min shuhūr sanat 1188."

Translation of the colophon: "This Noble Mawlid is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, by the poor to his forgiving and praiseworthy Lord, al-Sayyid ʻĪsá ibn al-Sayyid ʻAlī ibn al-Sayyid Taqī al-Dīn, may God pardon and forgive him, his parents, all believers, and him who reads the book and asks God's forgiveness on his behalf. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. It is completed. It is completed. It is completed. The copy of this Noble Mawlid was written before sunset, on blessed Thursday, sixteen days having passed from the month of Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 1188 [of the Hijrah = 18 January, 1775]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī.
record.note: Title from folio 4a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-Qāḍī al-awḥad, Abū al-Faḍl ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá ibn ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-ismihi al-asmá, al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-al-mulk al-aʻazz al-aḥmá, alladhī laysa dūnahu muntahá, wa-lā warāʼahu marmá, al-ẓāhir lā takhayyulan wa-wahman, wa-al-bāṭin taqddusan lā ʻudman, wasiʻa kulla shayʼ raḥmatan wa-ʻilaman, wa-asbagha ʻalá awliyāʼihi niʻaman ʻumman, wa-baʻatha fīhim rasūlan min anfusihim, ʻAraban wa-ʻAjaman, wa-azkāhum maḥtidan wa-manmá wa-arjaḥahum ʻaqlan wa-ḥilman ..."
Secundo folio: wa-khaṣṣahum min maʻrifatihi.
17.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap and dark red leather on spine and flap.
In beautiful naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; some corrections on the margins; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 4a: "... tarjamtuhu bi-al-Shifā bi-taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... nastaʻīdhuhu, jalla ismuhu, min duʻāʼ lā yusmaʻ, wa-ʻilm lā yanfaʻ, wa-ʻamal lā yarfaʻ, fa-huwa al-jawwād alladhī lā yakhību man ammalah, wa-lā yantaṣiru man khadhalah, wa-lā yaruddu daʻwat al-qāṣidīn, wa-lā yuṣliḥu ʻamal al-mufsidīn, wa-huwa ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-azwājihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman ilá yawm al-dīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

record.title: 880-02 al-Āyāt al-ʻaẓīmah al-bāhirah fī miʻrāj Sayyid al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ujhūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-fahhāmah, ḥāfiẓ ʻaṣrih wa-zamānih, wa-faylasūf waqtihi wa-awānih, ʻumdat al-muḥaddithīn, wa-nukhbat al-fuqahāʼ wa-al-mufassirīn, khātimat al-ḥuffāẓ wa-al-muḥaqqiqīn, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, Abū al-Irshād, ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn wa-adhhaba ʻan qalbihi al-zaygh wa-al-dayn [wa-al-mayn], bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa Sayyidanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ilá aʻlá al-maqāmāt, wa-raqqāhu ilá al-Rafīq al-Aʻlá ashraf al-darajāt, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-shīʻatih wa-wārithīhi wa-ḥizbihi mā tawālat al-awqāt ..."
Secundo folio: min takdhībihim la-hu wa-ramyihi bi-al-siḥr.
17.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in four unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some words and phrases are underlined; some leaves are water damaged without loss of text; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Āyāt al-ʻaẓīmah al-bāhirah fī miʻrāj Sayyid al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-fahhāmah, Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn. M."
The endowment statement on folio 1a is defaced; at the head of some leaves is written the word "Waqf" (Endowment).
O folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu al-Āyāt al-ʻaẓīmah al-bāhirah fī miʻrāj Sayyid al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah ..."

Author's colophon: "Wa-qad ān an athnī ʻinān al-qalam, wa-astaghfir Allāh mimmā zalat bi-hi al-qadam wa-waqaʻa fī hādhā al-kitāb min al-zalal, multamisan mimman waqafa ʻalayhi min al-fuḍalāʼ wa-al-mutqinīn an yasudda bi-sadadihi wa-faḍlih mā ʻathar ʻalayhi min al-khaṭaʼ, fa-al-mutaṣaddī lil-taʼlīf wa-al-muʻtanī bi-hi, wa-law balagha al-suhá fī al-nuhá, idhā ṣannafa faqad istuhdifa. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻalī al-ʻaẓīm."

Translation of the author's colophon: "It is time for me to relax the bridle of the pen, and ask God to forgive the slip of my foot, and the mistakes committed in this book. I beg any of the notable and the skillful readers who finds an error in the book to correct it, according to his appropriateness and favor; for anyone who attempts to compose, or is occupied with writing, even if he attains the highest zenith of intelligence, when he writes he becomes a target for attack. There is no power nor might except in God the Most high, the Almighty.

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-qad wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Arbaʻ al-mubārak, iḥda ʻashar min shahr Jumādá al-Thānī, sanata thamāniyah wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Qashshāshī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man qaraʼ fīhi wa-daʻā lahumā bi-al-maghfirah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "Copied on blessed Wednesday, 11 Jumādá al-Thānī, 1178 [of the Hijrah = 6 December, 1764] by the poor Aḥmad ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Qashshāshī, may God forgive him, his parents and whoever reads the book and implores God to forgive them. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Bahjat al-sāmiʻīn wa-al-nāẓirīn bi-Mawlid Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Madābighī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻAlī, Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Shāfiʻī al-Azʹharī al-Madābighī: Qad suʼiltu fī al-ikhtiṣār [ikhtiṣār] al-Mawlid al-Sharīf lil-Najm al-Ghayṭī, fa-ajabtu ilá dhālika wa-zidtuhu fawāʼid ḥasbamā fataḥa bi-hi al-Qādir al-Malik, fa-qultu: [al-Ḥamdu] lillāh alladhī anāra al-wujūd bi-mawlid Sayyid al-Mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá [ālihi wa-]ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. [Ammā baʻd], fa-inna shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal ikhtaṣṣa bi-minqabah ʻaẓīmah, fāqa bi-hā ʻalá sāʼir al-shuhūr, wa-fāza bi-karāmah kubrá, ṣāra bi-hā madhkūran ʻalá mamarr al-duhūr ..."
Secundo folio: maqālat qāʼil in raqqaqa al-bulaghāʼ.
16.5 x 23.8 cm; written surface: 8 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in three unnumbered quires).
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and Ḥadīths on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: An ownership statement (written in red): "Hādhā mulk al-faqīr ilá mawlāh, Muḥammad al-Shāfiʻī al-Manawātī."

Colophon (folio 29a): "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā yassara Allāh taʻālá min Mawlidihi al-Sharīf, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. 25 Jumād Awwal, sanat 1266 [8 April, 1850]." On folios 29a-30b (in the same hand): Miscellaneous anecdotes in verse, and Ḥadīths: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah [fī] 26 Jumād Awwal, sanat 1266 [9 April, 1850]."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of what God, may He be praised, facilitated of his [Prophet Muḥammad's] Noble Mawlid, may God pray on him and grant him peace. [Dated] 25 Jumād Awwal, the year 1266 [of the Hijrah = 8 April, 1850]." On folios 29a-30b (in the same hand): Miscellaneous anecdotes in verse, and Ḥadīths: "This blessed copy was completed on 26 Jumād Awwal, the year 1266 [of the Hijrah = 9 April, 1850]."

record.title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh māniḥ al-ṣawāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad arqá al-akhillāʼ wa-al-aḥbāb, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādata ʻabdin awwāb, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-wasīlah la-nā wa-al-bāb. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu rājī satr al-masāwī, al-faqīr ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī al-Sharqāwī: Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá Mawlid al-Muṣṭafá, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, al-mansūb lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Madābighī, jamaʻtuhā min muṣannafāt kathīrah li-baʻḍ al-fuḍalāʼ, wa-taqrīrāt li-mashāyikhinā, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hā. Āmīn.
Secundo folio: badalan aw ʻaṭf bayān.
17 x 25 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 19.5 cm; 26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires).

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Madābighī's abridgment of al-Ghayṭīs "Mawlid" in red, preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying); markings in red; catchwords.
Pages of the manuscript are numbered in Indian numerals (1-42). Text folios 1b-26b. Folios 27-28 are blank.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... qawluhu 'Wa-uṣība Abrahah', ay, fa-uhlika bi-dāʼ ghayr al-aḥjār, wa-al-ẓāhir annahu uṣība bi-hi baʻda nuzūl ḥajarihi ʻalayh, fa-lam yamut, ziyādatan fī ʻuqūbatihi, ʻalá anna alladhīna uṣībū bi-al-ḥijārah lam yamūtū kulluhum sarīʻan. Wa-fī al-Shāmī: Mā waqaʻa al-ḥajar ʻalá janb shakhṣ illā kharaja min janbih ..."

record.title: 880-02 Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah.
record.note: Title of Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih from folio 3a.
Title of Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā wa-la-hā from folio 10b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-faqīh al-ʻālim al-ʻārif billāh al-Walī Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Jamrah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakātih wa-afāḍa ʻalaynā min anwārih. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad al-khīrah min khalqih, wa-ʻalá al-Ṣaḥābah al-mukhtārīn li-ṣuḥbatih. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā kāna al-Ḥadīth wa-ḥifẓuhu min aqrab al-wasāʼil ilá Allāh, ʻazza wa-jall, bi-muqtaḍá al-āthār fī dhālik, fa-minhā qawluhu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: 'Man addá ilá ummatī Ḥadīthan wāḥidan yuqīmu bi-hi sunnah wa-yaruddu bi-hi bidʻah, fa-la-hu al-Jannah' ..."
Secundo folio of Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih: wa-daʻá li-qārīhi wa-qad qāla.

Incipit of Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā wa-la-hā: "Qāla al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil Abū Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻīd ibn Abī Jamrah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi wa-bi-amthālih, bi-mannihi wa-karamih wa-ṭawlih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rataqa fatqa ẓulumāt jahālāt al-qulūb, fa-badā anwār barakāt muʻjizāt āthār al-nubūwah al-Hāshimīyah al-Qāsimīyah al-Muḥammadīyah, fa-kashafa la-nā bi-madlūlāt jawāhir durar alfāḍihā [alfāẓihā] ʻan ḥusn ḥikmat khāliqihā bi-mā bi-hi taqbalu barīʼatuhu allatī khalaqahā li-ʻibādatihi wa-aṭlaʻahā bi-ṣidq naqlihā ʻalá jumal min ghaybihi, wa-mā aʻadda li-man ittabaʻa mā bi-hi taʻabbuduhā wa-ʻaẓīm iḥsānihi ʻalayhim wa-inʻāmihi, wa-ʻalá khaṭar mā tawaʻʻada bi-hi li-man kadhdhaba bi-hā aw tarakahā min niqamihi wa-ʻadhābih ..."
Secundo folio of Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā wa-la-hā: allatī jamaʻtu bi-nafsihi.
21.8 x 28 cm; written surface: 15 x 22 cm; 32 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; covers and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames.
In good Maghribī script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Leaves 1 and 205 are blank.
At head of text of folios 2b and 9b: A "ḥilyah" (decoration) in black, red and brown.

On folio 1a: A date recorded by a reader (1161 of the Hijrah = 1748): "al-Ithnayn fī sanat iḥdá wa-sittīn min al-qarn allatī thānī ʻashrah baʻda al-miʼah wa-al-alf, iḥdá ʻashrah, wa-huwa fī tilka al-sanah kabs."
On folio 3a: "... fa-sammaytuhu bi-muqtaḍá waḍʻih 'Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih' ..."

At head of text on folio 9b: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim taslīman ʻadada mā fī ʻilm Allāh ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."
On folio 10b: "... wa-sammaytu al-kitāb bi-Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā wa-la-hā ..."

Colophon of Jamʻ al-nihāyah fī badʼ al-khayr wa-ghāyatih: No colophon. Ends with an invocation by the author: "Intahá. Allāhumma ijʻalnā mimman razaqtahum ḥubba nabīyika, al-ṣafwah min khalqik, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ḥubba ālihi wa-azwājihi wa-aṣḥābih wa-anṣārih wa-ʻarraftahum qadra faḍlihim wa-mā min al-maʼāthir manaḥtahum, wa-iʻṣimnā min an nansiba ilayhim aw ilá aḥad minhum mā lā yalīqu bihim min ʻiṣmah bāṭinah wa-ẓāhirah, wa-ihdinā ṭarīq al-rashād bi-faḍlik, wa-iḥmilnā ʻalá markab al-salāmah fī al-dīn wa-al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah bi-karamik, wa-ʻāfinā min al-fitan wa-al-miḥan bi-raḥmatik, wa-imnaʻnā bi-ʻizzika min an yujhala ʻalaynā aw an najhala ʻalá aḥad min khalqik, wa-ijʻalnā mimman raḥimtahum fī al-dārayn bi-lā miḥnah, innaka ahl al-faḍl wa-al-jūd, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Intahá."

Colophon of Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā wa-la-hā: "Kamula bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnih al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā [wa-la-hā] ... lil-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah ... ʻAlá yad nāsikhihi ... ʻAlī ibn Makhlūf ... Lākin lammā an waffaqa al-Mawlá al-ʻaẓīm fī tamāmih, intahá ʻalá nafsih annahu tafaḍḍala bi-thawāb al-naskh wa-al-iqrāʼ fīhi ʻalá al-marḥūmah, bi-karam Allāh, ummuhu Ḥalīmah, jazāʼan la-hā ʻalá sālif iḥsānihā ..."

Translation of the colophon of Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā wa-la-hā: "Completed, by the praise of God and His abundant benevolence, is the book titled 'Bahjat al-nufūs wa-taḥallīhā wa-maʻrifat mā ʻalayhā [wa-la-hā]' ... of the learned and industrious Imām, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Saʻd ibn Abī Jamrah ... Copied by ... ʻAlī ibn Makhlūf ... When the copy was completed, by the help of the Almighty Lord, the copyist [speaking in the third person] decided to dedicate it to the memory of his departed mother, Ḥalīmah, may God, by His graciousness, have mercy upon her, and grant her the reward of copying the book and reading it, because of her previous benevolence towards him ..."

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaḥīḥ. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl al-Bukhārī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Bāb 'Manāqib al-Anṣār wa-alladhīna tabawwaʼū al-dār wa-al-īmān min qablihim, yuḥibbūna man hājara ilayhim wa-lā yajidūna fī ṣudūrihim ḥājah mimmā ūtū, al-Āyah. Ḥaddathanā Muḥammad, qāl, ḥaddathanā Mūsá ibn Ismāʻīl, qāl, ḥaddathanā Mahdī ibn Maymūn, qāl, ḥaddathanā Ghaylān ibn Jarīr, qāl, qultu li-Anas Araʼyata ism al-Anṣār, kadhā yusammawna bi-hi, am sammākum Allāh, tabāraka wa-taʻālá, qāl, Bal sammānā Allāh ʻazza wa-jall. Kunā nadkhulu ʻalá Anas, fa-yuḥaddithunā bi-manāqib al-Anṣār wa-mashāhidihim, wa-yuqbilu ʻalayya, aw ʻalá rajul min al-Azd, fa-yaqūlu faʻala qawmuka yawma kadhā wa-kadhā kadhā wa-kadhā ..."
Secundo folio: dhahaba shakk Ibrāhīm.
13.8 x 32.5 cm; written surface: 13.5 x 22 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames (in thirty separate and unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; some corrections on the margins; text within double red frame; some water damage without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-Juzʼ al-thānī min matn al-Bukhārī fī Aḥādīth Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá al-tamām. M."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement, dated 1193 of the Hijrah (1779/1780): "Dakhala fī mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá [...] sanat 1193."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "Bāb 'Hal yashtarī ṣadaqatahu'. Wa-lā baʼsa an yashtariya ṣadaqatahu ghayruhu, li-anna al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, innamā nahá al-mutaṣaddiq khāṣṣatan ʻan al-shirāʼ, wa-lam yanha ghayrahu. Ḥaddathanā Yaḥyá ibn Bakīr, ḥaddathanā al-Layth ʻan ʻAqīl, ʻan Ibn Shihāb, ʻan Sālim, anna ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, kāna yuḥaddithu anna ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb taṣaddaqa bi-faras fī sabīl Allāh, fa-wajadahu yubā [yubāʻ], fa-arāda an yashtariyahu, thumma atá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fa-istaʼmarahu, fa-qāl 'Lā taʻud fī ṣadaqatika', fa-bi-dhālika kāna Ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, lā yatruku an yabtāʻa shayʼan taṣaddaqa bi-hi illā jaʻalahu ṣadaqah. Ḥaddathanā ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf, akhbaranā Mālik ibn Anas, ʻan Zayd ibn Aslam, ʻan abīhi, qāl: 'Samiʻtu ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu yaqūlu: Ḥamaltu ..."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa ṭāʼifah min ʻulamāʼ kull ʻaṣr lil-qiyām bi-aʻbāʼ al-Aḥādīth wa-al-sunnan, wa-mayyazahum ʻalá man siwāhum bi-sulūkihim awḍaḥ al-maḥajjah wa-aqwam al-sanan, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka la-h, shahādatan antaẓimu fī silkihim wa-atabawwaʼu bi-khulūṣihā sawābigh al-niʻam wa-sawābiq al-minan ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa ʻilm uṣūl al-dīn.
22.5 x 16.8 cm; written surface: 10 x 17 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 23 unnumbered folios); cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Arbaʻūn al-Nawawīyah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn alltī kharrajahā al-Imām Sharaf al-Dīn Yaḥyá al-Nawāwī, lil-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, sākin Makkah, saqá Allāh tharāhā, wa-ṭayyaba marʻāhā, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam."

At the head of folio 1a: A statement dating the death of a certain Fāṭimah al-Ṣaghīr, on the "Night of the Noble Maḥmal", Wednesday, 16 Shawwal, 1124 (16 November, 1712): "Wafāt Fāṭimah al-Ṣaghīr, laylat al-arbaʻ al-mubārak, sādis ʻashar Shawwāl, laylat al-Maḥmal al-Sharīf, sanat 1124."
On folio 1a: Several verses of poetry.
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Intaqal al-mabyūʻ sharʻī ilá mulk al-faqīr ṣāḥib [...] Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad Nabk Zādah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."
On folio 2a: "... wa-sammaytuhu al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīb bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn ..."
The first three quires are smaller in size: 15.5 21.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.

Author's colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi wa-riḍwānih: Ibtadaʼtu fī hādhā al-sharḥ athnāʼ al-Qaʻdah, wa-faraghtu minhu khilāl al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat iḥdá wa-khamsīn wa-tisʻimʼiah. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Its author, may God shelter him with His mercy and favor, said: I started this commentary during the month of Dhū al-Qaʻdah, and completed it during the month of Muḥarram, the year 951 [February to April, 1544]. God Almighty is more knowledgeable."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, ākhir shahr Jumād Awwal, sanat 1176 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. M."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Thursday, the end of Jumād Awwal, the year 1176 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [17 December, 1762], may the best of prayer and peace be upon him. M."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Shifā fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān shifāʼan li-mā fī al-ṣudūr, wa-hudan wa-raḥmatan lil-muʼminīn, wa-shafā bi-hi man kāna ashfá ʻalá biʼr Jahannam min al-kāfirīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn, wa-sanad al-awwalīn wa-al-ākhirīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn, wa-atbāʻihi wa-ashyāʻihi ajmaʻīn, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād ilá karam Rabbihi al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā raʼaytu kitāb al-Shifāʼ fī shamāʼil Ṣāḥib al-Iṣṭifāʼ ajmaʻ mā ṣunnifa fī bābih mujmalan fī al-istīfāʼ, li-ʻadam imkān al-wuṣūl ilá intihāʼ al-istiqṣāʼ qaṣadtu an akhdumahu bi-sharḥ baʻḍ mā yataʻallaqu bi-hi min taḥqīq al-iʻrāb wa-al-bināʼ, rajāʼ an uslak fī silk masālik al-ʻulamāʼ yawm al-jazāʼ, fa-aqūl, wa-billāh al-tawfīq wa-bi-taʼyīdihi ẓuhūr al-taḥqīq ..."
Secundo folio: lil-wará wa-aṣl al-marmá.
21.5 x 31.5 cm; written surface: 14.2 x 23.5 cm; 37 lines per page.
Binding: The four parts of the codex are in a marbled cardboard cover, parts 3 and 4 also have thick paper covers.

In small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some phrases are underlined in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; at the head of text on folio 1b of part 1, a "ḥilyah" (decoration) in blue, red and gold; the text on folios 1b and 2a of part 1 is within a frame of blue and gold; catchwords.

The codex is in four separate parts, copied continuously, as indicated by the catchwords, and numbered as follows: Part 1 (folios: 1-75), part 2 (folios: 77-157), part 3 (folios: 1-90), part 4 (folios: 1-67). Some leaves might be missing as it is indicated by the catchwords on some of the leaves and the difference in numbering of the folios (1-327 in Indian numerals, in contrast to the existing number of folios, totaling 314).

On folio 1a (part 1): "Huwa al-awwal wa-al-ākhir, wa-al-bāṭin wa-al-ẓāhir. Hādhā Sharḥ Shifāʼ al-Qāḍī ʻIyāḍ al-Yaḥṣubī fī Shamāʼil Ṣāḥib al-Iṣṭifāʼ, lil-Mullā ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī, raḥima Allāh al-jamīʻ, wa-nafaʻanā bi-him fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, kullamā dhakarak al-dhākirūn, wa-ghafila ʻan dhikrih al-ghāfilūn."
On folio 1a (part 1): "Jild awwal min Sharḥ al-Shifā al-Sharīf."
On the upper left corner of folio 1a (part 1): An erased ownership statement.
On folio 1a (part 1): "Khāzin Ḥaḍrat Jahāndārī Lālā ʻAbd Allāh Āghā."
On folio 1a (parts 1-4): An ownership statement: "Fī ḥawz aḥqar al-ʻibād Aḥmad ibn al-marḥūm Muḥammad Murshid, sanat 1224 [of the Hijrah = 1809/1810], ʻafā Allāh ʻanhumā. Aḥmad Murshid."
At the end of the codex are eleven verses of poetry praising the original book "al-Shifā fī taʻrīf ḥuqūq al-Muṣṭafá" and its author al-Qāḍī ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá al-Yaḥṣubī.

Colophon: "Faragha muʼallifuhu, raḥimahu Allāh wa-salafahu, awāsiṭ Ramaḍān al-mubārak, ʻām aḥad ʻashar baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ilá al-Madīnah al-sakīnah, wa-dhālika bi-Makkah al-Mukarramah al-amīnah. Wa-anā al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī wa-karamih al-wafī."

Translation of the colophon: "Its author, may God have mercy upon him and upon his predecessor [i.e. al-Qāḍī ʻIyāḍ ibn Mūsá al-Yaḥṣubī], finished the work in the middle of blessed Ramaḍān, the year 1011 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [26 February, 1603] to tranquil Medina, in noble and faithful Mecca. Written by the poor to his Lord the Creator, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Ḥanafī, may God treat both of them with His hidden gentleness and abundant generosity."

record.title: Homiliary (fragment).
record.note: Script: written in a rounded Protogothic hand.
Decoration: the leaf is undecorated.
Layout: two columns of 18 or 20 lines each.

record.title: Missal (fragment).
record.note: Script: written in a Protogothic bookhand.
Decoration: rubrics and versal initials in red. Five large, three-line initials in red.
Layout: single column of 23 lines. Initials placed in margin outside of text block.

record.title: Swiss notarial document.
record.note: Script: written in a notarial hand by Petrus de Ryedmatten de Vespia.
Decoration: the document contains the notarial mark of Petrus de Ryedmatten de Vespia, a interlocking cross design.

record.title: Miniature of Benedictine nun kneeling before Christ.
record.note: Script: banderole text in a small Gothic bookhand.

Decoration: an example of the simple illustration style known as "nonnenarbeiten," which are devotional images produced by medieval nuns for personal use. The nun and Christ are placed in a grassy field comprised of penstrokes covered with a green wash. Details like Christ's wounds are conveyed through penstrokes as well. The instruments of the Passion are individually colored with wash: red and black for the cock, orange for the sponge, and orange for parts of the spear. An alternating blue and orange wash has been used to decorate the border of the miniature.
Binding: individually mounted on parchment.

record.title: 880-03 al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭan, khayra umam, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal man ūliya al-nubūwah wa-al-ḥukm, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muqtadīn bi-hi fī al-qaṣd wa-al-shiyam, mā dāmat al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-mā taʻāqabat al-aḍwāʼ wa-al-ẓulam. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-ʻaql wa-al-naql mutawāfiqān, wa-al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah mutaṭābiqān ..."
Secundo folio: rāḍiyah shākirah wa-hādhihi hiya al-niʻmah.
13.3 x 20.4 cm; written surface: 6.7 x 14 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In damaged marbled cardboard and brown leather spine, wrapped in blue paper bearing a lable in French for Fil de chanvre sec.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and abreviations of the references of the Ḥadīth sources in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins; text within red frames; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Ṣaḥḥāf Ḥasan Afandinin Yādkārī."

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah, taʼlīf al-Mawlá Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-maʻrūf bi-Birkilī, al-mutawaffá sanat 981. Awwaluhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻalanā ummatan wasaṭan, khayr al-umam, ilá ākhirihi. Wa-atammahu laylat al-Arbiʻāʼ, sabʻata ʻashar Shaʻbān, sanat 980, ka-mā fī Kashf al-ẓunūn."

On folio 1b: An incomplete table of contents: "ʻAn bayān fihrist Kitāb al-Ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah, li-suhūlat al-muṭālaʻah. al-Bāb al-awwal, yashtamilu ʻalá thalāthat fuṣūl, al-awwal mushtamil ʻalá nawʻayn. al-Nawʻ al-awwal: Fī al-iʻtiṣām bi-al-Kitāb al-Karīm. al-Nawʻ al-thānī: Fī al-iʻtiṣām bi-al-Sunnah. al-Faṣl al-thānī: Fī al-bidaʻ. al-Faṣl al-thālith: Fī al-iqtiṣād fī al-ʻamal."
On folio 2a: A Ḥadīth.
On folio 2b: A partial table of contents of "al-Bāb al-thālith" and a list of abreviations used in the book.

Colophon: "Tamma taṣnīfuhu, bi-ʻawnihi taʻālá wa-tawfīqih, laylat al-Arbiʻāʼ, al-sābiʻ ʻashar min Shaʻbān, min shuhūr sanat thamānīn wa-tisʻimiʼah. Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah fī awāsiṭ shahr Shawwāl, yawm Yakshanbih. al-Ḥaqīr al-faqīr al-mudhnib, al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-laṭīf, Maḥmūd ibn Ramaḍān, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Allāhumma ighfir li-man qaraʼ, wa-li-man naẓara, wa-li-man daʻā fī [ilá] kātibihi."

Translation of the colophon: "The writing of the book was completed, by the help of God and His benevolence, the night of Wednesday, 17 Shaʻbān, 980 [of the Hijrah = 2 January, 1573]. This noble copy was completed in the middle of Shawwāl, on Sunday [year not mentioned], [by] the despised, the poor, and the sinner who is in need of the mercy of his gracious Lord, Maḥmūd ibn Ramaḍān, may God forgive him and his parents. Amen. O Lord of the Universe. O God forgive him who reads the book, he who looks into it, and he who beseeches God on behalf of its writer [author/copyist]."

record.title: 880-03 al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr min Ḥadīth al-bashīr al-nadhīr : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī baʻatha ʻalá raʼs kull miʼat sanah man yujaddidu li-hādhihi al-ummah amr dīnihā, wa-aqāma fī kull ʻaṣr man yaḥūṭu hādhihi al-millah bi-tashdīd arkānihā wa-taʼyīd sunanihā wa-tabyīnihā, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, shahādatan yuzīlu al-shukūk ṣubḥ yaqīnihā, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mabʻūth li-rafʻ kalimat al-īmān wa-tashyīdihā, wa-khafḍ kalimat al-kufr wa-tawhīnihā, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, luyūth al-ghābah wa-usd ʻarīnihā. Hādhā kitābun awdaʻtu fīhi min al-kalim al-Nabawīyah ulūfan, wa-hiya 10934, wa-min al-ḥikam al-Muṣṭafawīyah ṣunūfan, iqtaṣartu fīhi min maʻādin al-athar ibrīzahu ... wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam murāʻiyan awwal al-Ḥadīth fa-mā baʻdahu, tashīlan ʻalá al-ṭullāb ..."
Secundo folio: al-adab 'Tkh' la-hu fī al-tārīkh.
15 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap (in 43 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frames.

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the beginning of each Ḥadīth and the abbreviations of the references in purple; notes on the margins; text within double frame in purple; catchwords.
On the upper left corner of folio 1a: "al-Jumlah karārīs ʻadad 43 min Jāmiʻ al-jawāmiʻ [sic] lil-Suyūṭī."

On folio 1a: "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-ṣaghīr min Ḥadīth al-bashīr al-nadhīr, li-annahu muqtaḍab min al-kitāb al-kabīr alladhī sammaytuhu Jāmiʻ al-jawāmiʻ, wa-qaṣadtu fīhi jamʻ al-Aḥādīth al-mashhūrah bi-asrihā ..."

Author's colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-zamānih, wa-waḥīd dahrih wa-awānih, al-ʻumdah al-fāḍil, khātimat al-muḥaqqiqīn wa-al-Muḥaddithīn, walī Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ Jannatih: Faraghtu minhu yawm al-Ithnayn 28 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat sabʻ wa-tisʻimiʼah min al-Hijrah al-sharīfah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-taslīm."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Its author, the learned scholar, the distinguished and unique in his time, the noble authority in his generation, the last of the prominent Ḥadith transmitters, friend of God Most High, al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, may God shelter him with his mercy, and make him dwell in His lofty Paradise, said: I finished writing the book on Monday, 28 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, the year 907 of the noble Hijrah of the Prophet [21 October, 1501], may the best of peace and the most perfect greetings be upon him."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb al-sharīf yawm al-Thalāth, ghāyat shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn tisʻah wa-sittūn [wa-sittīn], min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafw Rabbihi al-Qadīr al-Jalīl al-Mutaʻāl, turāb al-aqdām, Muṣṭafá ibn Khalīl al-Qaṭṭān. Allāhumma ighfir la-hu, wa-li-wālidayh, wa-li-ikhwānihi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, aḥyāʼan wa-amwātan, wa-li-aṣḥāb al-ḥuqūq ʻalayhi. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This noble book was copied on Tuesday, the end of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 1269 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [9 February, 1853], by the hand of the poor and despised, he who confesses his inequity and insufficiency, who hopes to be pardoned by his Mighty, Sublime and Most High Lord, the dust of feet, Muṣṭafá ibn Khalīl al-Qaṭṭān. May God forgive him, his parents, his brethren, his masters, the living among them and the dead, and they to whom he is indebted. Amen. I beseech Thee, O Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb sharḥ Jalāʼ al-qulūb : manuscript / Isʹḥāq ibn Ḥasan al-Zanjānī al-Tūqātī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-layl libāsan wa-al-nahār nushūran, wa-ʻayyana awqāt al-ʻibādah ayyāman wa-shuhūran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man muliʼa bi-hi al-ʻālam nuḍratan wa-surūran, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna kāna saʻyuhum mashkūran, kamā kāna dhālika fī al-kitāb masṭūran, mā dāma al-shahādah an yakūna madhkūran. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-jānī Isʹḥāq ibn al-Ḥasan al-Zanjānī thumma al-Tūqātī, aḥsana Allāh ḥālahumā fī al-ḥāl wa-al-ātī: Innī ishtaghaltu burhatan min al-ʻumr al-marghūb bi-tadrīs al-risālah al-musammāh bi-Jalāʼ al-qulūb, al-lāʼiq an yuqāla fī shaʼnihi kitābun naẓmuhu yaḥkī zulālan, wa-fī faḥwāhu nūrun qad talaʼlaʼa, kitābun fākhirun ka-al-durr lafẓan ... lil-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-qawī Muḥammad ibn Bīr ʻAlī al-Burkawī ... thumma sammaytuhu bi-Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb ..."
Secundo folio: al-insān maʻa anna baʻḍ al-khillān.
14 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap and brown leather spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and commentaries on the margins; some phrases underlined in red; catchwords.
On folio 2a: A date is recorded at the head of a list of items in Ottoman Turkish: "Fī 8 Ṣ [Ṣafar?] 1185 [23 May, 1771]."
At the head of folio 2b: "Hādhā Kitāb Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb sharḥ Jalāʼ al-qulūb."
Text folios 2b-145a.
On folios 145b-146b and folios 147a-148a: Quotations from Islamic law.
Folios 147a-148a are blank.
On folio 149a: A quotation from Sūrat al-Ḥujurāt (Qurʼān: Chapter 49).

On folio 149b: An ownership note: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā bayān wa-tadhkirah. Fa-innī anā al-faqīr al-gharīb al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Laṭīf, al-mulaqqab bi-Mullā Bī Būlat al-Dāghistānī al-Yakhasī [?] al-madhhab, laqad ishtariaytu hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Ḍiyāʼ al-qulūb sharḥ Jalāʼ al-qulūb bi-thalāthīn qurūshan, ay, bi-ṣawmayn [?] naqdan fiḍḍah Rūsīyah, min baldat Suways, ḥīn arūḥ ilá al-ḥajj, jaʻalahu Allāh ḥajjan mabrūran wa-ajran mawfūran. Āmīn. Sanat 1252, awākhir Shawwāl [6 February, 1837]."

On folio 149b: Fatwas on inheritance, quoted from al-ʻImādī (probably: Ḥāmid ibn ʻAlī al-ʻImādī, 1692-1758): "... min khaṭṭ Nazīr Afandī al-Bulghārī. Katabahu Muḥammad Muḥammadī al-Ḥazwakī, raḥimahu al-Bārī."
On the front of the back cover: A list of some items bought in the year 1253 (1837/1838).

Colophon: "... Tamma tabyīḍuhu bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá, fī yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, wa-huwa al-ʻishr al-tāsiʻ min al-thulth al-thānī min al-suds al-rābiʻ min al-niṣf al-thānī min al-ʻushr al-khāmis min al-ʻushr al-ʻāshir baʻda al-alf min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, ḥāmidan Allāh wa-muṣalliyan ʻalá Khātim al-Anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-atqiyāʼ wa-ṣaḥbihi ka-nujūm al-hudá. Tamma bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Wahhāb al-rashīd al-tawwāb alladhī yuwaffiqu al-ʻibād ilá jāddat al-ṣawāb wa-yaghfiru li-man ʻadala wa-janá minhā idhā tāba thumma insharaḥ. Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh."

Translation of the colophon: "... Copied, by the help of God Most High, on blessed Saturday, the ninth tenth, of the second third, of the fourth sixth, of the second half, of the fifth tenth, of the tenth ten, after one-thousand of the Hijrah of him to whom belongs nobleness and honor. Praise be to God, and may prayer be on the Seal of the Prophets, on his righteous family and his companions, the guiding stars. It is completed by the help of God the abundant giver, the guide to the right way, who accepts repentance and guides people to the true path, and forgives those who repent after committing follies. The book is completed by the help of God."

record.title: 880-02 Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻālim bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt, al-muttaṣif, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, bi-jamīʻ al-kamālāt, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, al-mukhālif lil-ḥawādith fī al-dhāt wa-al-ṣifāt, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, afḍal al-makhlūqāt, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi dhawī al-majd wa-al-karāmāt, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, nanjū bihimā min al-fitānāt. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbih Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī al-ḍaʻīf ibn Muḥammad, ghafara la-hu al-karīm al-laṭīf: Qad ṭalaba min Shaykhinā al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, man huwa lil-khiṣāl al-ḥamīdah wālī, Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Faḍālī, baʻḍ al-ikhwān kitābatan ʻalá risālatihi al-musammāh bi-Kifāyat al-ʻawām fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām, fa-adhina lī al-Shaykh fī al-kitābah ʻalayhā, fa-insharaḥa ṣadrī li-dhālik, wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-mā hunālik, fa-ʻallaqtu ʻalayhā kalimāt laṭīfah, bi-ʻibārah mustaḥsanah sharīfah, fa-jāʼat bi-ḥamd Allāh ḥāshiyah nāfiʻah wa-arjū an takūna bi-al-qabūl sāṭiʻah, wa-sammaytuhā Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām ..."
Secundo folio: anna al-murād qalb dhālika al-amar.
16.3 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In buckcram cover (in 8 numbered quires), with a green label on cover: "Ecoles Nationales de l'Egypte."

In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some of the phrases of "Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām" preceded by the word "qawluhu" (his saying) in red; markings and some headings in red; catchwords.
Folios 75-78 are blank.
On folio 1a: "Ḥāshiyat al-Imām al-fāḍil wa-al-humām al-kāmil Mawlānā al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawām. Tawḥīd. M."
On folio 1a: Ownership statement: "Fī kutubkhānat al-faqīr Aḥmad al-Hāshimī."
On folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhā Taḥqīq al-maqām ʻalá Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-yuʼkhadhu min wujūb al-irādah, ilkh, wajh al-akhdh annahu law kāna wujūd al-makhlūqāt bi-ṭarīq al-taʻlīl, aw bi-ṭarīq al-ṭabʻ, la-kāna al-ʻālam qadīman, wa-huwa lā tataʻallaqu bi-hi al-irādah, ka-mā lā tataʻallaqu bi-hi al-qudrah, wa-li-hādhā qāla al-qāʼilūn bi-intifāʼihimā ..."

record.title: 880-03 Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Shāfiʻī al-Faḍālī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-ījād, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-ʻibād, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ulī al-bahjah wa-al-rashād. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-mutaʻālī, Muḥammad ibn al-Shāfiʻī al-Faḍālī al-Shāfiʻī: Saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān an uʼallifa risālah fī al-tawḥīd, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik, nāḥiyan naḥwa al-ʻAllāmah al-Sanūsī, fī taqrīr al-barāhīn, ghayra annī ataytu bi-al-dalīl bi-jānib al-madlūl, wa-zidtuhu tawḍīḥan, li-ʻilmī bi-quṣūr hādhā al-ṭālib, fa-jāʼat, bi-ḥamd Allāh, risālatan mufīdah, wa-li-taqrīr mā fīhā mujīdah, wa-sammaytuhā 'Kifāyat al-ʻawāmm fīmā yajibu ʻalayhim min ʻilm al-kalām'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hā, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: yaqūlu bi-kifāyat al-taqlīd.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
