record.title: 880-02 Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah, jāmiʻ al-faḍāʼil wa-mūḍiḥ al-dalāʼil, baqīyat al-salaf al-ṣāliḥīn, quṭb al-ʻārifīn, ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-zāhid, al-wariʻ al-ʻābid al-taqī, shaykh al-mashāyikh Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ghānim al-Maqdisī, nafaʻa Allāh al-Islām bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalayhim min ṣāliḥ daʻawātih wa-khalawātih; Innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-jalā abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā huwa maḥjūb, wa-jalā ʻarāʼis al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd, fa-man fahim al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb ..."
Secundo folio: fa-lammā akhadhahu min nafsihi.
14.5 x 19 cm; written surface: 9.7 x 15.5 cm; 21-31 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding (in two unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: : "Hādhā kitāb Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz, lil-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah, al-muḥaqqiq, al-mudaqqiq, ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī, qaddasa Allāh taʻālá sirrahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu. Āmīn. M."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Malakahu Salīm al-ʻArabī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. M."
Folios 1b-2a are written in a different hand.

Colophon: "Tamma wa-bi-al-khayr ʻamma, laylat al-Sabt, thālith laylah khalat min shahr Ramaḍān al-mubārak, min shuhūr sanat arbaʻ wa-khamsīn baʻda al-alf, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Rabbihi al-karīm, Ibrāhīm ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-Qadīmī kunyatī, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhabī, Masjid al-Nārinj manzilī. Raḥima Allāh man daʻā lanā wa-la-hu bi-ḥusn al-khātimah, wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed, and may it be wide-spread with goodness, on Saturday night, the third night, having passed of the blessed month of Ramaḍān, 1054 [of the Hijrah = 3 November, 1644], by the hand of the poor servant, who is in need of the forgiveness of his Gracious Lord, Ibrāhīm ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-Qadīmī kunyatī, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhabī, Masjid al-Nārinj manzilī. May God have mercy upon him who beseech Him to grant us and him and all Muslims an agreeable end. Praise be God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 al-Risālah al-qudsīyah fī asrār al-nuqṭah al-ḥissīyah al-mushīrāt ilá asrār al-huwīyah al-ghaybīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Hamadhānī.
record.note: Title from the colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ẓahar bimā shāʼ li-man shāʼ, bi-mashīʼatihi al-Ilāhīyah [ṣuḥḥiḥat ilá "al-azalīyah"], wa-istatara ʻamman shāʼ bi-astār ʻizzatihi al-sarmadīyah, wa-jaʻala khaṣāʼiṣ al-nuqṭah bi-qudratihi āyah dāllah ʻalá ḥaqāʼiq aḥadīyatihi al-ghaybīyah, wa-aṭlaʻa ṭawāliʻ ḥaqāʼiqihā fī ʻālam al-raqm ʻukūsan li-shuʼūn tajalliyātihi al-dhātīyah wa-tanazzulāt āyatihi al-qudsīyah, wa-ṣayyarahā bi-ḥikmatihi huyūlá li-ṣuwar al-ḥurūf al-khaṭṭīyah wa-aʻyān al-kalimāt al-raqmīyah, thumma satarahā bi-mā aẓhara mā bi-hā minhā li-tabyīn al-dalālāt ʻalá al-umūr al-Ilāhīyah ..."
Secundo folio: jawāriḥihim bi-bisāṭ al-siyāsāt.
14.8 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 22 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings in red; some commentaries and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālah [al-Risālah] al-qudsīyah fī asrār al-nuqṭah al-ḥissīyah, lil-Shaykh al-Akbar, Sayyidī Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-ʻazīz wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī nawbat al-faqīr ilá ʻafw Mawlāh al-qadīr al-Sayyid Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-marḥūm al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá Abū al-Shāmāt fī sanat 1255 [of the Hijrah = 1839/1840], ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn."

Colophon: "... Wa-hādhā ghāyat ṭayarān al-sāʼirīn, wa-nihāyat darajāt kamāl al-ʻārifīn al-muḥaqqiqīn. Wa-bi-hā nakhtumu 'al-Risālah al-qudsīyah fī asrār al-nuqṭah al-ḥissīyah al-mushīrāt ilá asrār al-huwīyah al-ghaybīyah'. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-al-salām ʻalá man ittabaʻa al-hudá. Tammat al-Risālah." "Balagha muqābalatan".

Translation of the colophon: "... This is the extremity of the flight for the wayfarers, and the highest degrees of perfection for the knowing and discerning ones [i.e. the gnostics, the mystics and the Sufis]. In it we conclude 'al-Risālah al-qudsīyah fī asrār al-nuqṭah al-ḥissīyah al-mushīrāt ilá asrār al-huwīyah al-ghaybīyah' [Sacred epistle on the secrets of the tangible spot pointing to the esoteric identity]. Praise be to God alone. May peace be with him who follows guidance. The Epistle is completed." "The collation has ended."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Aḥmad ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī.
record.note: Title from the printed version.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-muḥaqqiq, al-mūṣil ilá ḥaḍrat al-takwīn wa-al-tamkīn, al-muḥaqqaq bi-maqāmāt al-kirām, Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Salām ibn al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Ghānim al-Maqdisī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-nawwara abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahara mā kāna maḥjūban, wa-jalā ʻan al-wujūd fī mirʼāt al-shuhūd li-man fahim al-maqṣūd wa-balagha al-maṭlūb, waffaqa man shāʼa min ʻibādihi fa-jāhada fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh.
16.2 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 12 x 17.5 cm; 23-25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings and markings in purple; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Ḥall al-rumūz wa-miftāḥ al-kunūz, lil-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, al-jāmiʻ li-ʻilm al-sharīʻah wa-asrār al-ḥaqīqah, al-quṭb al-shahīr, imām al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sayyidī al-Shaykh ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Salām, nafaʻanā [Allāh] bi-hi wa-bi-ʻulūmihi. Āmīn."
On folio 1a (in pencil): "Dalālah Qūmānī. Muḥammad Tawfīq Wajdī."
On folios 45a-46b: Quotations on prayer and "shirk" (polytheism).
Colophon (folio 45b): "Tammat al-nuskhah al-mubārakah. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min raqmihā, bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-luṭfih, qubayla ẓuhr yawm al-Ithnayn, bi-tārīkh shahr Ramaḍān al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat 1208."

Translation of the colophon: "The blessed copy is completed. Copied, by the help of God and His graciousness, before noon, on Monday, in the month of glorious Ramaḍān, the year 1208 [of the Hijrah = April]."

record.title: 880-02 Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-Kīzwānī.
record.note: Title of Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn from folio 2b.
Title of Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-maḥbūb from folio 14b.
Title of Mukhtaṣar min juzʼ fī bayān mā yalzamu al-ṭālib al-mutafaṭṭin al-ʻāzim ʻalá sulūk ṭarīq al-taṣawwuf from folio 22a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh al-ʻārif billāh wa-al-dāʻī ilayh, wa-al-murshid ilá ṭarīqihi, wa-al-dāll ʻalayh, al-Imām al-Rabbānī wa-al-ʻārif al-ṣamadānī, Nūr al-Dīn, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-shahīr bi-al-Kīzānī, amaddahu [Allāh] bi-tawfīqih, wa-ḥaqqaqahu bi-taḥqīqih, wa-mattaʻanā bi-ṭūl ḥayātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā min barakātih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ittaṣafa bi-al-baqāʼ wa-al-qidam, wa-fataqa bi-ratq al-wujūd wa-barāʼ al-nasam, wa-abraza al-mawjūdāt min al-ʻadam, wa-istakhlaṣa man shāʼa min ʻibādihi li-maʻrifatihi ʻalá murādihi bi-mā rasama wa-qasam ..."
Secundo folio of Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn: al-nuqṣān wa-ashkuruhu shukra man.

Incipit of Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-Maḥbūb: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh māniḥ ʻaṭāʼihi, wa-kāshif ghiṭāʼihi, wa-musdī ālāʼihi, wa-rāfiʻ liwāʼihi wa-awliyāʼihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá akram muballigh li-anbāʼihi wa-khātim anbiyāʼihi, wa-aʻrafihim billāh fī ẓuhūrihi wa-khafāʼih, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-aṣfiyāʼih, mā sāra li-naḥw ṭarīqihi sāʼir wa-ihtadá ilayhi bi-nūrihi ḥāʼir ..."
Secundo folio of Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-Maḥbūb: wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hi.

Incipit of Mukhtaṣar min juzʼ fī bayān mā yalzamu al-ṭālib al-mutafaṭṭin al-ʻāzim ʻalá sulūk ṭarīq al-taṣawwuf: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻārif al-muḥaqqiq, quṭb waqtihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi, Najm al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Maḥmūd ibn Saʻd Allāh al-Iṣfahānī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn: Wa-al-ḥamdu [al-Ḥamdu] lillāh ʻalá niʻamihi allatī lā tuḥṣá, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad ʻadad al-aqṣá. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna hādhā al-Mukhtaṣar min juzʼ fī bayān mā yalzamu al-ṭālib al-mutafaṭṭin al-ʻārif [al-ʻāzim] ʻalá sulūk ṭarīq al-taṣawwuf, wa-huwa ʻasharat maqāmāt mutadākhilah baʻḍuhā fī baʻḍ ..."
Secundo folio of Mukhtaṣar min juzʼ fī bayān mā yalzamu al-ṭālib al-mutafaṭṭin al-ʻāzim ʻalá sulūk ṭarīq al-taṣawwuf: mā fāta wa-mā maḍá wa-ākhiruhu.
15.2 20.5 cm; written surfaces: vary; lines per page vary.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; text within double red frames; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn, taṣnīf al-Imām al-Rabbānī wa-al-ʻārif al-ṣamadānī, Nūr al-Dīn Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad al-shahīr [bi-al-Kīzānī], nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-yalīhā Kitāb Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-Maḥbūb lil-Shaykh al-Kūrānī. Wa-yalīhā Risālah tusammá al-Juzʼ fīmā yalzamu al-ṭālib min al-ʻazam ʻalá ṭarīqat sulūk al-taṣawwuf lil-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-Iṣfahānī."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī mulk al-faqīr ʻAbduh al-Shurunbulālī ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu. Thamanuhā fiḍḍah 12."
On folio 1a: "[...] Salmān al-Bawwāb."
On folio 2b: "... wa-sammaytuhu Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn."

On folio 14a: "Kitāb fīhi al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-Rayḥān al-qulūb [fī] al-tawāṣul ilá al-Maḥbūb, lil-Shaykh al-kāmil, al-murshid, al-ghawth al-jāmiʻ, Jamāl al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Abī al-Maḥāsin Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar ibn Khiḍr al-Kūzānī [al-Kūrānī] al-Kurī [al-Kurdī?] mawlidan al-Tumayliḥī qiblatan [qabīlatan?], qaddasa Allāh sirrahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu. Āmīn. Allāhumma. Āmīn."
On folio 14b: "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-maḥbūb."
On folio 22a: "... Mukhtaṣar min juzʼ fī bayān mā yalzamu al-ṭālib al-mutafaṭṭin al-ʻāzim ʻalá sulūk ṭarīq al-taṣawwuf, lil-Shaykh Maḥmūd ibn Saʻd Allāh al-Iṣfahānī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu."
Colophon of Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn: "Wa-hādhā ākhir hādhihi al-ṭarīqah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of Zād al-masākīn ilá manāzil al-sālikīn: "This is the end of this way. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. It is completed."

Colophon of Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-Maḥbūb: "Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

Translation of the colophon of Rayḥān al-qulūb fī al-tawaṣṣul ilá al-maḥbūb: "May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant and continuous peace until Judgement Day. God suffices us, He is the best advocate. There is no power nor might except in God, the All Mighty, the All Powerful."

Colophon of Mukhtaṣar min juzʼ fī bayān mā yalzamu al-ṭālib al-mutafaṭṭin al-ʻāzim ʻalá sulūk ṭarīq al-taṣawwuf: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-ammā ādāb al-sukūn [al-sulūk] fīhā allatī ṣanīʻ [ṣanaʻa] aktharahā ahl hādhā al-zamān hiya allatī tanfaʻu al-ʻabd ʻinda Allāh taʻālá, fa-li-yaṭlubhā al-ṭālib min maʻādinihā, wa-li-yajtahid fī istiʻmālihā, li-yaṣīra bi-dhālika min jumlatihim wa-yuḥshara fī zumratihim, wa-illā fa-fāʼidat man iqtaṣara ʻalá hādhihi al-ādāb al-ẓāhirah qalīlah jiddan; waffaqanā Allāh wa-īyākum ilá istiʻmālihā istiʻmāl ādāb Rubūbīyah bi-faḍlihi wa-raḥmatih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. Tamm."

record.title: 880-02 al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadhānī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-jabbār, al-ʻazīz al-ghaffār, al-muhayymin al-sattār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, sayyid al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Abū al-Naṣr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Hamdānī [al-Hamadhānī], raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, qāl: Iʻlam anna al-Khāliq al-Bārī, jallat qudratuhu, wa-ʻalat kalimatuhu, wa-tawālat niʻamuhu, wa-tatābaʻat ālāʼuhu, zayyana al-ashyāʼ al-sabʻah, thumma zayyana al-sabʻah bi-sabʻah ukhrá, li-yaʻlama al-ʻālimūn anna al-aʻdād sabʻah [lil-aʻdād al-sabʻah] ʻinda Mālik al-ḍarr wa-al-nafʻ khaṭaran ʻaẓīman wa-maḥallan jasīman ..."
Secundo folio: sabʻa samāwāt wa-min al-arḍ.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: The twelve quires (mostly unnumbered) are kept within light brown leather cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt lil-Shaykh Muḥammad Abū al-Naṣr al-Hamadānī [al-Hamadhānī], nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn, bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb mulk Ḥaḍrat Saʻādat al-Sayyid Ḥusayn al-Khayyāṭ, kāna Allāh fī ʻawnihi wa-waffaqahu lil-khayrāt wa-al-Muslimīn, bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Kātibuhu Muḥammad al-Shaykh."
On folio 3a: "... wa-sammaytuhu Kitāb al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... qāla baʻḍ al-ʻulamāʼ: Aʻṭá Allāh taʻālá yawm al-Sabt li-Mūsá wa-li-khamsīna nabīyan mursalan maʻahu. Qāl: wa-ʻiddat al-anbiyāʼ miʼat alf wa-arbaʻah wa-ʻishrūn alfan, fa-al-rusul minhum thalāthmiʼah wa-thalāthata ʻashara nabīyan."

record.title: 880-02 Tāj al-ʻarūs : manuscript / Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī.
record.note: Title of Tāj al-ʻarūs from colophon (folio 36a).
Title of Munājah from colophon (folio 38b).
Title of Risālat al-Shaykh al-Shādhilī ilá aṣḥābihi min ahl al-Iskandarīyah supplied by cataloger.
Title of Risālat taṣawwuf from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Tāj al-ʻarūs: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-kāfirīn. Ayyuhā al-ʻabd iṭlib al-tawbah min Allāh taʻālá fī kull waqt, fa-inna Allāh qad nadabaka ilayhā, fa-qāla taʻālá: 'Wa-tūbū ilá Allāh jamīʻan ayyuhā al-muʼminūn laʻallakum tufliḥūn'. Wa-qāla taʻālá: 'Inna Allāh yuḥibbu al-tawwābīn wa-yuḥibbu al-mutaṭahhirīn'. Wa-qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: 'Innī la-astaghfiru Allāh fī al-yawm sabʻīna marratan'. Fa-in aradta al-tawbah fa-yanbaghī laka an lā takhluwa min al-tafakkur bi-ṭūl ʻumrika, fa-tufakkira mā ṣanaʻta fī nahārika, fa-in wajadta ṭāʻatan fa-ushkur Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhā, wa-in wajadta maʻṣiyatan fa-wabbikh nafsaka ʻalá dhālika wa-istaghfir Allāh wa-tub ilayhi ..."
Secundo folio of Tāj al-ʻarūs: wa-mā wajadta min ghayr dhālika.

Incipit of Munājāh: "Munājātuhu, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi: Ilāhī anā al-faqīr fī ghināʼī, fa-kayfa lā akūnu faqīran fī faqrī. Wa-anā al-jahūl fī ʻilmī, fa-kayfa lā akūnu jahūlan fī jahlī. Ilāhī minnī mā yalīqu bi-karamī, wa-minka mā yalīqu bi-karamika. In ẓaharat al-maḥāsinu minnī fa-bi-faḍlika, wa-laka al-minnah ʻalayya. Wa-in ẓaharat al-masāwī, fa-bi-ʻadlika wa-laka al-ḥujjah ʻalayya ..."
Secundo folio of Munājāh: aṭmaʻatnī minnatuk.

Incipit of Risālat al-Shaykh al-Shādhilī ilá aṣḥābihi min ahl al-Iskandarīyah: "Wa-mimmā kataba, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, min al-Qāhirah ilá aṣḥābihi min ahl al-Iskandarīyah: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Salām Allāh wa-raḥmatuhu ʻalá al-ikhwān al-muḥibbīn wa-al-aṣḥāb al-maḥbūbīn, ḥafiẓahum Allāh wa-tawallāhum, wa-ḥarasahum wa-raʻāhum, wa-awsaʻa ʻalayhim min faḍlihi, wa-afragha ʻalayhim min ʻaṭāʼihi wa-badhlih, wa-aḥalla qulūbahum minhu maḥalla al-muwānasah wa-al-tafahīm wa-al-mufātaḥah wa-al-takrīm ..."
Secundo folio of Risālat al-Shaykh al-Shādhilī ilá aṣḥābihi min ahl al-Iskandarīyah: ilá khidmat Allāh.

Incipit of Risālat taṣawwuf: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī daʻá al-ḥaqq ilá nafsih bi-al-āyāt wa-al-āthār al-lāʼiḥāt wa-al-sunan al-wāḍiḥāt, wa-fataḥa lahum abwāb al-karāmāt, wa-wahaba lahum sabī [sanī] al-hibāt, thumma zayyanahum bi-al-tafāḍul wa-al-darajāt, wa-farraqahum fī al-aḥwāl wa-al-maqāmāt, fa-kullun yasʻá ilayhi bi-raghbatihi, wa-yaʻmalu la-hu ʻalá shākilatih, ʻalá ikhtilāf al-ṭuruq wa-tafarruq al-subul ..."
Secundo folio of Risālat taṣawwuf: wa-rusūm al-laḥaẓāt fa-raʼaynā.
15 x 20.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap (in seven numbered quires); cover and flaq embossed with central medallion.
The four treatises of the codex are copied in the same hand, in fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and marking in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the preliminary page: A quotation from a certain Sayyidī Ibrāhīm ibn [...] on why God does not answer some invocations.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Tāj al-ʻarūs, li-Mawlānā al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-Shaykh Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī. Wa-yalīhā 'al-Munājāh' la-hu ayḍan. Wa-yalīhā 'Risālat al-Shaykh al-Shādhilī'. Wa-yalīhā 'Risālat taṣawwuf'."
On the upper left corner of folio 1a: "Tāj al-Dīn", probably referring to the epithet of Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī.
On folio 1a: A note by a reader: "Ḥaḍara fī hādhihi al-makān al-mubārak Muḥammad Muḥammad al-Murrī al-Balī [?], fī awāʼil shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām [...]."

On folio 1a: Two ownership notes, as follows: "Min anʻum Allāh taʻālá ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Banādiqī ṣināʻatuhu, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, al-Khalwatī, al-Wafāʼī, al-mukanná bi-Abū Mufliḥ, ibn al-marḥūm Aḥmad al-Ḥallāq, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. sanat 1147 [1734/1735]. Karārīs 6, ʻadad awrāqihi 63." "Mimmā anʻama Allāh bi-hi ʻalá kātibihi al-faqīr ʻAbduh Ibrāhīm al-Maʻrūsī, ghufira dhanbuhu."
On folio 39b: A diagram, in the form of a large magic square, in 19 columns and 19 rows, filled with letters of the Arabic Alphabet.
Some leaves seem to be missing after folio 41b.
Folio 62b is blank.
On folios 63a-063b: Quotations in poetry and prose, in a different hand.

Colophon of Tāj al-ʻarūs: "Tamma 'Tāj al-ʻarūs' lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻārif billāh, Sayyidī Tāj al-Dīn ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. In tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā."

Translation of the colophon of Tāj al-ʻarūs: "Tāj al-ʻarūs [Bride-groom's crown] of the God knowing Shaykh, Sayyidī Tāj al-Dīn ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh, is completed. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. If you were to find a blemish correct it // Mighty and Sublime is the One in whom no blemish exists."
Colophon of Munājāh: "Tammat 'al-Munājāh' bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."
Translation of the colophon of Munājāh: "al-Munājāh [the Soliloquy] is completed by the praise of God and His help. There is no power nor might except in God, the All Mighty, the All Powerful."

Colophon of Risālat al-Shaykh al-Shādhilī ilá aṣḥābihi min ahl al-Iskandarīyah: "Intahá kalām al-ʻārif billāh al-Shaykh Abī al-Ḥasan al-Shādhilī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn."

Translation of the colophon of Risālat al-Shaykh al-Shādhilī ilá aṣḥābihi min ahl al-Iskandarīyah: "The discourse of the God knowing Shaykh Abū al-Ḥasan al-Shādhilī, may God be pleased with him has ended. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace until Judgement Day."

Colophon of Risālat taṣawwuf: "Tammat. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. In tajid ʻayban fa-sudda al-khalalā // jalla man lā fīhi ʻaybun wa-ʻalā."

Translation of the colophon of Risālat taṣawwuf: "It is completed. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. If you were to find a blemish correct it // Mighty and Sublime is the One in whom no blemish exists."

record.title: 880-02 Risālah fī ʻilm al-sulūk : manuscript / Abū al-Jannāb Najm al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Kubarā.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī yaʻlamu makāyīl al-biḥār wa-mathāqīl al-jibāl, mursil al-saḥāb al-thiqāl, wa-mudabbir al-umūr, wa-muqallib al-aḥwāl, muqaddir al-arzāq wa-al-ājāl, dhī al-faḍl wa-al-ikrām wa-al-jalāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-ḥulūl wa-al-intiqāl, wa-al-ittiṣāl wa-al-infiṣāl, al-muttaṣif bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, al-muqaddas ʻan al-nuqṣān wa-al-zawāl, al-mubarr [al-mubarraʼ] min maqālat al-kufr wa-al-ḍalāl, huwa al-ḥayy, lā ilāha illā hū, al-kabīr al-mutaʻāl, laysa la-hu sharīk wa-lā mithāl ..."
Secundo folio: shiyat al-ikhrāj ilá al-ṭāghūt.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Risālah fī ʻilm al-sulūk, li-Shaykh al-waqt wa-al-ṭarīq, sulālat al-salaf al-akbar, Najm al-Dīn al-Bakrī [sic], raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn. Āmīn. M."
Colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. Tamm."
Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions. It is completed."

record.title: 880-02 Ghayth al-mawāhib al-ʻalīyah bi-Sharḥ al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafazī al-Rundī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-muʻtamid fī ghufrān dhunūbihi ʻalá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbbād al-Nafazī al-ʻArsawī [?], laṭafa Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-raḥimahu wa-ghafara la-hu. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-ʻaẓamah wa-al-jalāl, al-mutawaḥḥid bi-istiḥqāq nuʻūt al-kamāl, al-munazzah ʻan al-shurakāʼ wa-al-nuẓarāʼ wa-al-amthāl, al-mutaqaddis ʻan simāh [simāt] al-ḥadath min al-taghyīr wa-al-intiqāl wa-al-ittiṣāl wa-al-infiṣāl, ʻālim al-ghayb wa-al-shahādah, al-kabīr al-mutaʻāl, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-hādī min al-ḍalāl ..."
Secundo folio: ḥaqāʼiquhā illā bi-al-talaqqī.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding (in 23 numbered quires)
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah" and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Sharḥ al-Ḥikam li-Ibn ʻAbbād, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá raḥmatan wāsiʻah wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: Two verses of poetry, quoted from "Kitāb Ḥusn al-tanabbuh li-mā warada fī al-tashabbuh" of al-Najm al-Ghazzī (Ghazzī, Najm al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1570-1651)
On folio 1a: Two verses of "Mawwāl [a form of popular folk poetry], li-Sayyidī al-ʻārif billāh wa-Sayyid al-ʻĀrifīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī, quddisa sirruhu."

On folio 1a: Ownership statement: "Āla ilá nawbat al-ḥaqīr Muḥṣṭafá al-Ḥalabī ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAraḍī al-Ḥusaynī al-Muṭṭalibī, jammala Allāh aḥwālahu wa-min ʻatharātihi aqālahu. Fī 12 Sh. [Shʻbān/Shawwāl], 1269 [of the Hijrah = 21 May 1853 or 19 July, 1853]."
On folio 1a: Five illegible ownership statements and two illegible seals.

On folio 228a: A reader's statement: "Qad tammat qirāʼat hādhā al-kitāb al-ʻadhb al-mustaṭāb bayna al-ʻishāʼayn fī Jāmiʻ Banī Umayyah bi-Dimashq al-maḥmīyah, wa-dhālika laylat al-Khamīs al-thāniyah ʻasharī shahr Jumādá al-Thānī, sanat arbaʻah wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [28 January, 1858]. Katabahu al-faqīr Sulaymān ibn Jaʻfar Āghā, ʻufiya [ʻanh]."

On folio 228b: A reader's note: "Naẓara wa-ṭālaʻa fī hādhā al-kitāb afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajuhum ilá al-Malik al-Jawwād, al-ʻabd al-musīʼ Saʻīd ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ṭāhā ibn Yāsīn al-Qudsī, nahār al-khamsīn [?] al-Khamīs alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat iḥdā [iḥdá] wa-sittīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [Thursday, [?]1748]." Followed by invocation by him in seven verses of poetry.

Colophon (folio 228a): "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, tāsiʻ ʻashar Shaʻbān al-mubārak, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn min al-Hijrah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. M."
Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Thursday, 19 blessed Shaʻbān 1129 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [29 July, 1717], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him."

record.title: 880-02 Turjumān al-ashwāq : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī.
record.note: Title of Turjumān al-ashwāq from folio 1a.
Title of Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd from reference sources.
Title of Wasīṭat al-ʻuqūd fī madīḥ Sirr al-Wujūd from folio 26a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit of Turjumān al-ashwāq: "Kullumā adhkuruhu min ṭalalin // aw rubūʻin aw maʻānin kullumā ..."
Secundo folio of Turjumān al-ashwāq: Atarāhum salimū // am tarāhum halikū.
Incipit of Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd: "Qāla Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Durayd al-Azdī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Amā tará raʼsiya ḥāká lawnuhu // ṭurrata ṣubḥin taḥta adhyāl al-dujá ..."
Secundo folio of Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd: Arājiʻun liya al-dahru ḥawlan kāmilan.

Incipit of Wasīṭat al-ʻuqūd fī madīḥ Sirr al-Wujūd: "Wasīṭat al-ʻuqūd fī madīḥ Sirr al-Wujūd, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, li-dhī al-ṣināʻatayn, al-shiʻr [wa-al-nathr], Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Qāsim al-Khallūf al-Mālikī al-Tūnisī al-Ḥimyarī, raḥimahu Allāh: Raʼá al-fajru taʻbīsa al-dujá fa-tabassamā // wa-ṣāfaḥa azhāra al-rubā fa-tanassamā ..."
Secundo folio of Wasīṭat al-ʻuqūd fī madīḥ Sirr al-Wujūd: "Wa-hal dhuqtumā kāsāti ḥubbin sharibtuhā."

Incipit of Miscellaneous poems by Ibn Khallūf: "Wa-saṭṭara ʻalá ẓahrihā qawluhu: Iqbal hadīyat mādiḥin mutashffiʻin // yā khayra mamdūḥin wa-akrama shāfiʻi. Wa-irḥam fa-inna maṭāmiʻī bi-ka ʻulliqat // fa-amnin wa-ḥaqqiq bi-al-qabūli maṭāmiʻī ..."
Secundo folio of Miscellaneous poems by Ibn Khallūf: Min aqāḥi al-thaghri min miski al-lamā.
13 x 19.7 cm; written surface: varies; 19-23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap.

The four manuscripts are copied in the same hand, in good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; numerous notes on the margins and interlinear; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Turjumān al-ashwāq lil-Shaykh al-Akbar, quṭb al-muwaḥḥidīn, Muḥyī al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻArabī al-Andalusī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: A quotation from Ibn al-ʻArabī about the virtues of "Laylat al-qadr" (Night of Destiny).

At the head of Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd: "Wa-fī baʻḍ al-nusakh hādhā al-bayt, mulḥaq fī awwal hādhihi al-qaṣīdah, wa-huwa [written in red]: Yā ẓabyatan ashbaha shayʼin bi-al-mahā // rātiʻatan bayn al-ʻAqīqi fa-al-Liwá."
At the end of the poem of Ibn Khallūf (folio 34b), on the left margin is written the number "327" which is the total number of the verses of the poem.
Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd ends with: "... Aw an urá mukhtaḍiʻan li-nakbatin // aw li-ibtihājin faraḥan aw muzdahá."
Colophon of Turjumān al-ashwāq: No colophon. The poem ends with: Fa-in tabaddā fa-lā najmun wa-lā qamaru // yalūḥu fī al-falaki al-ʻulwīyi murtasimā."
Colophon of Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd: "Tammat al-Maqṣūrah bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn."

Tranaslation of the colophon of Maqṣūrat Ibn Durayd: "The Maqṣūrah is completed by the praise of God and His help. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace until Judgement Day."

Colophon of Wasīṭat al-ʻuqūd fī madīḥ Sirr al-Wujūd. No colophon. The poem ends with: "... Saʼaltuka bi-al-Hādī ajib daʻawātiya // wa-jud bi-mā artajī yā Mālika al-Arḍi wa-al-Samā. Wa-munna bi-ʻitqi Ibni al-Khalūfi wa-jāzihi // bi-jūdika fī al-dārayni wa-irḥam takarrumā. Wa-sāmiḥ wa-naʻʻim wālidayya taṭawwulan // wa-lā tuḥriq Allāhumma bi-al-nāri Muslimā. Wa-ṣalli ʻalá al-Mukhtāri wa-al-ṣaḥbi kullamā // raʼá al-fajru taʻbīsa al-dujá fa-tabassamā."

Colophon of Miscellaneous poems by Ibn Khallūf: No colophon. Ends with: Ka-anna al-nujūma khilāla al-dujá // mashībun bi-fawdin aḍā wa-intashar. Awi al-durr fī ṣaḥni fayrūzajin // awi al-ghīdu arkhat musūḥ al-shaʻar. Awi al-mawju fī lujji baḥrin ṭamā // awi al-zahru fī al-rawḍi ghibba al-maṭar."

record.title: 880-02 al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ al-barīyāt : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAyn al-Quḍāh al-Hamadhānī.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Malik al-jabbār, al-ʻazīz al-muhayymin al-sattār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻala al-Nabī al-Mukhtār, Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-abrār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-amājid al-akhyār, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mutalāzimayn mā taʻāqaba al-layl wa-al-nahār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb al-Sabʻīyāt fī mawāʻiẓ Rabb al-Barīyāt. Fa-qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-mufrad Abū al-Naṣr Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Hamdānī [al-Hamadhānī], raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh: Iʻlam anna al-Khāliq al-Bārī, jallat qudratuhu, wa-ʻalat kalimatuhu, wa-tawālat ilāhīyatuh, wa-tazāyadat naʻmāʼuhu, zayyana al-ashyāʼ al-sabʻah bi-al-ashbāh al-sabʻah, thumma zayyana tilka al-sabʻah bi-sabʻah ukhrá, li-yaʻlama al-ʻālimūn anna al-aʻdād [lil-aʻdād] ʻinda Mālik al-ḍarr wa-al-nafʻ khaṭaran ʻaẓīman wa-maḥallan jasīman ..."
Secundo folio: tawfīqī illā billāh ʻalayhi tawakkaltu.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 12 x 17 cm; 19-25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in four unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; the first quire is written in a different hand (19 lines per page); catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Sabʻīyāt ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-ṣalla [wa-ṣallá] Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatih yawm al-Khamīs, ghurrata Ramaḍān, sanat 1273, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Ghunaym Salāmah al-Talbānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-yasʼalu man qaraʼa fīhi al-Fātiḥah. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "It was completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Copied on Thursday, the beginning of Ramaḍān, 1273 [of the Hijrah = 25 April, 1857], by the hand of the poor to God Most High, Ghunaym Salāmah al-Talbānī, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims. He requests who reads it to recite [Sūrat] al-Fātiḥah on his behalf. There is no power nor might except in God, the Most High, the All Powerful. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, and on his family and his companions, and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ḥikam asrāruhā jalīyah wa-anwāruhā qaṣīyah, li-quṭb al-ʻārifīn wa-imām al-muḥaqqiqīn, Tāj al-Dīn, Abū al-ʻAbbās, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Min ʻalāmāt al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ʻamal nuqṣān al-rajāʼ ʻinda wujūd al-zalal. Irādatuka al-tajrīd maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāka fī al-asbāb min al-shahwah al-khafīyah, wa-irādatuka al-asbāb maʻa iqāmat Allāh īyāk fī al-tajrīd inḥiṭāṭ ʻan al-himmah al-ʻalīyah ..."
Secundo folio: dalīl ʻalá inṭimās al-baṣīrah mink.
15.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap.
In crude naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some commentaries on the margins; some markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi ḥikam asrāruhā jalīyah wa-aswāruhā qaṣīyah, li-quṭb al-ʻārifīn wa-dāʼirat al-muḥaqqiqīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Sakandarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Marṣifī al-Shalabī, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn [1228 lil-Hijrah = 1813]. Ghafara Allāh li-man ṭālaʻa fīhā wa-qaraʼa lahā al-Fātiḥah, jaʻalahu Allāh min al-maqbūlīn al-fāʼizīn bi-jannāt al-naʻīm, bi-barakat ʻImrān ibn Ḥuṣayn [ʻImrān ibn al-Ḥuṣayn, -672, min ʻulamāʼ al-Ṣaḥābah], raḍiya Allāh tabāraka wa-taʻālá ʻanhu."

Text ends with "... Maḥaqta al-āthār wa-maḥawta al-aghyār bi-muḥīṭāt aflāk al-anwār, Yā Man iḥtajaba fī surādiqāt ʻizzihi ʻan an tudrikahu al-abṣār, Yā Man tajallá bi-kamāl bahāʼihi fa-taḥaqqaqat ʻaẓamatuhu fī al-qulūb wa-al-asrār. Kayfa takhfá, wa-Anta al-ẓāhir? Am, kayfa taghību, wa-Anta al-raqīb al-ḥāḍir [...]."
Colophon: "Tamma wa-kamula ʻalá yad al-faqīr [...]. Tamma, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl."
Translation of the colophon: "Ended and completed by the hand of the poor [...]. It is completed. Praise be to God in all circumstances."

record.title: 880-02 Fī bayān al-sayr ilá Allāh : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā wa-Shaykhunā al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-humām, al-ruḥalah al-awḥad al-amjad, murabbī al-ṭālibīn, maljaʼ al-qāṣidīn, ṣāḥib al-taḥqīqāt al-nafīsah, wa-muẓhir al-tadqīqāt al-gharībah, Shihāb al-Dīn Abū al-Barakāt Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr al-ʻAdwī al-Mālikī: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ṭahhara qulūb aḥbābihi min ẓulm al-ghiyār, wa-nawwara baṣāʼirahum bi-luṭf al-maʻārif wa-lawāmiʻ al-asrār, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal al-akhyār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-sādah al-abrār. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi nubdhah laṭīfah Fī bayān al-sayr ilá Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, jaʻaltuhā tabṣirah li-ikhwānī wa-tadhkirah li-khullānī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-man yatawakkalu ʻalá Allāh fa-Huwa ḥasbuhu.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 22-23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires)
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.
Folio 18 is blank.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālah fī qawāʻid al-ṭarīq, taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Shaykhunā Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Dardīr, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi dunyā wa-ukhrá. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. M."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī mulk al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ʻAbduh al-Shurunbulālī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī khirqatan, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, tilmīdh muʼallifihi, aṭāla Allāh baqāhu, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Author's colophon: "Wa-fī hādhā al-qadr kifāyah, wa-Allāh yatawallá al-ʻināyah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, wa-la-hu al-ḥamd wa-al-niʻmah, wa-al-tawfīq wa-al-ʻiṣmah, yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, min shahr Ramaḍān, sanat 1198, wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Translation of the author's colophon: "What was introduced is sufficient. God will be in charge. Praise be to God and that is enough. May His peace be upon His worshipers whom He has chosen. It was completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Praise, grace, success and infallibility are His. On blessed Monday, [the beginning] of the month of Ramaḍān, the year 1198 [of the Hijrah = 19 July, 1784]. God is more knowledgeable."

record.title: 880-02 al-Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr ʻalá Aqrab al-masālik ilá madhhab al-Imām Mālik : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.
record.note: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá kitābinā al-musammá bi-'Aqrab al-masālik li-madhhab al-Imām Mālik', iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá bayān maʻānī alfāẓih li-yashula fahmuhu ʻalá al-mubtadiʼīn wa-sharḥuhu wa-qirāʼatuhu li-man shāʼa bi-mashīʼat Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, fa-aqūlu, wa-bi-hi astaʻīn: Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-munkasir al-fuʼād min al-taqṣīr Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr ..."
Secundo folio: wa-kān kathīr al-sukūt lā yatakallamu.
16.5 x 23.7 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: The twenty-five unnumbered quires of the codex are placed in dark brown cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "Aqrab al-masālik ilá madhhab al-Imām Mālik" in red; numerous notes on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā li-Sharḥ [al-Sharḥ] al-ṣaghīr al-Dardīr [lil-Dardīr], nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn, bi-jāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Sayyid al-Awwalīn wa-al-Ākharīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."
On folio 2a: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-Dardīr."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-juzʼ yawm al-Jumʻah al-mubārakah, sabʻah wa-ʻishrīn khalat min shahr Shawwāl al-mubārak, sanat 1292 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ... ʻalá yad kātibihi wa-mālikihi al-dhalīl ʻabduh Muḥammad ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Nūbī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-wālid wālidayhi wa-wālidayhi, wa-al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt, Innka qarīb mujīb al-daʻawāt, Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this part was completed on blessed Friday, twenty-seven [nights] having passed from the blessed month of Shawwāl, the year 1292 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [26 November, 1875], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him ... by the hand of its copyist and owner, His servant, Muḥammad ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Nūbī, may God forgive him, his parents, the fathers of his parents, and their parents, and Muslim men and women, the living among them and the dead. You are near and answers prayers, O Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 Bidāyat al-hidāyah : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-jalīl, al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh: Ammā baʻd, fa-iʻlam ayyuhā al-ḥarīṣ ʻalá iqtibās al-ʻilm, al-muẓhir min nafsihi ṣidq al-raghbah wa-farṭ al-taʻaṭṭush ilayh, innaka in kunta taqṣidu ṭalaba al-ʻilm lil-munāfasah wa-al-mubāhāt [wa-al-mubāhāh] wa-al-taqaddum ʻalá al-aqrān wa-al-istimālah [wa-istimālat] wujūh al-nās wa-jamʻ ḥuṭām al-dunyā, fa-anta sāʻin fī hadm dīnik wa-halāk nafsik wa-bayʻ ākhiratika bi-dunyāk, fa-ṣafqatuka khāsirah, wa-tijāratuka bāʼirah, wa-muʻallimuka muʻīn ʻalá ʻiṣyānika, wa-sharīkun laka fī khusrānika ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qaṣduhu an yurawwija ʻalayka al-sharr.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires)
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Bidāyat al-hidāyah lil-Shaykh al-Imām, Ḥujjat al-Islām, Abī Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
On folio 27b: An ownership statement: "Fī nawbat al-faqīr Ibrāhīm Ḥijāzī ibn Muḥammad Ghīdah."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kamāl hādhā al-kitāb ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-laṭīf, ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn Aḥmad al-Shāfiʻī, khādim al-ʻilm al-sharīf wa-al-Sharīʻah al-muṭahharah, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, fī tāsiʻ ʻashar Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat 1035, sanat khams wa-thalāthīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah, khatamahā Allāh bi-khayr."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this book was completed by the hand of the poor servant, who hopes for the forgiveness of his Gracious Lord, ʻAbd al-Laṭīf ibn Aḥmad al-Shāfiʻī, servant of the noble science and the immaculate Sharīʻah, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims, on 19 Muḥarram, the year 1035 of the Hijrah [21 October, 1625], may God ends it well."

record.title: John Quincy Adams Carter and Charles E. Maurice letter book : print and manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 al-Tibr al-masbūk fī naṣīḥat al-mulūk : manuscript / Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá inʻāmih wa-ifḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-aṣḥābihi wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-innahu saʼalanī baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn min al-kubarāʼ an anqula hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa 'Kitāb Naṣīḥat al-mulūk' min al-lughah al-Fārisīyah ilá al-alfāẓ al-ʻArabīyah, fa-imtathaltu dhālik, wa-naqaltuhu ʻalá tartībihi wa-ṣūratih, wa-lam ughayyir shayʼan min waḍʻ al-kitāb wa-ṣifatih, wa-ijtahadtu fī tashīl ʻibārātih wa-īḍāḥ ishārātih ..."
Secundo folio: bi-qadr mā balaghathu balāghatuh.
16.5 x 30 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 24.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap (in 15 quires, some numbered)
In beautiful naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; few notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Tibr al-masbūk fī naṣīḥat al-mulūk, li-Ḥujjat al-Islām, al-Imām al-Shaykh, Abī Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazzālī al-Ṭūsī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Ibrāhīm al-ʻUbaydī al-Mālikī al-Muqrī al-Ḥasanī, ʻufiya ʻanhu, sanat 1217 [1802/1803], alf wa-miʼatayn wa-sabʻah wa-ʻashr. Wa-al-thaman 14, 1000."
On folio 148b: "Wa-min ... ... ... waladī sanat 1262 [1845/1846]. Muḥammad Durūsī."

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd al-Malik al-Wahhāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh alldhī tatimmu bi-niʻmatihi al-ṣāliḥāt. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr al-barīyāt, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā wa-Nabīyinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-Sādāt, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ʻadad al-awqāt wa-al-sāʻāt, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-Mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naql hādhā al-kitāb fī ghurrat shahr Allāh al-ḥarām, Dhī al-Qaʻdah, alladhī huwa min shuhūr <shuhūr> sanat 1215, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-khamsat ʻashar min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the praise of the Abundant Giving King. Praise be to God in Whose grace good things are accomplished. May prayer and peace be upon the Best of Mankind, our Master, Leader and Prophet, Muḥammad, Master of Masters, and on His family and companions, number of times and hours. May peace be upon the Messengers. Praise be God Lord of the Universe. Amen. This book was copied at the beginning of God's sacred month, Dhī al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1215 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [16 March, 1801], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him."

record.title: Treatises on astronomy and astrology : manuscript.
record.note: 1. Title of Astronomical treatise supplied by cataloger.
2. Title of al-Anjum al-zāhirāt fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt from folios 5a/5b.
3. Title of Uṣūl ṣināʻat al-aḥkām from folio 10a.
4. Title of al-Shihābīyah fī al-rubʻ bi-al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah from folio 55a.
5. Title of Awfāq ʻadadīyah in Ottoman Turkish supplied by cataloger.
6. Title of Astronomical treatise and charts supplied by cataloger.
7. Title of Maʻrifat amākin al-kawākib wa-ḥarakātihā from folio 83a.
8. Title of Sharḥ al-Ruznāmah al-Wafāʼīyah from folio 90b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

1. Incipit of Astronomical treatise: The beginning is missing, starts with: "... al-mabsūṭah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. al-Bāb 6. Fī maʻrifat al-aṣl al-ḥaqīqī. Ḍaʻ al-khayṭ ʻalá al-sittīnī wa-ʻallim ʻalá jayb tamām al-ʻirḍ, thumma unqul al-khayṭ ilá tamām al-mayl, fa-mā ḥāzahu al-mary min al-juyūb al-mabsūṭah fa-huwa al-aṣl al-ḥaqīqī, wa-yusammá al-aṣl al-muṭlaq. Wa-Allāh aʻlam ..."
Secundo folio of Astronomical treatise: Tanbīh. Fa-in nazalta bi-al-qāmah.

2. Incipit of al-Anjum al-zāhirāt fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ʻalá kullī [kull] ḥāl, wa-naʻūdhu billāh min aḥwāl ahl al-nār, wa-al-ṣalāt [al-ṣalāh] wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-mukhtār, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-ṭayyibīn al-akhyār, mā habba nasīm ʻalá wa-raq al-ashjār ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah mukhtaṣarah nāfiʻah, wa-hiya inshāʼa [in shāʼa] Allāh taʻālá lil-murād jāmiʻah. Sammaytuhā 'al-Anjum al-zaharāt [al-zāhirāt] fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt', mushtamilah ʻalá muqaddimah wa-ʻasharāt [wa-ʻashrat] abwāb ..."
Secundo folio of al-Anjum al-zāhirāt fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt (folios 5a-9b): khaṭṭā al-fajr wa-al-shafaq ka-qaws al-ʻaṣr.

3. Incipit of Title of Uṣūl ṣināʻat al-aḥkām: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī illā [billāh]. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, fa-qad qāla [Kūshyār] ibn Labbān ibn Bāshahr al-Jīlī: Innī jamaʻtu fī hādhā al-kitāb min 'Uṣūl ṣināʻat al-aḥkām' wa-jumalihā wa-al-ṭarīq ilá [al-taṣarruf] fīhā wa-istiʻmālihā, mā ẓanantuhu kāfiyan mughniyan fī akthar al-amr ʻammā siwāh, wa-akhadhtu fīhi aqrab ṭarīq ʻaraftuhu ... wa-jaʻaltuhu yashtamilu ʻalá arbaʻ maqālāt: al-Ūlá minhā fī al-madkhal wa-al-uṣūl, wa-al-thāniyah fī al-ḥukm ʻalá umūr al-ʻālam, wa-al-thālithah fī al-ḥukm ʻalá al-mawālīd wa-taḥwīl sinīyihā, wa-al-rābiʻah fī al-ikhtiyārāt. Wa-saʼaltu Allāh al-rushd wa-al-hidāyah wa-al-tawfīq wa-al-kifāyah. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio Uṣūl ṣināʻat al-aḥkām: wa-qad taqaddama lanā fīhi kitābān.

4. Incipit of al-Shihābīyah fī al-rubʻ bi-al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah: "Kitāb al-Shihābīyah fī al-rubʻ bi-al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah, taʼlīf al-Ustādh al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq al-Shaykh Badr al-Dīn Sibṭ al-Mārdānī [al-Mārdīnī], ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá bi-khafī luṭfihi, wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-Shaykh Badr al-Dīn al-Maridānī [al-Mardīnī]: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi 'Risālah fī al-ʻamal bi-al-rubʻ al-mujayyab', mushtamilah ʻalá muqaddimah wa-ʻishrīn bāban ..."
Secundo folio of al-Shihābīyah fī al-rubʻ bi-al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah: lahā fī al-jihah wa-khudh al-faṣl.
5. Incipit of Awfāq ʻadadīyah: "Wifq ... Lā yaʻlamu al-ghayb illā Allāh ..."
Secundo folio of Awfāq ʻadadīyah: sāyildar.

6. Incipit of Astronomical treatise and charts: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ, wa-jaʻala fīhā asrājan wa-qamaran munīran, wa-qaddara dawarān al-aflāk fīhā bi-qudratihi taqdīran, wa-zayyanā bi-al-kawākib al-thābitah wa-al-sayyārah tafḍīlan wa-tayassuran [wa-taysīran], wa-alhama man shāʼa maʻrifat [maʻrifah] dhālika minnatan wa-tayassuran [wa-taysīran], wa-ʻaqaba al-layl al-nahār wa-al-nahār al-layl, fa-humā yataʻāqabān aʻṣāran wa-duhūran ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā, ʻayn ʻuyūn al-ʻaqāʼid wa-al-jāmiʻ lil-farāʼid wa-al-fawāʼid, ḥaysūb zamānih, wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, al-Shaykh al-ʻaysūb ʻAbd al-laṭīf ibn Ibrāhīm al-Kayyāl al-Admawī [al-Umawī], ʻalā [aʻlā] Allāh fī al-dārayn darajātih wa-asbagha ʻalayhi niʻamahu wa-hibātih, man bi-ṣafāʼ fahmihi lakhkhaṣa bi-al-dhakāʼ al-zāʼid, muqtafiyan athar al-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shāṭir [al-Īḍāḥ (?)], raḥimahu Allāh, ḥasabahu sanat 751 [ilá] sanat 851. Wa-al-jadwal al-thānī lil-Shaykh Shams al-Dīn al-Tīzīnī, raḥimahu Allāh, ḥasabahu min sanat 851 ilá sanat 1000 Hijrīyah, wa-qad qāraba an tafragha, fa-aradtu an aḥsuba jadwalan, ziyādat ʻalá al-alf, li-anna aghlab al-nās yaqūlūn: Inna al-dunyā lā tuʼallif ..."
Secundo folio of Astronomical treatise and charts: awāʼil Ādhār. al-Thāmin ʻashar.

7. Incipit of Maʻrifat amākin al-kawākib wa-ḥarakātihā: "Hādhihi risālat taḥtawī ʻalá Maʻrifat amākin al-nujūm wa-ḥarakātihā wa-mā yalīqu an yudhkara maʻahā min al-tawārīkh, wa-istikhrāj baʻḍihi min baʻḍ, wa-ghayr dhālik. Wa-qasamtuhā ilá arbaʻat fuṣūl: al-Faṣl al-awwal fī al-tawārīkh wa-mā yalīqu an yudhkara maʻahā. al-Faṣl al-thānī fī ḥarakāt al-kawākib wa-mā yalīqu an yudhkara maʻahā. al-Faṣl al-thālith fīmā yatarattabu ʻalá al-ḥarakāt min al-aʻmāl. al-Faṣl al-rābiʻ fī muqaddimah ḥisābīyah yustaʻānu bi-hā ʻalá al-aʻmāl ..."
Secundo folio of Maʻrifat amākin al-kawākib wa-ḥarakātihā: famā baqiya fa-huwa muddat mā bayna al-tārīkhayn.

8. Incipit of Sharḥ al-Ruznāmah al-Wafāʼīyah: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-Ruznāmah al-Wafāʼīyah al-dāllah ʻalá maʻrifat al-ashhur al-Rūmīyah wa-al-Qibṭīyah wa-al-ʻArabīyah, wa-kam qaṭʻ al-Shams fī al-burūj min darajah, wa-matá tanzilu fīhā laylan aw nahāran ..."
Secundo folio of Sharḥ al-Ruznāmah al-Wafāʼīyah: "Barmahāt Ādhār Ḥamal.
14 x 20.2 cm; written surface varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh and ruqʻah scripts, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 10a: Popular medicinal recipes.
At the head of folio 90b: An anecdote about the causes of the earthquake.
On folios 97a-97b: Astronomical charts.
On folio 98a: Quotations from Arabic poetry and prose.
On folios 98b-101b: Astronomical charts.
At the head of the circular chart on folio 101a, in a crude hand: "Kitāb ʻilm al-Falak, taʼlīf al-ʻĀlim Muḥammad Dirghām [could not be identified]."
1. Colophon of Astronomical treatise: "Hādhā ākhir al-risālah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam wa-aḥkam. Tammat hādhihi al-risālah."
Translation of the colophon of Astronomical treatise: "This is the end of the treatise. God has more knowledge and wisdom. This treatise is completed."
2. Colophon of al-Anjum al-zāhirāt fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam wa-aḥsan. Tammat ʻalá yadī."

Translation of the colophon of al-Anjum al-zāhirāt fī al-ʻamal bi-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt (folios 5a-9b): "God, may He be praised and glorified, is more knowledgeable and He is the best. Completed by my hand."

3. Colophon of Uṣūl ṣināʻat al-aḥkām: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... al-Thānī ʻashar an yakūna fī al-ṭāliʻ, fa-innahu yadullu ʻalá sūʼ al-khulq wa-al-shaqāʼ wa-kathrat al-aʻdāʼ min afʻālihi al-khabīthah, wa-fī al-thānī yaʻmalu ʻamalan yastaḥī minhu wa-yakūnu sayyiʼ al-ḥāl, radīʼ al-maʻīshah, ʻadūwan li-mālihi in kāna min arbāb al-amwāl, wa-fī al-thālith yuʻādīhi ikhwatuhu wa-yalqá minhum shiddah, wa-fī al-rābiʻ yuʻādīhi al-ab wa-al-ahl wa-al-malik wa-kull mā yataʻallaq bi-al-rābiʻ, wa-fī al-khāmis yubghiḍuhu waladuhu wa-yuʻādūn [wa-yuʻādūnahu] wa-yasūʼu ḥāluhu maʻahum, wa-fī al-sādis yaḥzanu [yakhzá?] min al-mamālīk ..."

4. Colophon of al-Shihābīyah fī al-rubʻ bi-al-aʻmāl al-jaybīyah: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... al-Bāb al-thālith ʻashar. Fī maʻrifat siʻat al-mashriq wa-siʻat al-maghrib. Ḍaʻ al-khayṭ ʻalá al-sittīnī, wa-ʻallim ʻalá jayb tamām al-ʻirḍ, thumma ḥarrik al-khayṭ ḥattá yaqaʻa al-marī ʻalá jayb al-mayl, fa-mā qaṭaʻa al-khayṭ min awwal al-qaws fa-huwa al-siʻah, wa-in shiʼta fa-ḍaʻ al-khayṭ ʻalá tamām al-ʻirḍ min ..."
5. Colophon of Awfāq ʻadadīyah: No colophon. Text ends with "... ḥāṣil aw lā bi-idhni Allāh. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."
6. Colophon of Astronomical treatise and charts: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Taḥrīran fī shahr Ṣafar al-muẓaffar, sanat wāḥid wa-arbaʻīn baʻda al-alf."
Translation of the colophon of Astronomical treatise and charts: "God is more knowledgeable. Written on the glorious month of Ṣafar, the year 1041 [of the Hijrah = August/September, 1631]."
7. Colophon of Maʻrifat amākin al-kawākib wa-ḥarakātihā: No colophon. Text ends with: "Fa-hādhā mā yuḥtāju ilayhi min al-aʻyād. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."
8. Colophon of Sharḥ al-Ruznāmah al-Wafāʼīyah: No colophon. Text ends with astronomical charts.

record.title: Helen Dinsmore scrapbook : typescript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shirbīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a (first part).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of the first part: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī nashara lil-ʻulamāʼ aʻlāman, wa-thabbata lahum ʻalá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm aqdāman, wa-jaʻla maqām al-ʻilm aʻlā maqām, wa-faḍḍala al-ʻulamāʼ bi-iqāmat al-ḥujaj al-dīnīyah wa-maʻrifat al-aḥkām, wa-awdaʻa al-ʻārifīn laṭāʼif sirrih fa-hum ahl al-muḥāḍarah wa-al-ilhām, wa-waffaqa al-ʻāmilīn li-khidmatih fa-hajarū ladhīdh al-manām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-qarīb al-mujīb Muḥammad al-Shirbīnī al-Khaṭīb: Inna Mukhtaṣar al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah Shihāb al-Dunyā wa-al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Aḥmad al-Iṣfahānī, al-shahīr bi-Abī Shujāʻ, al-musammá Ghāyat al-ikhtiṣār, lammā kāna min abdaʻ mukhtaṣar fī al-fiqh ṣunnif, wa-ajmaʻ mawḍūʻ la-hu fīhi ʻalá miqdār ḥajmih ulluf, iltamasa minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya, al-mutaraddidīn ilayy, an aḍaʻa ʻalayhi sharḥan yūḍiḥu mā ashkala minh ..."
Secundo folio of the first part: taʻālá an yajʻala hādhā al-kitāb ʻumdatan.

Incipit of the second part: "Kitāb bayān aḥkām al-farāʼiḍ wa-al-waṣāyā. al-Farāʼiḍ jamʻ farīḍah, bi-maʻná mafrūḍah, ay, muqaddarah, limā fīhā min al-sihām al-muqaddarah, fa-ghalabat ʻalá ghayrihā. Wa-al-farḍ lughatan al-taqdīr, li-qawlihi, taʻālá 'fa-niṣfu mā faraḍtum', ay, qaddartum. Wa-sharʻan, naṣīb muqaddar sharʻan lil-wārith ..."
Secundo folio of the second part: baʻda mawt muwarrithihi wa-law bi-laḥẓah.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 15.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a (first part): "Kitāb al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, ʻumdat al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn, Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Khaṭīb al-Shirbīnī al-Shāfiʻī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 1a (first part): An illegible seal.
On folio 1a (second part): "al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Sharḥ al-Khaṭīb al-Shirbīnī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, ʻalá Abī Shujāʻ. Awwalan."
On folio 1a (second part): "Yanquṣu hādhā al-juzʼ waraqah 12 [This part lacks 12 leaves]."
The second part starts with: "Kitāb al-Farāʼiḍ wa-al-waṣāyā" (Book on Inheritances and wills).

Colophon of the first part: "Tamma al-niṣf al-awwal min sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Khaṭīb al-Shirbīnī ʻalá Abī Shujāʻ, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātih, wa-aʻāda ʻalayya wa-ʻalá wālidayya min ṣāliḥ daʻawātih, bi-jāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih wa-afḍālih. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, sanat [?] baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

Translation of the colophon of the first part: "The first part of the commentary of the learned scholar al-Khaṭīb al-Shirbīnī on Abū Shujāʻ is completed. May God benefit us by his blessings, and bestow upon us and upon our parents his righteous invocations, by the intercession of our Master Muḥammad and His family and by His favors. God suffices us. He is the best advocate. In the year [?] after one thousand, of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best prayer and peace be upon Him."

Colophon of the second part: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam. Wa-hādhā ākhir mā yassarahu Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, min al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ, ghafara Allāh li-muṣannifihi wa-shāriḥihi wa-kātibihi wa-qārīhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak yawm al-Thalāth al-mubārak, rābiʻ ʻishrīn min shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-arbaʻ wa-arbaʻīn baʻda al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Mawlāhu al-karīm al-jawwād, al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-mutʻarif [al-muʻtarif] bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Duwaydār Salāmah, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Damyīn [al-Dumaynī (?)] baladan, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man qaraʼ fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of the second part: "God, may He be praised and glorified, is more knowledgeable. This is the end of what God, may He be praised and glorified, facilitated of 'al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ'. May God forgive its author, its commentator, its copyist, its reader and all Muslims. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. The copying of this blessed book was completed on blessed Tuesday, 24 of Ṣafar, 1144 of the Hirah of the Prophet [28 August, 1731], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him, by the hand of the poorest of the servants to his generous and benevolent Lord, the poor and despised, who admits his inability and insufficiency, Duwaydār Salāmah, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Damyīn [al-Dumaynī (?)] baladan, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, may God forgive him and his parents and he who reads it and invokes [God] to forgive him. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ḥikam al-ʻirfānīyah wa-al-ishārāt al-Qurʼānīyah : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Muttaqī al-Hindī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, Khātim al-Anbiyāʼ wa-al-Mursalīn, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi 'Ḥikam ʻirfānīyah fī maʻānin irshādīyah wa-ishārāt Qurʼānīyah'. Kull ḥikmah minhā muʼayyadah bi-āyah aw baʻḍihā; bayna al-āyah wa-al-ḥikamah munāsabah lā yakhfá [lā takhfá] ʻalá al-mutaʼammil, lākin lā yudriku ladhdhat dhālik ʻalá wajh al-kamāl illā ḥāfiẓ al-āyāt wa-man la-hu ilmām bi-tafsīrihā, wa-ḥaẓẓ min ʻulūm al-ishārāt; fa-innī adhkuru baʻḍ al-āyah wa-atruku mā baʻdahā, iʻtimādan ʻalá ḥifẓ al-ṭālib ..."
Secundo folio: aghtanimu al-ʻumr wa-al-furṣah.
17.5 x 25.5 cm; written surface: 7-11.5 x 20 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Ḥikam al-ʻirfānīyah wa-al-ishārāt al-Qurʼānīyah lil-ʻAllāmah ʻAlī al-Muttaqī, raḥimahu Allāh."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Malakahu al-faqīr ilayhi [...] ʻAbd al-Ghanī Qārī Zādah [... ... ...]."

Colophon: "Majmūʻ al-ḥikam naḥwa khamsimiʼah. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min nisākhatihi yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, tāsiʻ ʻashar min al-Muḥarram, ʻām tisʻ wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ḥamzī al-Ḥusaynī."

Translation of the colophon: "The total of the maxims is around five hundred. Copied on Tuesday, 19 Muḥarram, the year 969 [of the Hijrah = 9 October, 1561], by the poor Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Ḥamzī al-Ḥusaynī."

record.title: 880-02 Bulghat al-murīd wa-mushtahá al-saʻīd fīmā yajibu fī al-ṭarīq ʻalá al-murīd : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Kamāl al-Dīn al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tawfīqi // mā sāra sārin manhaja al-taḥqīqi. Wa-al-shukru lillāhi ʻalá al-inʻāmi // mā adhhaba al-nahāru lil-ẓalāmi ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-man yakun bi-hādhihi al-mathābah // ḥaqqaqa Mawlānā la-hu al-ijābah.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some phrases in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Bulghat al-murīd wa-mushtahá al-saʻīd fīmā yajibu fī al-ṭarīq ʻalá al-murīd, lil-ʻārif billāh al-Sayyid Muṣṭafá al-Bakrī. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."
On folio 2a: "Sammaytuhā bi-Bulghati al-murīdi // wa-mushtahá muwaffaqin saʻīdi."

The poem ends with a verse in alphabetical retconning "Ḥisāb al-jummal" enumerating the verses in the poem, as follows: "ʻIddatuhā Rāʼun wa-Yāʼu Jīmin // tawfīqahu Rabbī lanā yudīmu [R (200) + Y (10) + J (3) = 213 verses]."

Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Rabbihi al-muʻṭī Ḥusnī ibn Ḥusayn al-Qarāmīṭī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-ikhwānihi, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, by the poorest of the servants to his Abundant Giving Lord, Ḥusnī ibn Ḥusayn al-Qarāmīṭī, may God forgive him, his parents, his masters, his brethren and all Muslims. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Mashāriq al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā [Allāh], al-Malik al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn. Allāhumma, fa-ṣalli wa-sallim ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá sāyir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, abada al-ābidīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb nafīs lam yasbiqnī aḥad ilá waḍʻ mithālih, wa-lā aẓunnu aḥadan nasaja ʻalá minwālih, ḍammantuhu jamīʻ al-ʻuhūd allatī balaghatnā ʻan Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, min fiʻl al-maʼmūrāt wa-tark al-manhīyāt. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Mashāriq al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah'. Wa-kāna al-bāʻith lī ʻalá taʼlīfih mā raʼaytuhu min kathrat taftīsh al-ikhwān ʻalá mā naquṣa min dunyāhum, wa-lam ara aḥadan minhum yufattishu ʻalá mā naquṣa min umūr dīnih, fa-waḍaʻtu lahum hādhā al-kitāb ..."
Secundo folio: lam yalḥaq bi-darajat al-amr wa-al-nahy.
14.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 29 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap and dark red leather on spine; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; text within double red frames; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-ʻUhūd al-kubrá, lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah wa-al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, raḥimahu Allāh raḥmatan wāsiʻah. Āmīn."
On folio 2a: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ʻalayhi al-tiklān, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

On folio 2a: Three ownership statements: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Malakahu al-faqīr Ḥasan ibn Muṣṭafá ibn Rajab ibn Muḥammad al-Rūmī, sibṭ al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Yūnus, ʻufiya ʻanhumā bi-mannihi. Sanat 1133 [1720/1721]." (Two illegible seals). "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Malakahu al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn [...], ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-mashāyikhihi, wa-ʻafá ʻanhu. Āmīn." "Tamallakahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr [...] faḍl Rabbih al-sattār [... ... ...] ghafara [... ...] wa-li-wālidayhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn."

Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun dhālika ākhir kitāb 'Lawāqiḥ al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah', wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam. Tammat 'al-ʻUhūd al-Muḥammadīyah', bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, fī thāmin Jumād al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat 1125, ghafara Allāh li-kātibihā wa-li-wālidayhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "Let this be the end of the book of 'Lawāqiḥ al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah'. God, may He be praised and glorified, is more knowledgeable. 'al-ʻUhūd al-Muḥammadīyah' is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, on 8 Jumād al-Thānī, 1125 [of the Hijrah = 2 July, 1713]. May God forgive its copyist, his parents and all Muslims. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAyyāshī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshadanā li-iqāmat waẓāʼif al-Islām, wa-ḥaḍḍanā ʻalá takthīr dhikrihi fī al-ghudw wa-al-āṣāl ʻalá al-dawām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-badr al-tamām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-sādāt al-aʻlām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh subḥānuh, al-mutaʻalliq bi-adhyāl awliyāʼih, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-ʻAyyāshī, nawwara Allāh qalbahu, wa-satara ʻaybahu, wa-khatama bi-kalimatay al-shahādah qawlahu, wa-faʻala bi-ummat Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, mithlahu, qāl: Ṭāla mā khālaja qalbī an aḍaʻa taqyīdan yakūnu ka-al-sharḥ ʻalá 'al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah', al-jāmiʻah li-khayray al-dunuā wa-al-ākhirah, allatī sārat masīrat al-Shams fī al-bilād, wa-intafaʻa bi-hā fī jamīʻ al-aqṭār al-ʻibād, munṭawiyan ʻalá tafsīr gharāʼibihā, wa-muḥtawiyan ʻalá faḍīlat adhkārihā ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah' ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ammā Zarrūq fa-bi-al-Rāʼ al-maftūḥah.
11 x 18 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Wazīfah al-Zarrūqīyah" and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 56a: Six verses of poetry attributed to al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī (a prominant Sufi; died 561/1166)
Folio 60 is blank; text of "al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah" (folios 1b-56a); on folios 56b-59a: Various invocations.

Author's colophon (folios 55b-56a): "Qāla muqayyiduhu, al-faqīr li-Rabbihi, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad: Hādhā mā yassara Allāh mimmā qaṣadtu min hādhā al-kitāb, wa-astaghfiru Allāh al-ʻAẓīm mimmā zalla bi-hi al-lisān, wa-adkhalahu dhuhūl al-nisyān. Wa-man ẓafira bi-khaṭaʼ aw taqṣīr fa-li-yumahhid ʻudhrī li-ḍaʻfī wa-ʻajzī wa-qillat biḍāʻatī. Wa-asʼalu Allāh an yanfaʻa bi-hi man ṭālaʻahu, aw qaraʼahu, aw ḥaṣṣalahu, aw saʻá fī shayʼ minhu, wa-an yuʻāmila jamīʻanā bi-faḍlihi, wa-an yakhtima lanā bi-al-ḥusná bi-raḥmatihi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Its author, the poor to his Lord, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad, said: This is what God facilitated of what I intended to do in this book. I beg forgiveness from God Almighty to what the tongue might have erred and what the confusion of forgetfulness might have introduced. He who finds a mistake or shortcoming [in the book], let him take my excuse with ease, because of my weakness, inability and insufficiency. I invoke God to benefit with it he who studies it, he who reads it, he who memorizes it, or endeavors in part of it; and to treat us all according to His favor, and to seal our life and all Muslims amicably, by His mercy. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

Colophon of the copy from which the present copy was transcribed: "Kamula hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak ʻalá Waẓīfat al-Shaykh Zarrūq, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-nafaʻanā bi-ʻulūmihi -- Āmīn -- fī yawm al-Aḥad, fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, 18 khalat, sanat 1287. Hādhā tārīkh al-nuskhah al-manqūl minhā hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah."

Translation of the colophon of the copy from which the present copy was transcribed: "Completed is this blessed commentary on the Doctrine of al-Shaykh Zarrūq, may God be pleased with him and benefit us by his sciences -- Amen -- on Sunday, 18 nights having passed of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, the year 1287 [of the Hijran = 12 March, 1871]. This is the date of the copy from which this blessed copy was transcribed."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa itmām kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah laylat al-Jumʻah al-gharrāʼ al-mubārakah, 26 maḍat min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-mubārak, min sanat 1332 Hijrīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalawāt wa-al-taslīmāt al-zakīyah, ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr Muḥammad Rajab Ṭaḥḥān, aṣlaḥa Allāh aḥwālahu fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on the night of glorious and blessed Friday, 26 nights having passed of the blessed month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, the year 1332 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [16 October, 1914], may the best prayers and purest peace be upon Him, by its copyist, the poor Muḥammad Rajab Ṭaḥḥān, may God remedy his conditions, and all Muslims, in this world and the Hereafter. Amen."

record.title: Sarah Jean Brady scrapbook : typescript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.

record.title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar from folio 2a.
Title of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz from folio 150b.
Title of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad from folio 190a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Aḥmadu Allāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jawāhir wa-durar iltaqaṭṭuhā min kalām shaykhī wa-qudwatī ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh al-kāmil, al-rāsikh al-ummī al-Muḥammadī, ṣāḥib al-kushūfāt wa-al-ʻulūm wa-al-asrār wa-al-taṣrīf fī arḍ Miṣr, Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Khawwāṣ al-Burullusī, tilmīdh Sayyidī Ibrāhīm al-Mabtūlī [Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī al-Matbūlī, died 1472?], raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá mashāyikh al-ʻaṣr min barakātihi wa-barakat ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Wa-qad ṣaḥibtuhu naḥwa thalāthīn sanah, minhā ʻashr sinīn mulāzamatan, fa-kuntu kull kalimah samiʻtuhā minhu tataʻallaqu bi-āyah, aw Ḥadīth, aw ghayrihimā, aḥfaẓuhā wa-arqumuhā ʻindī fī qirṭās, ilá an ṣāra dhālika naḥw mujalladāt. Wa-kāna yaqūlu lī: Idhā samiʻta minnī kalimah marmāhā baʻdīd ʻan al-afhām fa-tarjimhā ʻannī bi-al-ʻibārah al-maʼlūfah bayna al-nās ..."
Secundo folio of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar : fa-kayfa bi-ghayrihim fa-mā kāna.

Incipit of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātihi. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-jalā abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahar mā kāna maḥjūban wa-jalā ʻarāʼis al-wujūd fī musawwāt [mirʼāt?] al-shuhūd, fa-man fahima al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb. Waffaqa man shāʼa min ʻibādih, fa-jāhada fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih, bi-mā sabaqa la-hu fī al-maktūb, thumma hadāhu baʻdamā bayyana hudāhu, thumma raqqāhu baʻdamā naqqāhu min al-ʻubūdīyah, thumma wallāhu baʻdamā tawallāhu, thumma awlāhu niʻaman lā yaḥṣuruhā ḥaysūb ..."
Secundo folio of Incipit of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: li-tafrīj al-kurūb yawma lā tashrīqa li-shams wa-lā ghurūb.

Incipit of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal, fa-laysa li-awwalīyatihi amad, wa-al-ākhir alladhī tantahī dūna ākhirīyatihi al-mudad, al-ẓāhir alladhī lā yaẓharu ʻalá ghaybihi aḥad, al-bāṭin alladhī lā yudrikuhu al-ṭālib wa-law ijtahad, al-wāḥid alladhī lā yadkhulu fī taʻaddud, al-wāḥid alladhī lā yushbihu aḥadīyatahu aḥad, al-fard alladhī tanazzaha ʻan al-zawjah wa-al-walad. Aḥmaduhu ḥamd man ṭalaba wa-ijtahad, wa-jadda fa-wajad ..."
Secundo folio of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad: ḥaqīqatan illā Allāh ʻazza wa-jall.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with embossed central medallion; back cover missing.
The three manuscripts are copied in the same hand; in good Maghribī script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar, lil-ʻālim al-Rabbānī wa-al-haykal al-ṣamadānī, Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, maddanā Allāh min madadih. Āmīn. Wa-fī hādhā al-kitāb ayḍan Kitāb Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz lil-ʻAllāmah Ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn. Kitāb Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad."

Colophon of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá́ Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

Translation of the colophon of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar: "Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. There is no power nor might except in God, the Most High, the All Powerful."

Colophon of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: "Kamula Kitāb Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz, bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn ʻawni. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan."

Translation of the colophon of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: "The book of 'Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz' is completed by the praise of God and His abundant benevolence. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them abundant, continuous and everlasting peace."

Colophon of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with "al-Bāb al-khāmis" (Chapter five), as follows: "... Aẓananta anna ṭahārata qudīyatī tudannisuhā awsākh al-mudhnibīn? Akhashīta ʻalá wasīʻ raḥmatī an taḍīqa bi-zumrat al-khāṭiʼīn? Akhifta anna malābis maghfiratī yakhliquhā talabbus al-musayyibīn? Lā taʻtaqid anna kamāl lāhūtīyatī lā yatimmu illā bi-ḥasanāt al-ṭāʼiʻīn. Akhaṭara bi-bālika anna jamāl aḥadīyatī lā yaqūmu illā bi-qurbāt al-muqarribīn? Yā Dāwūd: In qaddastanī wa-sammaytanī, fa-innamā dhālika athar taʻarrufī ilayka wa-barakat tawfīqī laka bi-al-dalālah ʻalayya. Wa-al-quddūsīyah ṣifatī, wa-al-subbūḥīyah naʻtī, fa-idhā ..."

record.title: 880-01 Mukhtaṣar Minhāj al-ʻābidīn : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qad rattaba al-Imām, Ḥujjat al-Islām, Abū Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh, kitāb Minhāj al-ʻābidīn ʻalá sabʻ ʻaqabāt: al-Ūlá ʻaqabat al-ʻilm, al-thāniyah ʻaqabat al-tawḥīd, al-thālithah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāʼiq (wa-hiya al-dunyā, wa-al-khalq, wa-al-Shayṭān, wa-al-nafs), al-rābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāriḍ (wa-hiya al-rizq, wa-al-akhṭār min kull shayʼ yukhāfu aw yurjá aw yurādu aw yukrahu; fa-inna ʻawāʼiq al-umūr mubhamah, fa-yashtaghilu al-qalb bi-hā, wa-al-shadāʼid, wa-anwāʻ al-qaḍāʼ), al-khāmisah ʻaqabat al-bawāʻith (wa-hiya al-khawf wa-al-rajāʼ), wa-al-sādisah ʻaqabat al-qawādiḥ (wa-hiya al-ʻujb wa-al-riyāʼ), al-sābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ḥamd wa-al-shukr ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-zawl mutafarrid bi-al-qidam.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Mukhtaṣar Minhāj al-ʻābidīn lil-Imām Abī Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

At the end of the treatise, the copyist started copying another treatise on Sufism and Sufis (eight lines only, title not provided, by Abū al-Naṣr ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Ḥasan (could not be identified).

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb fī niṣf shahr Dhi [Dhī] al-Ḥijjah, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-ithnay ʻashar, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Ḥanafī al-Miṣrī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhih, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King, in the middle of the month of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, 1112 [of the Hijrah = 23 May, 1701], by the poor Ibrāhīm al-Ḥanafī al-Miṣrī, may God forgive him, his parents, his teachers and all Muslims."

record.title: 880-02 al-Sayr wa-al-sulūk ilá Malik al-Mulūk : manuscript / Qāsim ibn Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn al-Khānī.
record.note: Title from folio 6b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā al-kitāb Sayr al-mulūk. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ahbaṭa bi-ḥikmatihi asrār dhātih min samāʼ al-ʻamāʼ ilá arḍ al-ṭabīʻah al-kullīyah, wa-awdaʻahā bi-qudratih fī ṣadaf al-nuṭaf iẓhāran li-khawāṣṣ al-asmāʼ, fa-inḥajabat al-ẓulumāt al-nafsānīyah ḥijāban ansāhā mā kānat ʻalayhi min al-kamālāt, fa-mālat ilá al-shahawāt, wa-rakanat ilá al-maḥsūsāt, wa-alifat al-ʻādāt, fa-lam tadhkur awṭānahā, wa-lā khaṭara bi-bālihā mabādīhā al-ʻalīyah. Thumma arsala ilayhā rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-ẓāhirah wa-rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-bāṭinah ..."
Secundo folio: ṣifātihā min ṣifātih.
13.5 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding; cover embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the back of the front cover: "Kitāb al-Aghawānī". "ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ʻĀṣī yatazawwaju ʻĀtikah bint Muṣṭafá al-Nābulusī".
