record.title: 880-02 Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib : manuscript / Sirāj al-Dīn Abū Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn al-Wardī.
record.note: Title of Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib from colophon (folio 152a).
Title of al-Mawāʻiẓ wa-al-iʻtibār fī dhikr al-khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār from incipit (folio 152b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ghāfir al-dhanb wa-qābil al-tawb, shadīd al-ʻiqāb, ʻālim al-ghayb, rāḥim al-shayb, munzil al-Kitāb, sātir al-ʻayb, kāshif al-rayb, mudhallil al-ṣiʻāb, mughīth al-malhūf, dāfiʻ al-maṣrūf, Rabb al-Arbāb, khāliq al-khalq, bāsiṭ al-rizq, musabbib al-asbāb, mālik al-mulk, musakhkhir al-fulk, musayyir al-saḥāb, rāfiʻ al-sabʻ al-ṭibāq mukhayyimah ʻalá al-āfāq takhyīm al-qibāb, sāṭiḥ al-ghabrāʼ ʻalá matn al-māʼ mumsakah bi-ḥikmatihi ʻan al-iḍṭriāb, minhā khalaqnākum wa-ilayhā nuʻīdukum wa-minhā nukhrijukum yawm al-ḥashr wa-al-maʼāb ..."
Secundo folio of Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib: nudibū ilayhi min al-istirʻāʼ.

Incipit of al-Mawāʻiẓ wa-al-iʻtibār fī dhikr al-khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin. Yā Karīm. al-Mawāʻiẓ wa-al-iʻtibār fī dhikr al-khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār, lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Taqī al-Dīn al-Maqrīzī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fa-innahu qāl, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, baʻda an dhakara Madrasat Ṣartaḥtamsh [?], thumma qāla baʻda dhālika: al-Jawharī fī al-Ṣiḥāḥ, wa-al-Mārastān, bi-fatḥ al-rāy [al-rāʼ], bayt al-marḍá, muʻarrab, ʻan Ibn al-Sikkīt. Wa-dhakar al-Ustādh Ibrāhīm ibn Waṣīf Shāh fī kitāb Akhbār Miṣr anna al-Malik Manāqiyūsh ibn Ashmūn aḥad mulūk al-Qibṭ al-uwal bi-arḍ Miṣr, awwal man ʻamila al-bīmārastānāt li-ʻilāj al-marḍá, wa-awdaʻahā al-ʻaqāqīr, wa-rattaba fīhā al-aṭibbāʼ wa-ajrá ʻalayhā mā yasaʻuhā ..."
Secundo folio of al-Mawāʻiẓ wa-al-iʻtibār fī dhikr al-khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār: wa-kāna alladhī anfaqa ʻalá al-Mārastān wa-mustaghallih.
13.7 x 21.3 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.

Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib in written in medium good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords. The fragment of "al-Mawāʻiẓ wa-al-iʻtibār fī dhikr al-khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār" is written in a fast and crude naskhtaʻlīq script and ends abruptly.
At the upper left corner of folio 1a: "ʻAdad al-karārīs 17."
On folio 1a: "Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-jarīdat [wa-farīdat] al-gharāʼib, lil-Imām al-ʻallāmah wa-al-adīb al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn al-Wardī, raḥimahu Allāh raḥmatan wāsiʻah. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī nawbat al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-rājī raḥmat Rabbihi, Sayyid Ṭāhā ibn al-Ḥājj ʻUthmān al-ʻAqqād ibn al-Ḥājj Aḥmad al-ʻAqqād, fī ghurrat Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat 1218 [of the Hijrah = 21 June, 1803]."

On folio 152a: An ownership note and an illegible seal: "Qad tamallakahu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qadīr [... ... ...] ibn Muṣṭafá [... ... ...] Ḥalab sābiqan, sanat 1198 [of the Hijrah = 1783/1784]."

Colophon of Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib: "Tamma Kitāb Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib, jamaʻahu al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-adīb, Sirāj al-Dīn Abī Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn Muẓaffar ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Abī al-Fawāris ibn al-Wardī al-Qurashī al-Bakrī al-ʻUmarī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-ṭāba tharāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah mathwāh, ʻalá yaday al-faqīr ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Būrallī, wa-dhālika fī awākhir Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat 948. Tammat al-muqāblah bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqih."

Translation of the colophon of Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib: "The book of Kharīdat al-ʻajāʼib wa-farīdat al-gharāʼib is completed. It was compiled by the learned Imam and litterateur Sirāj al-Dīn Abī Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn Muẓaffar ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Abī al-Fawāris ibn al-Wardī al-Qurashī al-Bakrī al-ʻUmarī, may God encompass him with His mercy, perfume his earth [i.e. resting place] and make Paradise his abode. Copied by the poor ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Būrallī, at the end of Jumādá al-Ākhir, the year 948 [of the Hijrah = 30 October, 1541]. The collation was completed by the help of God Almighty and His abundant benevolence."

Colophon of the fragment of al-Mawāʻiẓ wa-al-iʻtibār fī dhikr al-khiṭaṭ wa-al-āthār: No colophon. The text at the end is nearly illegible, and ends abruptly with: "... Hādhā al-Mārastān fawqa al-ṣūwah tujāha Ṭablakhānāh Qalʻat al-Jabal, ḥaythu kānat Madrasat al-Ashraf Shaʻbān ibn Ḥusayn allatī hadamahā al-Nāṣir Faraj ibn Barqūq, wa-bābuhu huwa ḥaythu kāna <kāna> bāb al-Madrasah, illā annahu aḍyaq ʻammā kān, anshaʼahu al-Muʼayyad Shaykh fī muddah awwaluhā Jumādá al-Ākhirah sanat iḥdá [wa-ʻishrīn] wa-thamānimiʼah, wa-ākhiruhā Rajab sanat thalāth wa-ʻishrīn, wa-nazala fīhi al-marḍá [fī] niṣf Shaʻbān, wa-ʻumilat maṣārifuhu min jumlat awqāf al-Jāmiʻ al-Muʼayyadī al-mujāwir [li-Bāb Zuwaylah. Fa-lammā māta] al-Malik al-Muʼayyad fī thāmin al-Muḥarram sanat [arbaʻ wa-ʻishrīn] ..."

record.title: 880-03 ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Qazwīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b: "... wa-sammaytuhu ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-ʻAẓamat [al-ʻAẓamah] laka, wa-al-kibriyāʼ li-Jalālika, Allāhumma. Yā qāʼim al-dhāt, wa-mufīḍ al-khayrāt, wa-wājib al-wujūd, wa-wāhib al-ʻuqūl, wa-fāṭir al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt, mubdī al-ḥarakah wa-al-zamān, wa-mubdiʻ al-ḥayyiz wa-al-makān, wa-jāʻil al-nūr wa-al-ẓulumāt, muḥarrika al-aflāk wa-muzayyinuhā bi-al-thawābit [wa-]al-sayyārāt, wa-muqarrir al-arḍ wa-mumahhiduhā li-anwāʻ al-ḥayawānāt, wa-aṣnāf al-maʻādin wa-al-nabāt. Dāma ḥamduka, wa-jall thanāʼuka, wa-taʻālá dhikruka, wa-taqaddasat asmāʼuka, lā ilāha illā ant ..."
Secundo folio: taqlīb al-ḥadaqah naḥwahā.
19 x 28.2 cm; written surface: 12 x 19 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion in gold.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple and orange; few corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt, taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-fahhāmah, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, al-Shaykh al-ṣāliḥ, [Zakarīyā ibn] Muḥammad ibn Maḥmūd al-Qazwīnī al-Ḥanafī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-biʻlūmihi, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-kafá. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Three ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Qad manna Allāh taʻālá bi-intiqāl hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak ilá nawbat al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-Sayyid Aḥmad Naṣūḥ Bāshā [... ...]." An illegible seal. 2. "Qad manna Allāh taʻālá bi-intiqāl hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak ilá nawbat al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr al-Sayyid Muḥammad Rāghib al-Usṭuwānī, fī Rabīʻ al-Awwal, fī shahr Mawlid al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, sanat 1268 [December 1851/January 1852]." 3. "Thumma intaqala min faḍl Rabbihi al-qadīr, ilá dhimmat al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Ḥājj Mullā Arakillī, bi-thaman 95. 15 D [Rabīʻ al-Thānī?], sanat 1269 [26 January, 1853]."

Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir al-kalām ʻan ʻajāʼib al-makhlūqāt. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Tamma Kitāb ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt fī 7 J [Jumād] Thānī, sanat 1234. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "Let this be the end of the discourse on the wonderous creatures. God is more knowledgeable. To Him is the reference and returning. The book of ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt wa-gharāʼib al-mawjūdāt was completed on 7 J [Jumādá] Thānī, of the year 1234 [of the Hijrah = 3 April, 1819]. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions and grant them peace. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Bāʻith al-nufūs ilá ziyārat al-Quds al-maḥrūs : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Firkāḥ.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi wa-sallam taslīman. Wa-raḍiya Allāh ʻan aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Fa-hādhā 'Muntakhab fī faḍāʼil Bayt al-Maqdis wa-qabr al-Khalīl Ibrāhīm', ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ghālibuhu min kitāb al-Mustaqṣá lil-Ḥāfiẓ Bahāʼ al-Dīn ibn ʻAsākir, raḥimahu Allāh, wa-al-qalīl minhu min kitāb al-Shaykh [Abī al-Maʻālī] al-Musharraf ibn al-Murajjā al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh. Wa-mā naqaltuhu min kitāb Abī al-Maʻālī fa-huwa mubayyan annahu min kalāmih, wa-al-bāqī min al-Mustaqṣá. Wa-qad ḥadhaftu al-asānīd min dhālika kullih li-mā iqtaḍathu al-maṣlaḥah fī dhālik ..."
Secundo folio: in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá.
13.5 x 18 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; the text of the first fifteen leaves in double red frame; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-kitāb yashtamilu ʻalá faḍāʼil Bayt al-Maqdis."
At the head of folio 1b: "Hādhā al-kitāb fī faḍāʼil Bayt al-Maqdis, sharrafahā Allāh."

Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah, bi-tawfīq Allāh taʻālá, ʻalá yaday al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf, al-rājī laṭāʼif Rabbih, al-khāʼif min ʻadhābih, kātibuhu al-mudhnib al-ḥaqīr al-dhalīl, ʻAwaḍ ibn Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi, wa-li-kāffat al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This noble copy was completed by the abundant benevolence of God Almighty, by the hands of the feeble servant, who hopes for the graciousness of his Lord, he who is afraid of His torment, the sinner, despised and miserable copyist, ʻAwaḍ ibn Muḥammad ibn Ismāʼīl, may God forgive him and his parents, and treat them and all Muslims with kindness. Amen. O Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-03 ʻArāʼis al-majālis fī qiṣaṣ al-anbiyāʼ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Thaʻlabī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 4b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-Ustādh Abū Isḥāq Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Thaʻlabī: Hādhā kitāb yashtamilu ʻalá dhikr qiṣaṣ al-Qurʼān bi-al-sharḥ wa-al-bayān, wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān, wa-ʻalayhi al-tuklān, innahu al-Malik al-Dayyān. Bāb fī baʻḍ wujūh al-ḥikamah ..."
Secundo folio: al-anbiyāʼ athná Allāh ʻalayhi.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red leather binding with flap; cover and flap tooled with decorative frame.
In good medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; headings also written on the margins in red; text within double red frames; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements, as follows: "Dakhala hādhā al-kitāb fī mulk al-Sayyid Shākir al-Shuwaykī fī Jumād al-Awwal, sanat 1275 [of the Hijrah = December 1858/January 1859]. Wa-baʻdahu ishtarāh waladuhu Muḥammad Darwīsh al-Shuwaykī fī sanat thalāthmiʼah wa-wāḥid baʻda al-alf [1883/1884]."
On folios 1b-3b: An index of contents.

On folio 4a: "Kitāb ʻArāʼis al-Thaʻlabī. Muʼallif hādhā al-kitāb Abū Isḥāq Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Thaʻlabī al-Nīsābūrī al-mashhūr. Kāna awḥad zamānihi fī ʻilm al-tafsīr, wa-ṣannafa 'al-Tafsīr al-kabīr' alladhī fāqa ghayrahu min al-tafāsīr. Wa-la-hu kitāb 'al-ʻArāʼis fī qiṣaṣ al-anbiyāʼ', ʻalayhim al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-ghayr dhālik. Dhakarahu al-Ṣaghānī, wa-qāl: Yuqālu la-hu al-Thaʻlabī, wa-huwa laqab laysa bi-nasab. Qālahu baʻḍ al-ʻulamāʼ. Raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh."

Colophon: "Hādhā al-kitāb ḥarrartuhu baʻdamā shābat al-liḥyah wa-al-limmah, wa-dhahabat al-qūwah wa-al-qudrah wa-al-himmah, wa-ḍaʻufat al-ḥawāss, wa-inḥaná al-ẓahr, wa-āla al-ʻaysh ilá ḍīq wa-kadar. Fa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-aʻūdhu bi-hi min sūʼ mā khaṭara fī al-bāl. Wa-astaghfiru Allāh lī wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-hā anā al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-matīn, al-Ḥājj Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd Allāh, al-ṭālib bi-taswīdihi wa-taḥrīrih thawāb Allāh. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min itmāmih yawm al-Sabt, min awākhir shahr Shawwāl, sanat khams wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah baʻda al-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām wa-al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf."

Translation of the colophon: "I edited this book after the beard and locks turned white; power, energy and ability were gone; the senses weakened; the back bent; and livelihood ended in agony and distress. However, praise be to God in all circumstances. I seek refuge in Him for whatever evil crossed my mind. I invoke God's forgiveness for me and all Muslims. Here am I, the poor who hopes for the forgiveness of his Mighty Lord, al-Ḥājj Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd Allāh, requesting, for editing and copying this book, God's reward. This copy was completed on Saturday, the end of Shawwal, the year 1175 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [23 May, 1762], may prayer, peace, nobleness and honor be upon him."

record.title: 880-02 Iʻlām al-nās bi-mā waqaʻa lil-Barāmikah min Banī al-ʻAbbās. Volume 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad Diyāb al-Itlīdī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzal al-Kitāb al-mubīn ʻalá ashraf al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-qaṣṣa ʻalayhi akhbār al-mutaqaddimīn wa-al-mutaʼakhkhirīn, wa-aʻlamahu bi-mā kāna wa-mā yakūnu ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Aḥmaduhu idh jaʻalanā min ummatihi, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá ʻaṭāyāhu wa-niʻmatih. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, alladhī manna ʻalaynā bi-maʻrifat aḥwāl man taqaddama min al-umam, wa-lam yakshif ʻannā sitrahu idh zalla binā al-qadam, wa-jaʻalanā ummatan ʻadūlan wasaṭan, wa-shahida lanā bidhālika al-Kitāb al-muʻaẓẓam al-muṭahhar ..."
Secundo folio: idh zalla binā al-qadam.
16.2 x 23 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 11 unnumbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min kitāb Iʻlām al-nās bi-mā waqaʻa lil-Barāmikah min Banī al-ʻAbbās, mimmā ʻuniya bi-taʼlīfihi al-Shaykh al-fāḍil Sayyidī Muḥammad Diyāb al-Itlīdī al-Ṣaʻīdī, ṭāba tharāh, wa-nāla min Allāh riḍāh. Āmīn. M."

On folio 1a: Miscellaneous verses of poetry praising books and reading: Three verses attributed to ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-Jurjānī (could not be identified), and three and two verses, respectively, by anonymous poets.
At the head of folio 1b: A decorative geometric design in black and red.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-qumtu ʻalá an ukhalliya lahumā al-makān, fa-qālat al-Sitt Budūr: Ilá ayn Yā Shaykh? Fa-qultu: Ukhallī lakumā al-makān. Fa-qālat: Lā tafʻal. Fa-qāma al-Amīr ʻUmar, wa-akhadhanā ilá majlis malīḥ, wa-quddima al-ṭaʻām fa-akalnā, wa-intaqalnā baʻda dhālika ilá majlis al-sharāb, wa-bitnā fī ladhdhah wa-ṭarab. Fa-lammā kāna al-ṣabāḥ qālat lī al-Sitt Budūr: Imḍi wātinā bi-al-qāḍī wa-al-shuhūd. Fa-aḥḍartuhum bi-surʻah. Fa-qālat lil-qāḍī: Uktub kitābī ʻalá al-Amīr ʻUmar ..."

record.title: 880-02 Tanwīr al-abṣār wa-jāmiʻ al-biḥār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Khaṭīb al-Tamartāshī.
record.note: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Ḥamdan li-man aḥkama al-sharʻ al-sharīf wa-aʻlá manārah, wa-aʻazza man qāma bi-aʻbāʼihi wa-aʻlá miqdārah, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ḍāʻafa Allāh fakhārah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, wa-akhaṣṣa bi-al-ziyādah aʻwānahu wa-anṣārah. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah, wa-al-Imām al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, ʻumdat al-ʻulamāʼ al-rāsikhīn, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wārith ʻulūm al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, kahf al-mushtaghilīn, barakat al-Muslimīn, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih, Mawlānā Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām, zubdat al-anām, ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-marḥūm Shaykh al-Islām, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-humām, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Tamrtāsh al-Ḥanafī, mattaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-ṭūl ḥayātih, wa-adharra ʻalaynā wa-ʻalayhim min barakātih. Āmīn ..."
Secundo folio: wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Kitāb al-ṭahārah.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Tanwīr al-abṣār wa-jāmiʻ al-biḥār, lil-ʻAllāmah Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Tamartāsh, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements: 1. "al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá. Malakahu afqar al-wará Muṣṭafá ibn [... ...] al-Hayṭalānī" and two illegible seals. 2. Dakhala fī nawbat [... ... ...], sanat 1124 [1712/1713]" and an illegible seal.
On folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'Tanwīr al-abṣār wa-jāmiʻ al-biḥār' ..."

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah, fī yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, sābiʻ ʻashar Rajab al-ḥarām, sanat 5 wa-thamānīn wa-alf. Tamma al-kitābu takāmalat // niʻamu al-surūr li-ṣāḥibih. Wa-ʻafá al-Ilāhu bi-jūdihi wa-bi-faḍlihi ʻan kātibih."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on him who no prophet comes after him. On blessed Thursday, 17 Rajab, 1085 [of the Hijrah = 17 October, 1674]. The book is completed, and the blessings of happiness are gathered to its owner. May God, in His generosity and favor, pardon its copyist."

record.title: 880-02 al-Mustaṭraf min kull fann mustaẓraf. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ibshīhī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Bāb al-khamsūn. Fīmā jāʼa fī al-asfār wa-al-iʻtirāf [wa-al-ightirāb], wa-mā qīla fī al-wadāʻ wa-al-firāq, wa-al-ḥathth ʻalá tark al-iqāmah bi-dār al-hawān, wa-ḥubb al-waṭan wa-al-ḥanīn ilayhā. Ammā mā jāʼa fī al-asfār wa-al-ḥathth ʻalá tark al-iqāmah bi-dār al-hawān, fa-qad qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Huwa alladhī jaʻala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan', al-āyah ..."
Secundo folio: fa-li-yuʼammirū aḥadahum. Wa-qīl.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap, brown leather on the spine, the edges and the flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-thānī min 'al-Mustaṭraf min kull fann mustaẓraf', nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-muʼallifihi. Āmīn. Āmīn. Ūllifat [Ullifat] hādhihi al-nuskhah taḥrīran fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-iḥdá ʻashar min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Tamma al-Juzʼ al-awwal [ayy, al-thānī] min Kitāb al-Mustaṭraf, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl, wa-dhālika bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

Translation of the colophon: "God Almighty, may He be praised, is more knowleageble of what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning. There is no power nor might except in God, the Most High, the All Powerful. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family and on his companions and grant them abundant peace. The first [i.e. The second] part of Kitāb al-Mustaṭraf, is completed in its entirety. Praise be to God in all circumstances. [Copied] by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God alone."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ʻarūs wa-nuzʹhat al-nufūs : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Tijānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sawwaghanā al-faḍl jazīlan, wa-faḍḍalanā ʻalá kathīr mimman khalaqa tafḍīlan, wa-asbagha ʻalaynā min niʻamihi al-ẓāhirah wa-al-bāṭinah, mā jaʻala kathīr al-shukr bi-al-nisbah ilayhi qalīlan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī ibtaʻathahu lil-khalq rasūlan, wa-nazzala ʻalayhi waḥyahu tanzīlan, wa-takhayyarahu min aṭhar al-aʻrāq, wa-jaʻala sharʻahu al-qawīm mutammiman li-makārim al-akhlāq taḥrīman wa-taḥlīlan, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna kammala lahum bi-ruʼyatihi wa-ittibāʻihi al-faḍl takmīlan, wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalayhim taslīman, tubādī rūḥuhu ilá arwāḥihim al-muqaddasah bukratan wa-aṣīlan ..."
Secundo folio: bāʼiḥah bi-mā taḍammanathu qabla al-naẓar fīhā.
13.3 x 18.2 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding; light brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf: "Tuḥfat al-ʻarūs wa-fawāʼid al-nikāḥ, bi-khaṭṭ al-Kirmānī, raḥimahu Allāh."
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Tuḥfat al-ʻarūs wa-fawāʼid al-nikāḥ, yashtamilu ʻalá laṭāʼif wa-gharāʼib. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

On folio 1a: Ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Ḥasbiya Allāh. Min kutub [...] Aḥmad ibn Rustum al-Shirwānī" 2. "Malakahu min faḍl Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá [... ... ...]" 3. "Fī nawbat al-faqīr ilayhi, ʻazza shaʼnuhu, al-Sayyid Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn ibn al-Sayyid ʻAlī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahumā wa-satara ʻuyūbahumā" 4. Two illegible statements.
On folio 1b: "... fa-jamaʻnā hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Tuḥfat al-ʻarūs ..."

Colophon: "Wa-hunā intahá al-kitāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ḥusn maʻūnatih, wa-ṣalawātuhu al-mutawāliyah ʻalá khayr barīyatih, Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-dhurrīyatih. Wa-astaghfiru Allāh taʻālá wa-astaqīluhu mimmā khaṭṭathu yamīnī wa-naṭaqa bi-hi lisānī, wa-lafẓ [wa-laghaṭ] al-kalām wa-saqaṭih, wa-fuḍūl al-qawl wa-hadharih al-wāqiʻ fī hādhā al-kitāb. Wa-asʼaluhu, ʻazza wa-jall, al-ʻafwa ʻannī wa-ʻan muʼallifihi wa-ʻan al-nāẓir fīhi, fa-Huwa Allāhumma al-Wahhāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī yawm al-Sabt, al-thānī min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat arbaʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamānimiʼah, ʻalá yad faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi al-ghanī, Yūsuf ibn Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad al-Kirmānī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn. Wa-Allāh yaghfiru lanā wa-li-man daʻā li-nāsikhihi wa-lil-nāẓir fīhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn bi-al-tawbah wa-al-maghfirah. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "Herein this book has ended. Praise be to God for His abundant help. May His continuous prayers be upon the best of his creation, Muḥammad, his family and his progeny. I seek the forgiveness of God Almighty and His abrogation for what my right hand scribbled and my tongue spoke, of clamorous and foul speech, and for the patter and chatter which was introduced in this book. I beseech Him, the Almighty and the Glorious One to pardon me, and to pardon the author of this book, and he who reads it, for God is the Abundant Giver. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. The copy was completed on Saturday, 2 Rabīʻ al-Thāni, 864 [of the Hijrah = 4 February 1460], by the hand of the poor to the mercy of his affluent Lord, Yūsuf ibn Yaḥyá ibn Muḥammad al-Kirmānī, may God forgive them all. May God pardon us and he who beseech God on behalf of its copyist, its reader and all Muslims, and grant them repentance and forgiveness. There is no power nor might except in God, the Almighty, the All Powerful. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and his family and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-inshāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt fī al-mukātabāt wa-al-murāsalāt : manuscript / Marʻī ibn Yūsuf al-Karmī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ḥabr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Marʻī ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām Yūsuf ibn Abī Bakr ibn Aḥmad al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī akrama al-insān, wa-ḥallāhu bi-ḥilyat al-nuṭq wa-al-bayān, wa-jaʻala al-lisān tarjumān al-jinān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man ḥalla min al-faṣāḥah wa-al-balāghah aʻlá makān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-bayān wa-al-tibyān. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi ishārāt yasīrah wa-ʻibārāt qaṣīrah, wa-ḍaʻtuhā fī al-mukātabāt, wa-hadhdhabtuhā fī al-murāsalāt, yaḥtāju ilayhā arbāb al-faḍāʼil ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-qalbu laysa la-hu illā wijhah.
14.5 x 19 cm; written surface: 9 x 13.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark red leather on spine, the edges and the flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf: An index of contents of the fourteen chapters of the book: "Firhist [Fihrist] Inshāʼ al-Shaykh Marʻī al-Karmī al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī madhhaban."
At the upper left corner of the preliminary leaf: "Mansūb ilá qaryah min qurā [qurá] Nāblus tusammá bi-Ṭur Karm."

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Badīʻ al-inshāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt fī al-mukātabāt wa-al-murāsalāt, taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, Shaykh al-Islām, barakat al-anām, al-Shaykh Marʻī ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām Yūsuf ibn Abī Bakr ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Aḥmad al-Maqdisī al-Ḥanbalī, raḥmat Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhim wa-ʻalayhi. Āmīn."
At the head of folio 1b: An ownership statement: "Ṣāḥibuhu Muḥammad najl al-Shaykh Masʻūd Abū Ghazlah [...] al-Naqshabandī."
On folio 2a: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'Badīʻ al-inshāʼ wa-al-ṣifāt fī al-mukātabāt wa-al-murāsalāt' ..."
On folio 68a: An ownership statement: "Dakhal hādhā al-kitāb fī mulk al-ʻabd al-faqīr [...] Abū Ghazlah, fī sant alf wa-miʼatayn wa-sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn. Sanat 1227 [1812/1813]."
On folios 68a-69a: Miscellaneous poetry and prose on letter writing.

Author's colophon (folio 67b): "Qāla muʼallifuhu, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Wa-kāna farāghuhu bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar, sanata tisʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Its author, may God have mercy upon him, said: It was completed at al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar, in the year 1029 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1619/1620], may the best prayer and peace be upon him. Praise be to God alone."

Copyist's colophon (folio 68a): "Wa-hādhihi al-nuskhah nuqilat min nuskhat al-Ustādh al-madhkūr, bi-khaṭṭihi, fī ghurrat shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah wa-thalāthīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This copy was transcribed from a copy in the handwriting of the aforementioned Master, at the beginning of Dhū al-Qaʻdah, the year 1128 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1 July, 1726]. May God pray on Him who no prophet comes after him. God suffices us. He is the best advocate. There is no power nor might except in God the Almighty the All Powerful. It was completed by the praise of God."

record.title: 880-02 al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title of "al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil" from folio 2a.
Title of "Juzʼ fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh'" from folio 63b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma Ṣalli ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallim. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻāmil al-ʻālim, al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq al-mufannan, al-qudwah al-khāshiʻ al-nāsik, al-mufīd al-mujtahid, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr, khaṭīb al-khuṭabāʼ, faṣīḥ al-bulaghāʼ, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ṣadr al-mudarrisīn, Sībawayh awānih [zamānih], ḥāfiẓ waqtihi wa-awānih, khādim Sunnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-marḥūm al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil al-faqīh, Zayn al-Dīn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, aʻāda Allāh ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min barakātihimā wa-barakāt ʻulūmihimā fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālihi: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal fa-laysa la-hu ākhir. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah lā sharīka lah, wa-lā tanthanī ʻalayhi al-khanāṣir. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh dhū al-nasab al-ṭāhir, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih dhawī al-mafākhir wa-al-maʼāthir. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb laṭīf jāmiʻ lil-awāʼil, lakhkhaṣtu fīhi kitāb al-Awāʼil lil-ʻAskarī, wa-zidtu ʻalayhi aḍʻāfahu, wa-rattabtuhu tartīban sahl al-tanāwul ʻalá abwāb ..."
Secundo folio of al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil: al-Mabʻath al-Nabawī, al-Imārah, al-ʻIlm, al-Amthāl.

Incipit of Juzʼ fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh': "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Hādhā juzʼ jamaʻtu fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh', fa-naqūlu: Warada dhālika min Ḥadīth Ibn ʻAbbās, wa-Ibn ʻUmar, wa-Jābir ibn ʻAbd Allāh, wa-Anas, wa-ʻAlī, wa-Abī Hurayrah, wa-Abī Bakrah, wa-ʻAbd Allāh ibn Jarād, Wa-Raqād ibn Rabīʻah, wa-ʻĀyishah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum, wa-Yazīd ibn al-Ḥajjāj, wa-Abī Khuṣayfah ..."
Secundo folio of Juzʼ fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh': ʻAbd al-Ṣamad ibn Aḥmad ibn Khanbash.
16 x 21 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap (in seven unnumbered quires).
In clear naskh script, in black ink on white paper, headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq, al-qudwah al-mufīd al-mujtahid, ḥāfiẓ al-ʻaṣr, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ṣadr al-mudarrisīn, Jalāl al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Suyūṭī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātihi. Āmīn."
On folio 2a: "... wa-sammaytuhu al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil ..."

The titles of the chapters of "al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil" are, as follows: Badʼ al-khalq (Beginnig of creation), al-Ṭahārah (Ritual purity), al-Ṣalāh (Prayer), al-Janāʼiz (Funerals), al-Zakāh (Islamic almsgiving), al-Ṣawm (Fasting), al-Ḥajj (Pilgrimage), al-Buyūʻ (Sales), al-Farāʼiḍ (Inheritance and succession), al-Nikāḥ (Marriage), al-Ḥudūd (Punishments), al-Jināyāt (Crimes), al-Jihād (War), al-Libās (Clothes), al-Asāmī wa-al-alqāb (Names and nicknames), al-Aṭʻimah (Foods), al-Mabʻath al-Nabawī (Advent of the Prophet), al-Imārah (Governorship), al-ʻIlm (Science), al-Amthāl (Proverbs), Bāb jāmiʻ al-Baʻth wa-al-Nushūr (Culminative chapter on Day of Judgement and Resurrection).
On folio 63b: "Juzʼ fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh', lil-Ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātihi. Āmīn."

"al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil" ends with: "... Akhraja Ibn Saʻd wa-Ibn Abī Shaybah ʻan Abī al-Ḍuḥá, qāl: Istanshada Abū Bakr ibn Maʻdī Karib, wa-qāl: Amā innaka awwal man istanshadtuhu fī al-Islām."
Colophon of al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil: "Akhir mā wujida min khaṭṭ hādhā al-muʼallif."
Translation of the colophon of al-Wasāʼil ilá maʻrifat al-awāʼil: "This is the end of what was found of the handwriting of this author."

"Juzʼ fīhi 'Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh'" ends with: "... Wa-anshada al-Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān: Laqd qāla al-Rasūlu wa-qāla ḥaqqan // wa-khayru al-qawli mā qāla al-Rasūlu. Idhā al-ḥājātu abdat fa-uṭlubūhā ilá man wajhuhu ḥasanun jamīlu."
Colophon of Juzʼ fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh': "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih."
Translation of the colophon of Juzʼ fīhi Ṭuruq Ḥadīth 'Uṭlubū al-khayr ʻinda ḥisān al-wujūh': "It is completed by the praise of God and His help."

record.title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb wa-al-jāmiʻ lil-ʻajab al-ʻujāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Dāʼūd ibn ʻUmar al-Anṭākī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Subḥānuka. Yā mubdiʻ mawādd al-kāʼināt bi-lā mithāl sabaq, mukhtariʻ ṣuwar al-mawjūdāt fī akmal al-fawāʻil wa-al-qawābil, wa-muzayyin jawāhirahu bi-al-aʻrāḍ, wa-al-majmūʻ bi-al-khawāṣṣ, wa-mulhim istikhrājihā bi-al-tajārib wa-al-qiyās man ikhtarta min al-khawāṣṣ, fa-kāna irtibāṭuhā bi-al-muʼaththirāt [bi-al-muʼashshirāt] ʻalá waḥdānīyatika aʻdal shāhid, wa-taṭābuq kullīyātihā wa-juzʼīyātihā ʻalá ʻilmika bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt wa-luzūmānīyatihi aṣaḥḥ rādd ʻalá al-jāḥid ..."
Secundo folio: mimmā qad nubidha ẓahrīyan.
21 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 14.5 x 25 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper, headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; in some leaves the text is in double red frames; catchwords.

On the back of the front cover: A poem dating in alphabetical reckoning "ḥisāb al-jummal" the birth of "Nāṣir najl al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-ʻAbd al-Hādī" in the year 1248 of the Hijrah (1832/1833).
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-kitāb al-Juzw al-awwal min Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb li-Dāwūd al-Baṣīr, ʻafá ʻanhu al-Malik al-Qadīr. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Three poems dating the birth of "al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Qādir najl al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī Zayd al-Qadirī", using alphabetical reckoning "ḥisāb al-jummal", in the year 1238 of the Hijrah (1822/1823).
On folio 1b: A note dating the birth of Munīb: "Yawm al-Thalāthah, fi 18 khalat min Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1250, al-muwāfiq li-khamsat ayyam khalat min Ādhār" (Tuesday, 5 March 1835 [Julian]).

On folio 2a: Two notes dating the birth of a son and a daughter, as follows: "Tārīkh mawlid waladinā ʻAbd al-Qādir, laylat al-Ithnayn,fi 11 sāʻah, fī 20 Ṣafar, sanat 1238 [6 November, 1822]." And "Mawlid Ghuṣūn fī 10 sāʻāt, laylat al-Ithnayn, fī 5 [Rabīʻ] Awwal, sanat 1241 [18 October, 1825]."
On folio 3a: "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb wa-al-jāmiʻ lil-ʻajab al-ʻujab ..."
On folios 201b-202b: Popular medicinal recipes and anecdotes.

Colophon: "Tamma al-Juzw al-awwal bi-mā ishtamala ʻalayhi min al-qawānīn al-kullīyah, wa-tafṣīl aḥwāl al-mufradāt. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā alhama wa-yassara wa-anʻama. Wa-li-Wāhib al-ʻaql wa-al-minnah [al-minnah] wa-al-faḍl. Innahu karīm jawwād. Wa-yatlūhu al-Juzw al-thānī, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Khamīs, sādis ʻashar Shawwāl, sanat 1219, alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻata ʻashar Hijrīyah Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā azká ṣalāh wa-taḥīyah, ʻalá yad afqar al-warā <al-warā> li-raḥmat al-Malik al-Jawwād, ʻabduhu al-faqīr Ḥammād, ilá akhīhi wa-ḥabībihi wa-ṣadīqihi al-Shaykh al-aʻẓam wa-al-qudwah al-muḥtaram al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Ghanī najl al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Yūsuf min Āl Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh Zayd, quddisa sirruhu."

Translation of the colophon: "The First part is completed with what it encompassed of the wholistic laws and the details of the conditions of the single [drugs]. Praise be to God for what He inspired, facilitated and favored. May to the Giver of intellect be the gratitude and favor, for He is the generous and abundant giving one. It will be followed, God willing, by the Second part. It was completed on Thursday, 16 Shawwāl, 1219 of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best prayer and peace by upon Him, by the hand of the poorest of mankind to the mercy of the Abundant Giving King, His servant, the poor Ḥammād, [copied] for his brother, beloved and friend, the Grand Shaykh and the respected leader, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Ghanī, son of the learned scholar, al-Shaykh Yūsuf, of the family of our Master and Chief, al-Shaykh Zayd, may his secret be sanctified."

record.title: 880-02 Murūj al-dhahab wa-maʻādin al-jawhar : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Masʻūdī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustawjib al-thanāʼ wa-al-majd. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi, wa-sallama taslīman, ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Bāb Dhikr jawāmiʻ aghrāḍ hādhā al-kitāb. Ammā baʻd, fa-innā ṣanaʻnā kitāban fī akhbār al-zamān, wa-qaddamnā al-qawl fīhi fī hayʼat al-arḍ, wa-mudunihā, wa-ʻajāʼibihā, wa-biḥārihā, wa-aghwārihā, wa-jibālihā, wa-anhārihā, wa-badāʼiʻ maʻādinihā, wa-aṣnāf manāhilihā, wa-akhbār ghiyāḍihā, wa-jazāʼir al-biḥār wa-al-buḥayrāt al-ṣighār, wa-akhbār al-abniyah al-muʻaẓẓamah wa-al-masākin al-musharrifah, wa-dhikr shaʼn al-mabdaʼ wa-aṣl al-nasl, wa-tabāyun al-awṭān, wa-mā kāna nahran fa-ṣāra baḥran, wa-mā kāna baḥran fa-ṣāra barran, wa-mā kāna barran fa-ṣāra baḥran ʻalá murūr al-ayyām wa-kurūr al-duhūr, wa-ʻillat dhālik wa-sababihi al-falakī wa-al-ṭabīʻī wa-inqisām al-aqālīm bi-khawāṣṣ al-kawākib ..."
Secundo folio: qad shāba khawāṭiranā wa-ghamar qulūbanā.
17.5 x 21.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17.5 cm; 22-30 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on white paper, headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf (in green ink): "Murūj al-dhahab lil-Masʻūdī."

Colophon of part one (folio 289b): "Tamma al-juzw al-awwal bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, ʻalá yad kātibihi wa-mālikihi al-faqīr lillāh al-Ḥannān, Aḥmad al-ʻUthmān. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu fī 22 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 267 [i.e., 1267]. Wa-yalīhi al-juzw al-thānī; awwaluhu: Dhikr Khilāfat Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, karrama Allāh wajhahu."

Translation of the colophon of part one: "The first part was completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, by the hand of its copyist and owner, the poor to the Merciful God, Aḥmad al-ʻUthmān. Completed on 22 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 267 [i.e., 1267 of the Hijrah = 18 October, 1851]. It will be followed by the second part, which begins with: 'Mention of the Caliphate of the Commander of the Faithful, ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, may God honor his face."

Part two ends abruptly with: "... thumma qāla la-hu: Yā Abā ʻAbd Allāh, qad ṭabakha kull wāḥid min hāʼulāʼ qidran, wa-qad jaʻalnāka ḥakaman fī ṭabkhihā. Qāl: 'fa-li-tuḥḍar, thummā ākulu, thumma aḥkumu bi-ḥukm bi-ʻilm.' Fa-ḥumilat ilayhi al-qudūr wa-wuḍiʻat bayna yadayhi. Fa-jaʻala yaʼkulu min awwal qidr aklan tamāman. Fa-qāla la-hu al-Muʻtaṣim: 'Hādhā ẓulm'. Qāl: 'Wa-kayfa dhālik?' Qāl: 'Li-annī arāka qad amʻanta fī hādhā al-lawn wa-sataḥkumu li-ṣāḥibihi'. Qāl: 'Yā Amīra al-Muʼminīn, ʻalayya an ākula min hādhihi al-qudūr kullihā kullamā [kulla mā] akaltuhu min hādhā al-qidr'. Fa-tabassama al-Muʻtaṣim wa-qāl ..."

record.title: 880-02 Laqṭ al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Suyūṭī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Ḥannān al-Mannān. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth ilá al-ins wa-al-jānn. Hādhā talkhīṣ kitāb 'Ākām al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn', lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-Qāḍī Badr al-Dīn al-Shiblī, raḥimahu Allāh, sammaytuhu Laqṭ al-marjān, lakhkhaṣtuhu ʻalá wajh artaḍīh wa-akthartu min al-ziyādāt fīh ..."
Secundo folio: al-arḍ wa-qāla Isʹḥāq.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb laqṭ al-marjān fī aḥkām al-Jānn, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Zayn al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Abī Bakr al-Usyūṭī al-Shāfiʻī, laṭafa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."
Judging from the catchword at leaf 1b, a leaf or more might be missing between folio 1 and 2.

Colophon: "Intahá. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Tamma hādhā al-kitāb, wa-huwa kitāb 'Laqṭ al-marjān fī akhbār al-Jānn', taʼlīf Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī."

Translation of the colophon: "It has ended, but God is more knowledgeable of what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning. This book is completed; it is the book of 'Laqṭ al-marjān fī akhbār al-Jānn', which is authored by our Master and Leader, the learned scholar, al-Shaykh al-Imām, Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī."

record.title: 880-02 al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shirbīnī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bihi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alldhī nashara lil-ʻulamāʼ aʻlāman, wa-thabbata lahum ʻalá al-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm aqdāman, wa-jaʻla maqām al-ʻilm aʻlā maqām, wa-faḍḍala al-ʻulamāʼ bi-iqāmat al-ḥujaj al-dīnīyah wa-maʻrifat al-aḥkām, wa-awdaʻa al-ʻārifīn laṭāʼif sirrih, fa-hum ahl al-muḥāḍarah wa-al-ilhām, wa-waffaqa al-ʻāmilīn li-khidmatihi fa-hajarū ladhīdh al-manām, wa-adhāqa al-muḥibbīn ladhdhata qurbihi wa-unsihi, fa-shaghalahum ʻan jamīʻ al-anām ..."
Secundo folio: al-inʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 37 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red and some in green; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb Sharḥ al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ. Taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, rājī raḥmat al-Mujīb, Muḥammad al-Shirbīnī al-Khaṭīb, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mulk al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Jalīl, Ṭaḥmīr al-Wakīl al-Zaʻbalāwī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 2b: "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-Iqnāʻ fī ḥall alfāẓ Abī Shujāʻ ..."
Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Tanbīh. Aḥkām al-wadīʻah thalāthah. al-Ḥukm al-awwal al-amānah, wa-al-ḥukm al-thānī al-radd, wa-al-ḥukm al-thālith ..."

record.title: 880-02 Lawʻat al-shākī wa-damʻat al-bākī : manuscript / Ṣafī al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Sarāyā al-Ḥillī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-mā tawfīqī [illā bi-hi]. Wa-lā budda min shakwá ilá dhī murūʼatin // yuwāsīka aw yuslīka aw yatawajjaʻu. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh alladhī qaḍá bi-al-maḥabbah wa-al-wulūʻ, wa-ḥakama bi-ḥarq qalb kull ʻāshiq wa-walūʻ, wa-qaddara bi-hawān ahl al-hawá fa-lam yafraḥū bi-hujūm al-hujūʻ, wa-amar bi-shaqāhum aw saqāhum kaʼs al-tafarruq wa-al-tashawwuq wa-al-taḥarruq wa-al-dumūʻ. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad ṣāḥib al-ʻilm al-mazīd wa-al-ḥilm al-madīd wa-al-baṭsh al-shadīd wa-al-raʼy al-sadīd, al-qāʼil wa-qawluhu yudnī min bāligh al-ḥikmah kulla baʻīd: 'Man ʻashiqa, fa-katama, fa-ṣabara, fa-ʻaffa, fa-māta, fa-huwa shahīd' ..."
Secundo folio: kull ḍaʻīf nashaʼa fī al-naʻīm wa-fī al-dalāl.
14 x 21 cm; written surface: 8 x 16.5 cm; 20 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.

In good naskh/taʻlīq script, in black ink, on white paper; the poetry verses and markings in purple; some corrections on the margins; text within double red frames; some water damage on folios 31b-32a and 33b, with loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Lawʻat al-shākī wa-damʻat al-bākī, taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-Ṣafī al-Ḥillī, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Ṣāḥibuhu wa-mālikuhu ʻAlī Ṭumburkī [?], ʻufiya ʻanhu." Two illegible seals.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Wa-kuntu min raybi dahrī jāziʻan fariqan // fa-lam uwaqqa alladhī qad kuntu ajzaʻuhu. Billāhi yā manzila al-ẓaʻni alladhī darasat // āthāruhu wa-ʻafat mudh binti arbuʻuhu."

record.title: 880-02 al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī.
record.note: Title of al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb from reference sources.
Title of al-Yāsamīnīyah from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi aʻin. al-Ḥamdu minnī li-dhī musbighi al-niʻami // wa-al-shukru thumma al-thanā lil-māniḥi al-niḥali. Yā ṭāliban li-khiṣālin sāda jāmiʻuhā // wa-sāʼilan man ḥawāhā suʼla mubtahili ..."
Secundo folio of al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb: man lam tabit fī ṭilāb al-ʻilm himmatuhu.
Incipit of al-Yāsamīnīyah: "ʻAlá thalāthatin yadūru al-jabru // al-mālu wa-al-aʻdād wa-al-jadhru. Fa-al-mālu kullu ʻadadin murabbaʻin // wa-jadhruhu wāḥidu tilka al-aḍluʻu ..."
Secundo folio of al-Yāsamīnīyah: Wa-idh faraghnā min bayān al-khāmisah.
12.5 x 17 cm; written surface: 8 x 10.5-11 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding.

"al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb" is written in fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords. "al-Yāsamīnīyah" is written in mostly good naskh script; some of the verses fully vocalized; markings in red; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf: "Kitāb fī ādāb al-akl."
On the preliminary leaf: An ownership statement: "Fī mulk al-faqīr Iḥsayn [Ḥusayn] Abū Ghazālah."
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Ādāb al-akl li-Ibn al-ʻImād al-Afqahsī [al-Aqfahsī]."

On folio 1a: A statement by a reader/owner: "Qad ṭālaʻahu <fīhi> wa-mālikuhu li-nafsihi al-faqīr Dhikr al-Jalālah, ʻabduhu Muḥammad Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Shaykh Masʻūd Abū Ghazālah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-ʻafá ʻanhu. Āmīn."
At the end of folio 16a "Abyātuhā 328" (al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb is in 328 verses).
At the head of the text on folio 17a: "Kitāb al-Yāsamnīyah [al-Yāsamīnīyah]."

Colophon of al-Manẓūmah al-ʻImādīyah fī ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb. No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-baʻda qawlī li-Rabbī kullu maḥmadatin // Ṣallá al-Ilāhu ʻalá al-Mukhtāri fī al-ṭafali. Wa-al-muṣṭafayna wa-kulli al-rusli ballighuhum // Rabbī al-salāma salāman zākiya al-ʻamali. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

Colophon of al-Yāsamīnīyah. No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-ḍarbu kullu zāyidn wa-nāqiṣi // fī nawʻihi ziyādatun lil-fāḥiṣi. Wa-ḍarbuhu fī ḍiddihi nuqṣānu // fa-ifham hadāka al-Maliku al-Dayyānu. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

record.title: 880-02 Dhāt al-anwār : manuscript / ʻĀmir ibn ʻĀmir al-Baṣrī.
record.note: Title of Dhāt al-anwār supplied Hartford Seminary.
Title of Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth from folio 16a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Dhāt al-anwār (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-fāḍil, qudwat al-muḥaqqiqīn, al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, ʻĀmir ibn ʻĀmir al-Baṣrī, qaddasa Allāh taʻālá rūḥahu wa-nawwar ḍarīḥahu: Tajallá liya al-Maḥbūbu min kulli wijhati // fa-shāhadʹtuhu fī kull maʻnan wa-ṣūrati. Wa-khāṭabanī minnī bi-kashfi sarāʼirin // taʻālat ʻani al-aʻyāni luṭfan wa-jallati ..."
Secundo folio of Dhāt al-anwār: Abītu bi-jafnin min hawāhu musahhadin.

Incipit of Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kull amr dhī bāl lā yubdaʼu bi-hi bi-al-Basmalah, fa-huwa ajdham maqṭūʻ al-barakah. Wa-bi-hi astaʻīn, ay, aṭlubu al-ʻawn minhu. Yaqūlu, ay, yaʼmalu, al-ʻabd al-rājī, maʼkhūdh min al-rajāʼ wa-huwa al-ṭamaʻ fī mumkin al-ḥuṣūl, ʻafwa Mawlāhu, al-ʻafuw huwa al-ṣafḥ wa-ʻadam al-muʼākhadhah min al-Sayyid al-muʻīn li-ʻibādihi, Sharaf al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Taqī al-Dīn al-shahīr bi-al-Ḥalabī: al-Ḥamd huwa al-thanāʼ, ʻalá al-maḥmūd bi-jamīl ṣifātih. Allāh ʻalam lil-dhāt al-wājib al-wujūd al-mustaḥiqq li-jamīʻ al-maḥāmid, wa-al-ṣalāh min Allāh al-raḥmah, wa-min al-malāʼikah al-istighfār wa-min al-ādamīyīn al-duʻāʼ wa-al-taḍarruʻ ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn ..."
Secundo folio of Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth: al-thalāth wa-hiya al-Ghunyah wa-al-Bahāʼīyah.
Thāt al-anwār: 14 x 20 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 14 cm; 23 lines per page. Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth: 15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 14 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather with flap.

"Dhāt al-anwār" is written in good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some commentaries and collations on the margins; catchwords. "Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth" is written in clear naskh script; headings in red; many geometrical figures and illustrations; catchwords.

On folio 13a: Miscellaneous quotations and invocations, and a poem in "ḥisāb al-jummal" (alphabetical reckoning), dating the building of a certain house in the year 1146 of the Hijrah (1733/1734), as follows: "Ilá al-Shaykh Muṣṭafá al-Safarjalānī muʼarrikhan bināʼ al-Sayyid Yaḥyá al-Jāliqī, wa-kāna yulaqqabu Ṭawīl al-Nijād Kathīr al-Ramād: Ṭawīl al-Nijādi baná manzilan // raṣīṣ al-binā lā ʻafá rasmuhu. Rafīʻ al-ʻimādi wa-tārīkhuhu // Kathīru al-Ramādi wa-Yaḥyá ismuhu. Sanat 1146."

On folio 13b: "Yawm al-Sabt, 17 Shawwāl, sanat 47, awwal Ādhār [?]"; and a statement dating the birth of the child Aḥmad: "Fī laylat al-Khamīs, al-sāʻah fī al-tisʻah ilá [illā] shayʼ yasīr, ijānā [jāʼanā] al-mawlūd al-saʻīd, inshāʼ Allāh, wa-sammāh, bi-an luhhimanā nusammīhi Aḥmad, bi-shahr Dhulqaʻdah [Dhū al-Qaʻdah] al-ḥarām, sanat 1221 [Thursday night in January/February, 1807]."

On folio 14a: Six doublets of Arabic love poetry, attributed to: al-Sayyid ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Naqīb, Amīn Chalabī al-Muḥibbī, al-Shaykh Ṣādiq al-Kharrāṭ, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Sammān, al-Sayyid Asʻad al-ʻAbbādī, and al-Ḥalabī [?]; and an anecdote in "ḥisāb al-jummal" (alphabetical reckoning), as follows: "Li-baʻḍ al-Naṣārā [al-Naṣārá] bi-Ḥalab, wa-qad nufiya la-hu ʻadū Naṣrānī ysammā [yusammá] Ibn Mūsān, min al-Rūm. Qālū Ibn Mūsāni hawā [hawá] // qultu Allāhumma ḥaqqiq. Qālū li-aṭbāqi al-Jaḥīm // qultu fa-al-tārīkhu ʻammaq. sanat 1140 [of the Hijrah = 1727/1728]."
On folio 14b: A quotation from the poetry of pre-Islamic poet Imruʼ al-Qays (two verses), and five verses in Ottoman Turkish attributed to Muṣṭafá Efendi.
On folio 15b: Geometrical formulas for finding the areas of some geometrical shapes: square, rectangle, rhombus, etc.

On folio 16a: "Kitāb fī ʻilm al-misāḥah, wa-huwa 'Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil [al-thalāth]' lil-Shaykh al-imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām Sharf al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Taqī al-Dīn al-shahīr bi-al-Ḥalabī."

Dhāt al-anwār ends with: "... Fa-in kuntu fī saʻyī muṣīban bi-mā jará // wa-illā fa-hādhā kāna miqdāra ṭāqatī. Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih [It was completed by the praise of God and His abundant benevolence]."

Colophon of Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi fī al-yawm al-sādis wa-al-ʻishrīn min Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat arbaʻ wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [1134 of the Hijrah = 7 June 1722], ʻalá yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād, Aḥmad ibn Bakkār [?], ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu wa-lil-dāʻī wa-li-wālidayhi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon of Sharḥ Nuzʹhat al-jamʻ bayna maḥāsin al-rasāʼil al-thalāth: "The copy was completed on 26 of Dhū al-Qaʻdah, of the year 1134 [of the Hijrah = 7 June 1722], by the hand of the weakest of servants, Aḥmad ibn Bakkār [?], may God forgive him, his parents, the person who reads it [the book] and invokes God on his [the copyist's] behalf, and his parents. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-01 Tārīkh al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām min aʼimmat al-Islām, mulakhkhaṣ min Tārīkh Ibn Khallikān : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ahl al-ḥamd wa-mustawjib al-thanāʼ wa-al-majd, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-ʻalam al-fard, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-tābiʻīhi wa-ḥizbih ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, faqad qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū Nuʻaym [al-Iṣbahānī] fī Tārīkhih [Ḥilyat al-awliyāʼ wa-ṭabaqāt al-aṣfiyāʼ]: 'Wa-minhum al-Imām al-kāmil, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil, dhū al-sharaf al-munīf wa-al-khuluq al-ẓarīf, man la-hu al-sakhāʼ wa-al-karam, wa-huwa al-ḍiyāʼ fī al-ẓulam, awḍaḥa al-mushkilāt, wa-afṣaḥ ʻan al-muʻḍilāt, al-muntashir ʻilmuhu sharqan wa-gharban, al-mustafīḍ madhhabuhu barran wa-baḥran, al-muttabiʻ lil-sunan wa-al-āthār, wa-al-muqtadī bi-mā ijtamaʻa ʻalayhi al-Muhājirūn wa-al-Anṣār, iqtabasa ʻan al-aʼimmah al-aḥbār fa-ḥaddatha ʻanhu al-aʼimmah al-akhyār, al-Ḥijāzī al-Muṭṭaibī, Abū ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-mawliduhu sanat khamsīn wa-miʼah.
18.5 x 14 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 16.5 cm; 23-26 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with flap; dark brown leather on spine and dark red leather on flap (in five unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Tārīkh al-aʼimmah al-aʻlām min aʼimmat al-Islām, mulakhkhaṣ min Tārīkh Ibn Khallikān"
At head of folio 1b: "Hādhā mā lukhkhiṣa min Tārīkh Qāḍī al-Quḍāh Ibn Khallikān, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá."
Colophon: "Tamma wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."
Translation of the colophon: "It is completed. Praise be to God alone."

record.title: 880-03 Lawāqiḥ al-anwār fī ṭabaqāt al-akhyār. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.
record.note: Title from folio 5a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaʻa ʻalá awliyāʼihi anʻāmahu, fa-hum bi-dhālika la-hu ḥāmidūn, wa-akhaṣṣahum bi-maḥabbatihi, wa-aqāmahum fī khidmatihi, fa-hum ʻalá ṣalātihim yuḥāfiẓūn, wa-daʻāhum ilá ḥaḍratihi, wa-aẓhara fīhā marātibahum, fa-al-sābiqūn al-sābiqūn, ulāʼika al-muqarrabūn, wa-fataḥa lahum abwāb ḥaḍratihi, wa-rafaʻa ʻan qulūbihim ḥijāb buʻdihi, fa-hum bayna yadayhi mutaʼaddibūn ..."
Secundo folio: walī min awliyāʼih nasabūhu ilá al-zandaqah wa-al-junūn.
18.5 x 29 cm; written surface: 14 x 22 cm; 13 lines per page.

Binding: In dark indigo leather with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion; the codex is housed in a case of marbled cardboard with dark brown leather and a ribbon to pull the codex out (in 51 unnumbered quires).
In beautiful large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
On the cover of the case of the codex: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min al-Ṭabaqāt al-kubrá lil-Shaʻrānī."
On folio 1a: "ʻAdad karārīsihi, ʻadad 51."

On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb al-juzʼ al-awwal min Lawāqiḥ al-anwār fī ṭabaqāt al-akhyār, lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-quṭb al-Rabbānī, Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. M. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

On folio 2b: "... wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb lakhkhaṣtu fīhi ṭabaqāt jamāʻah min al-awliyāʼ alladhīna taqtadī bihim fī ṭarīq Allāh taʻālá, min al-Ṣaḥābah wa-al-Tābiʻīn, ilá ākhir al-qarn al-tāsiʻ wa-baʻḍ al-ʻāshir ..."
On folio 5a: "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Lawāqiḥ al-anwār fī ṭabaqāt al-akhyār ..."

Colophon: "Intahá al-juzʼ al-awwal min 'al-Ṭabaqāt al-kubrá' lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaʻrānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, wa-yatlūhu bi-ḥamd Allāh al-juzʼ al-thānī, awwaluhu 'Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī', raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, wa-amaddanā bi-madadih. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The first part of 'al-Ṭabaqāt al-kubrá' of the learned scholar al-Shaʻrānī, may God be pleased with him, is now completed. It will be followed by the second part which begins with 'Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Badawī', may God be pleased with him and strengthen us by his support."

record.title: Billhead recording purchase by Mrs. Harman from M. & H. Corps.
record.note: "To M. & H. Corps, from Mrs. Godrich's London, stay & corset maker to Her Majesty the Queen, the Queen Dowager, H.R.H. the Duchess of Kent, and all the Royal Family. Elastic bands, supporting stays, and horse hair slips, made to order."

Billhead from M. & H. Corps recording purchases made by Mrs. Harman in 1848. On May 10th Mrs. Harman purchased 1 pair of stays [illegible] and 1 pair of lace [stays] totalling £1/16/0. Receipt of payment is recorded by M. & H. Corps dated May 13, 1848.
The engraved billhead features an image of the royal arms of Great Britain.
Completed in pen and black ink.

Drawings of coats of arms are in pen and ink; a few are partially colored with red or yellow ink.
Binding: contemporary limp parchment wallet binding with a pen and colored ink device of a trimmed tree trunk enclosed by a crescent on both covers.

record.title: Billhead recording purchase by Mr. McKenna from Thomas & Edward Gilks, engravers on wood.
record.note: Edward Gilks, a lithographer, was in partnership with his brother, Thomas Gilks, a wood-engraver, from about 1844-1850.
Completed in pen and ink.
"Thos. & Edwd. Gilks, engravers on wood, ornamental draughtsmen & lithographers.4 Fenchurch Buildings, Fenchurch Street."
Engraved vignette of the Royal Exchange at top of billhead.
